Name: Dolce & Gabanna L'imperatrice 3 Pour Femme

Base_note: tobacco, amber, woody notes, vetiver, vanilla, white musk

Name: Xerjoff Casamorati La Tosca

The heart accentuates masculinity with leather accords combined with tobacco and spices, while base notes highlight oriental notes with a combination of oud, ambergris and mysterious, dark, woody notes..

Name: Mancera Roses Vanille
Description: The perfumer Pierre Mancera presents Roses Vanille which hits you first with notes of fresh lemon of calabria and then sneaks on you with turkish delight and rose with the base notes of cedarwood, intense vanilla & white musk, which lingers on with you the whole day long with Sweet enough to capture you, rich enough to keep you and complex enough to seduce you fragrance.

Name: Roberto Cavalli Paradiso Azzurro

The base has accords of guaiac wood, mixed with luxurious oud and Indonesian Patchouli and the amazing sandalwood. The notes of amber and oakmoss, mixed with pink pepper and vanilla adds to the richness of the composition.
Ingredients: almond, mandarin orange, bergamot, watery notes, civet, geranium, rose, gardenia, water lily, guaiac wood, laotian oud, vanilla, coffee, sandalwood, indonesian patchouli leaf, oakmoss, amber, pink pepper

Base_note: guaiac wood, laotian oud, vanilla, coffee, sandalwood, indonesian patchouli leaf, oakmoss, amber, pink pepper

This distinctive fragrance will not leave your side, as it lasts for long hours, and brings out a harmonious & beautiful Rose scent.

Name: The Finest Rose EDP

"Luxurious, Floral and soft"

Name: Maqam Base of Poetry EDP

Eau Demoiselle offers the sensation of walking through a garden on a dewy morning. Its composition was developed by the expert perfumer, Francois Demachy. This perfume is available in a gorgeous, cylindrical flacon.

This incense contains one of the most popular types of oud, as the oud wood is distinguished by its unique smoky fragrance, which will surround the houseÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s atmosphere with a luxurious and sophisticated feel.

Name: Remal Oud Wood Bakhoor
Description: Created from the finest oud wood, this classical incense is refined and long-lasting. Name: Candy Addict Rosy Rose Hair Mist
Description:
This seductive, addictive hair mist will keep you coming back for more! The gentle, sophisticated fragrance will delicately scent your hair with floral notes of rose and geranium and musk. Pure heaven.
Moisturize, soften and strengthen your hair with Vitamin E, a powerful antioxidant, and Provitamin B5. Give your hair that extra shine and volume that it deserves, whilst leaving your hair less prone to breakage.
How to use:
From about 20 cms away, spritz the mist evenly over your hair.
Then smile, this is going to be your day!
Don't forget to shake the bottle before use to liven up the candy!
Reapply throughout the day whenever you need a dose of fabulousness!

Name: Givenchy Hot Couture
Description: Hot Couture was introduced in 2000. This womenÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s fragrance is chic, sexy and oh, so French. Top notes are bright, succulent and fruity. Raspberry and mandarin are the ideal counterpoints to bergamot for an irresistibly charming scent. Heart notes are warm and layered. The spicy heat offered by pepper is balanced by the lushness of magnolia and vetiverÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s dry woody scent. Hints of bitter chocolate weave through the base of sandalwood, amber, and musk. The perfume projects well, even during the colder months. This perfume is created for unusual woman, provocative and irresistibly charming.
Ingredients: bergamot, raspberry, orange, magnolia, black pepper, vetiver,amber, musk, sandalwood

Master perfumers Nathalie Lorson and Marie Salamagne, in collaboration with Olivier Cresp and Honorine Blanc, developed the composition. Notes of coffee, present in large quantities, dominate the scent. Additional accords are pink pepper, orange blossom, jasmine, vanilla, patchouli and cedar. The perfume comes in the bottle designed as the last editions of the Opium collection. The bottle is dark and decorated with sequins that give a glam rock look.

This set contains:
Roberto Cavalli Paradiso - 50 ml
Woody floral fragrance, a subtle aroma that makes you feel fresh with a stunning blend of citrus, jasmine, and cypress.

Name: Guerlain Le Frenchy EDP
Description: #NAME?

Description

Description:
An intoxicating blend of vanilla and floral notes with a touch of Oriental spice! Take your fragrance game to a whole new level with this one of a kind hair sensation.
Moisturize, soften and strengthen your hair with Vitamin E, a powerful antioxidant, and Provitamin B5. Give your hair that extra shine and volume that it deserves, whilst leaving your hair less prone to breakage.
How to use:
From about 20 cms away, spritz the mist evenly over your hair.
Then enjoy the V Vanille vibes!
Don't forget to shake the bottle before use to liven up the candy!
Reapply throughout the day whenever you need a dose of fabulousness!
Ingredients: pink pepper, sage, vanilla

The dry-down leaves a nice trail owning to creamy notes of sandalwood, cedar, moss, vetiver and Tonka. Classic Black is a symbol of luxury, sophistication and refinement. This versatile fragrance is suitable for daywear and nights out, for breezy fall and sunny summer. Flaunt your charisma with Classic Black from Jaguar.

Name: Bentley For Men Intense
Description: Bentley for Men Intense by Bentley is an Oriental Spicy fragrance for men that was launched in 2013. The nose behind this fragrance is Nathalie Lorson. Top notes of zesty bergamot, herbal bay leaf, and black pepper open the scent for a seductive and enticing blend that immediately catches the olfactory senses. Middle notes of invigorating cinnamon, sugary rum, African geranium, clary sage, and other woody notes incorporate an intoxicating, exotic atmosphere. Finally, base notes of heady patchouli, Oriental incense, cedar, benzoin, and potent leather close the cologne for a highly masculine and desirable aroma that no one can miss.
Ingredients: bergamot, black pepper, bay leaf,clary sage, african geranium, cinnamon, rum, woody notes,leather, benzoin, incense, cedar, patchouli

Name: Chanel Chance Eau Tendre
Description: It's a floral, fruity fragrance designed for the charming woman whose inner glow makes her more attractive. The amazing composition has notes of creamy white musk, jasmine, and grapefruit, delivering a more enveloping fragrance that expresses your confident femininity.
Ingredients: grapefruit, jasmine,hyacinth, amber, cedar, iris,white musk

Name: Lalique Lalique Le Parfum
Description: Lalique Le Parfum is an oriental perfume for women. It is a masterpiece with a very unique, classy, and elegant blend that matches the success, accomplishment and presence of a confident, sassy and delightful woman. The opening is sharp with zesty Bergamot, spicy Bay Leaves and intense Pink Peppercorn before Jasmine and Heliotrope take over, accentuated by Almond accents. The dry-down is a warm, cozy and elegant Patchouli note alleviated by beautiful, creamy Vanilla. Lalique Le Parfum is a pleasant winter daytime perfume that is a delightful mix of spicy and sweet.
Ingredients: vanilla, tonka bean, sandalwood, pink pepper, almond, patchouli, jasmine, bergamot

Name: Alexandre.J The Collector Morning Muscs
Description: This perfume is a mix between the French baroque architecture and the oriental desert. The top notes are mandarin orange, peach, grapefruit, and toffee; the heart notes are damask rose, patchouli, rose, and violet; the base notes are moss and musk. Morning Muscs mesmerizes with its charismatic sweet fruity and musk notes.
Ingredients: alcohol denat., fragrance (parfum), water (aqua), butylphenyl methylpropional, limonene, hexyl cinnamal, benzyl salicylate, citronellol, linalool, alpha-isomethyl ionone, geraniol, cinnamyl alcohol, eugenol
Middle_note: russian rose, turkish rose, patchouli, violet

Name: Al Dakheel Oud Rashoosh Bushra
Description: Bushra Rashoosh is a spray fragrance that was designed to reflect the original Arab Oud and it is made from rich Oud and a mix of lavender and roses to add a floral, sweet touch to the fragrance. It represents the Arab hospitality and generosity and fill the space with a sweet aroma.
Ingredients: unknown

Name: Mont Blanc Legend

Ingredients: bergamot, lavender, pineapple leaf, verbena, oak moss, geranium, coumarin, apple, rose, pomarosa molecule, sandalwood, tonka, evernyl
Middle_note: oak moss, geranium, coumarin, apple, rose, pomarosa molecule

Do this adventure at the beginning of the day so that your recovery and vitality will last throughout the entire day.

The parfume contains great notes that is filled with sparkling freshness and adds to women glow, femininity and attractive power. These notes are; bergamot, mandarin, scan, honey, orange blossom, rose, narcissus, hyacinth, and heliotrope notes.
Ingredients: bergamot, mandarin, honey, jasmine, rose oil, black orchid, orchid, orange buds, magnolia, sapphires, narcissus and heliotrope, peru balsam, adan, sandalwood, suede and vanilla.

Name: Coach For Men
Description: Launched in 2017 and featuring actor James Franco as the face of the fragrance, Coach for men, by Coach, is meant for the modern and sophisticated man. This elegant cologne starts with citrus top notes of pear, bergamot, and kumquat and then blends perfectly into middle notes of cardamom, geranium, and coriander. Base notes include ambergris, Haitian vetiver, and suede. The woody scent is both clean and spicy, creating a fragrance that works in the board room or on a playful night out. It's also is the perfect choice for warm weather.
Ingredients: pear, bergamot, kumquat, grapefruit, lavender, cardamom, coriander, geranium, haitian vetiver, suede, ambergris, amberwood.

Name: Coach Floral

The fragrance opens with notes that will excite your senses and consist of pink peppercorn, citrus Coeur and pineapple sorbet. The heart notes are what give this perfume its name and are gardenia, rose tea and jasmine sambac. The fragrance then settles into the base notes of patchouli, musk and creamy wood. The rounded glass bottle is adorned with the emblem of the brand and a pale pink flower hangs off the neck.
Ingredients: citruses , pineapple , pink pepper , tea rose , jasmine sambac , gardenia , patchouli , woody notes , musk .

The classy and masculine scent is befitting of your perfect summer night. Sweetness mixed with spiciness makes the perfume irresistible. The final notes evoke nostalgia with refined leather notes smoothly blended with incense and GaÃƒÂ¯ac wood. This divine, classy scent is perfect for cool months and special evenings. Guerlain Oud Essentiel conquers the senses, opens the heart and uplifts the spirit.

The fantastic heart encompasses creamy tuberose, fresh and sparkling orange blossom, serene lily-of-the-valley and sensual rose. The dry down is warm and cozy with musk, cashmere wood, heliotrope, and white amber. Blanc is a fragrance that embodies the traits of the color white, intoxicating, joyful and fresh.

Name: Dior Sauvage EDP
Description: The powerful freshness of Sauvage EDP by Dior exudes new sensual and mysterious facets, sufficiently renewing itself with the signature of an ingenious composition. Calabrian bergamot, as juicy and spirited as ever, invites new spicy notes to add fullness and sensuality, as the woody ambery trail of Ambroxan is wrapped in the smoky accents of Papua New Guinean vanilla absolute for greater virility. FranÃƒÂ§ois Demachy, Dior Perfumer, drew inspiration from the desert in the magical hour of twilight. Mixed with the coolness of the night, the burning desert air exudes profound fragrances. In the hour when the wolves come out and the sky is set ablaze, a new magic unfolds.
Ingredients: bergamot,lavender, nutmeg, sichuan pepper, star anise,vanilla, ambroxan
Middle_note: lavender, nutmeg, sichuan pepper, star anise

Ingredients: black pepper, ginger, black basil, saga, cedarwood, amber, patchouli, brazilian redwood

Description: Givenchy is launching a new fragrance Dahlia Divin in September of 2014. Dahlia Divin follows the theme and the fantasy of the Dahlia Noir line that was started in 2011. Dahlia Divin's composition is centered around a Sambac jasmine note on a woody-chypre base. It was created by perfumer Francois Demachy. Mirabelle plum is at the opening, leading way to the heart of Sambac jasmine and white flowers. The base is woody, made of sandalwood, vetiver and patchouli.
Ingredients: blood orange, peach, black currant,jasmine, rose,amber accord

Name: Givenchy Dahlia Divin
Description: GivenchyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s new fragrance, Dahlia Divin, preserves the spirit of the Dahila Noir line while standing out with its floral woody combination. The opening is fruity with the distinct aromas of jasmine and plum. The Jasmin sambac fills the air minutes after. Wearing Givenchy will give you a fragrant aura. The scent is lush and feminine. It is a must-have for the summer. This fragrance is perfect for every occasion due to its smooth and sweet lingering effect. It is casual but elegant, soft but impactful. Luxurious in its simplicity and divine in its balance.
Ingredients: blood orange, peach, black currant,jasmine, rose,sandalwood, musk, vanilla, petchouli

The dry-down is an elegant combination of sandalwood, musk, vetiver and frangipani. Cabotine Rose by Perfumes Gres is for a bubbly woman who likes, just like all girls, to have fun.

Description

Name: Davidoff Hot Water
Description:
This oriental highly masculine fragrance is bold and thrilling. The top notes feature basil blended with wormwood, flowing into the heart that contains paprika and patchouli. The base has notes of benzoin and styrax, making it a perfect scent for your evening events.
About the brand
Davidoff has received acclaim since it introduced its first fragrance in 1988. The brand was founded in Switzerland and has been known for luxurious accessories like watches and leather goods. It offered popular fragrances for men and women.

Name: Dunhill Desire Extreme

The blood orange top note provides an energizing splash of citrus. Both refreshing and invigorating, it opens one to the possibilities that lay ahead. Evergreen cypress lends a deep earthiness, grounding the blood orange with a sense of strength and fortitude. Finally, a rich amber ends the scent motif with a musky sweetness. Desire Extreme is a fragrance for any occasion that calls for cool, unparalleled confidence.

It is distinguished by a lush bouquet of sensual fruits, including raspberries and pears. The juicy scent is warmed by the indulgent, sweet heliotrope flower and a seductive base of musk.
Ingredients: passionfruit, peach, raspberry, cassis, pear, sand, lily-of-the-valley, heliotrope, sandalwood, vanilla, patchouli, musk.
Top_note: passionfruit, peach, raspberry, cassis, pear, sand

Description: This sweet, fruity perfume is inspired by the enchanted potions of Goddess Circe. Its scent guides you through mythic paths to explore stunning marvels. Name: Guerlain L'instant De Guerlain
Description: Guerlain L'instant De Guerlain is a woody, aromatic fragrance for men. It is a scent that emits power and elegance; a scent that brings together exuberant virility and delicate femininity. The Indian vetiver highlights this scent. This scent embraces paradoxes in its dazzling collection of perfectly balanced scents. The opening notes are bergamot, star anise, lemon, pepper and citrus. At the heart there are jasmine, tea, hibiscus and smoke. The base notes are the rich sandalwood and the unique patchouli. Guerlain L'instant De Guerlain is a very unique and elegant scent to wear.
Ingredients: star anise, bergamot, grapefruit, jasmine, lemon,lavender, sandalwood, tea, cedar,hibiscus seed, musk, cocoa, patchouli
Top_note: star anise, bergamot, grapefruit, jasmine, lemon

Name: Deem Perfumes Garden
Description: Deem Perfumes Garden is a room spray that spreads enticing fragrance in the air and let you enjoy the fresh and aromatic atmosphere.
Ingredients: tuberose, iris, jasmine, aromatic ingredients

Name: Valentino Uomo
Description: Valentino Uomo Eau de Toilette is a fresh fragrance for men, presented in a magnificent bottle. This modern scent is developed for a cosmopolitan man celebrating his youthful vigor and exciting ventures. The fragrance has a bright opening with bergamot and myrtle. The heart is youthful and romantic with roasted coffee beans and chocolate perfectly blended and accentuated by the aroma of hazelnut. The dry-down is sweet, warm and leathery with cedar and leather notes. Valentino Uomo, the scent of irresistible sophistication, is the perfect fit for your romantic endeavors and special nights.
Ingredients: bergamot, myrtle ,roasted coffee beans, chocolate, hazelnut ,leather, cedar

Name: Bentley Infinite Intense
Description: Become an unstoppable force when you splash on Bentley Infinite Intense, an invigorating menÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s cologne. This sensual blend of spicy and earthy accords is a masterful accent to any ensemble, whether casual or refined. Top notes of black pepper, delicate lavender, soothing violet, and geranium work together to form a balanced mix of intensity and relaxation, while heart notes of elemi resin, salty ambergris, benzoin, and exotic nutmeg bring their bold aromas. Finally, base notes of Haitian vetiver, patchouli extract, Moroccan cedar, and other various wood accents blend seamlessly for a robust and mysterious fragrance youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll be proud to sport, day or night.
Ingredients: black pepper, lavender, violet, geranium, spices, nutmeg, elemi resin, ambergris, patchouli, haitian vetiver, musk, cedar.
Top_note: black pepper, lavender, violet leaf absolute, geranium bourbon
Middle_note: nutmeg, elemi, slam benzoin, ambergris accord
Base_note: patchouli, vetiver from haiti, moss, moroccan cedarwood

Name: Cartier Pasha Noire
Description: Wearing Pasha de Cartier Noire means sporting a fragrance that has a cool elegance and the power of seduction. Cartier has created a new edition of the legendary Pasha de Cartier fragrance. This charismatic cologne combines the bright freshness of juicy citrus top notes and bracing mint with intensely masculine base notes of cedarwood and amber. The scent is softened by the inclusion of watery accords and a light bouquet of florals, delicate iris, earthy violet, and sweet heliotrope. A dash of spicy black pepper and warm cloves provide a memorable finishing touch. This fragrance comes packaged in a suave matte black bottle with a bright silver stopper.
Ingredients: green citrus,woody amber,cedar accords

Description: Wearing Pasha de Cartier Noire means sporting a fragrance that has a cool elegance and the power of seduction. The perfume has accords of Tunisian Orange, Sambac Jasmine, Peach, Jasmine Tea in top notes. The heart notes have accords of Jasmine, Magnolia Blossom, and Rose petals. A beautiful, fresh and soft scent, it makes you feel feminine and fresh. Rose, Jasmine and orange blossom are at the floral opening. The heart is lavish with cherry, apple and blackcurrant. White amber and white musk the base unusually deep. The bottle is a gorgeous match of the stunning perfume. Guerlain La Petite Robe Noire Ma Robe Cocktail is a fresh and youthful fragrance. It is effervescent and sweet. On fall and spring nights, it adds a feel of desired warmth. With this terrific fragrance, nothing can stop you.

The base notes contain Sandalwood and Vetiver.
Ingredients: pineapple, melon, grapefruit, peony, ginger, orchid, peach, sandalwood, vetiver.

Name: Jaguar Classic Red
Description: Jaguar Classic Red is a floral-fruity and woody fragrance for men. The scent is warm, sweet, fruity, deep, long-lasting, characterful, and unique. Classic Red is created for a man living for the thrill. The fragrance opens with a delicious blend of raspberry, bergamot and blueberry, which are settled in the heart with pepper, jasmine and ozone. The scent blends pleasantly with the woody notes at the base and produces an enticing dry-down. Patchouli lingers along with powdery amber, vanilla musk, cedar and Tonka. Make a spectacular daily presence with this attractive addition to the Jaguar line.
Ingredients: raspberry, blueberry, bergamot, jasmine, black pepper, patchouli, cedar, amber, tonka bean, vanilla
Middle_note: jasmine leaves, bay and hot pepper oil, ozonic accord

Name: Azzaro Wanted

The composition has a fresh minty and lemony opening with sharp hints of ginger touched by the warm scent of lavender. The heart is pleasant with the spicy aura of Guatemalan cardamom and juniper. The juiciness of green apple and geranium rush through enhancing the heart before the base notes take over and produce a breathtaking combination of sweet Tonka bean, smoky Haitian vetiver and warm amberwood.
Ingredients: lemon, ginger, lavender, mint,guatemalan cardamom, juniper, apple, geranium,vetiver, tonka bean, amberwood

The fragrance opens up with a burst of bergamot and the unique scent of rice flower swaying in the airy and dewy green notes. The heart is rich with fresh lotus, spicy ginger and a wonderful mix of lily and orchid. The dry-down is subtle and sexy with creamy sandalwood, a touch of amber and spicy musk. Arden Beauty is an intriguing scent that is perfect for work and official settings.
Ingredients: iris, bergamot, rice flower, green notes, orchid, ginger, rhubarb, lotus, lily, sandalwood, amber, musk.

It features leather notes in the opening, leading to Patchouli and Cypress at the heart blended with woody notes and vetiver at the base. All the components remain unchanged from the first time you apply on your skin.

Name: Dunhill Icon Racing
Description: Dunhill Icon Racing for men was released in 2017 and is a thrilling aromatic fragrance that represents the excitement and speed of British racing. The cologne opens with the top notes of cardamom, grapefruit, and bergamot. It then transitions into the middle notes of lavender, pepper, and orange blossom. The base notes add a touch of complexity with hints of musk, vetiver, and guaiac wood. The cologne is moderately long-lasting, so it will survive most events without wearing out its welcome, and it has a moderate sillage so the scent will certainly entice those around you but wonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t fill the room with an overpowering scent.
Ingredients: bergamot, grapefruit, cardamom,orange blossom, lavender, black pepper,gaiac wood, vetiver, musk

This posh and luxurious amber-based scent has a leathery-woody opening with a blast of oud. The masculine accords of cedar and sandalwood occupy the heart surrounded by a playful hint of red berries. Patchouli and saffron add a rich and sensual air to the heart before oud strikes back again in the base along with geranium. Amber is divine as it blends smoothly with the other notes giving a gorgeous luxurious vibe and a cozy scent.

The sexy signature fragrance enhanced with masculine woody notes promises subtle and rare sophistication. It brings back memories of long forgotten memories and lost places. Name: Elizabeth Arden 5Th Avenue
Description: 5th Avenue fragrance is the symbol of wealth. This floral perfume is for the intelligent, successful and elegant woman who has a unique sense of style. 5th Avenue celebrates a womanÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s justified dreams and ambitions, infinite possibilities and unlimited power. This signature perfume opens with fresh lemon notes, a splash of mandarin, and a light violet scent; all of which are enveloped in ozonic notes. Name: Who Am I Just Right EDP

Descritpion:
Who Am I? In this modern world, who do I choose to be in this chaos! I am the line between aquatic freshness & forest depths. I draw Just the Right balance blending bergamot, marine acqua & oakmoss in a harmonious combination. Because I choose to be Just Right! Exclusive only at Golden Scent.

Name: Dunhill Custom
Description: Dunhill Custom was released in 2011 to appeal to a younger audience while holding to its classic heritage. The scent is straightforward and masculine, crafted from a relatively small range of scent notes. The opening features the crisp/tart of an English Pippin apple, starting fresh and gentling into a caramelized sweetness that reminds you of aged cognac. As the fragrance unfolds, pepper adds some spice to the top note. The base notes of cedar and incense wrap the fragrance in a hint of wood smoke thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s ideal for cozy evenings with someone special. The scent is restrained but never loses that distinctive appeal. Wear Dunhill Custom as your go-to cool-weather fragrance.
Ingredients: apple, fruity notes,black pepper,frankincense, cedarwood

Name: Dunhill Desire Black
Description: Introduced in 2014, Desire Black is a timeless Oriental cologne for men. Spicy, peppery notes dominate the opening of this masculine scent. Bergamot and grapefruit lend their clean, tart aroma for a classically male fragrance. The heart notes of rose, saffron, and cypress offer an intriguing blend of leather, lemon, and moist earthiness. This combination is long-lasting without overpowering the senses. Frankincense, amber, and vetiver provide a warm, dry base with subtle hints of smooth, powdery vanilla. This scent is somewhat dark and serious. Appropriate for the office or casual wear.
Ingredients: black pepper, bergamot, grapefruit, petitgrain,saffron, cypress, turkish rose,vetiver, arabic frankincense, persian amber

Name: Dunhill Desire
Description: Introduced in 2000, Desire for men, by Alfred Dunhill, is a confident, masculine scent for the new millennium. The top notes of heady bergamot, fresh lemon, orange blossoms, and crisp apple are assertive and sharp with a slightly astringent note. Patchouli is the dominant heart tone, with the fantasy scent of teak wood and lemony rose, balancing its deep, exotic earthiness. Sweet vanilla and earthy musk highlight the teak wood and mesh together for a warm, rich fragrance that lends a sense of mystery as it lingers on the skin.
Ingredients: apple, bergamot, green lemon, neroli,patchouli, rose, teakwood,labdanum, musk, vanilla

The light top notes of lavender and bergamot may seem odd for a menÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s cologne, but they are perfectly offset by bolder heart notes of juniper, nutmeg, and cumin. The blending of the light and bold notes results in an aroma that is both elegant and intense. The base notes round out the final scent by including aromatic patchouli, sandalwood, and cedarwood.

Name: Cartier Declaration Essence Cartier
Description: Declaration Essence by Cartier is a Citrus Aromatic fragrance for men. Declaration Essence was launched in 2001. The fragrance opens up with notes of lemon and lime in an energetic and zesty atmosphere, while giving way for orange blossom and tea leaf to wind down their intensity with something more smooth and floral. Red geranium and lavender continue the botanical trend, while warm amber and sensual musk institute a seductive element thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s robust and charming. Finally, vetiver and sandalwood lend their earthy sweetness for an overall light and airy cologne that brings to mind long walks through rural settings.
Ingredients: bergamot, orange, cedar,birch, oakmoss, cardamom,moss, rosewood, vetiver

Name: Cartier Declaration Essence Cartier
Description: Declaration Essence by Cartier is a Citrus Aromatic fragrance for men. Declaration Essence was launched in 2001. The fragrance opens up with notes of lemon and lime in an energetic and zesty atmosphere, while giving way for orange blossom and tea leaf to wind down their intensity with something more smooth and floral. Red geranium and lavender continue the botanical trend, while warm amber and sensual musk institute a seductive element thatâ€™s robust and charming. The fragrance opens sweet and citrusy with citrus notes and violet leaf before fading into a spicy heart composed of ginger, beautiful cardamom, sparkling pink pepper and a hint of lavender. The dry-down is warm, soothing and woodsy with Guaiac wood and benzoin giving the scent a smoky aura. Celebrate your manliness and accomplishments with this complex and refined scent. Be the gentleman you aspire to be with Passenger, a rich, long-lasting and novel scent.

Description: Passenger for Women by S.T. Dupont is a women fragrance that celebrates the original S.T. Dupont scent. The fragrance opens with an opulent fruity explosion consisting of citrusy bergamot and green mandarin softened by pear notes and earthy black current. The heart consists of cyclamen, creamy gardenia, and romantic rose giving the heart a sensual feel. The dry-down is a sweet and luxurious combination of powdery iris, sexy sandalwood and velvety musk. Passenger for Women is a long-lasting, feminine and elegant perfume presented in a exquisite bottle. Spoil yourself with this breathtaking scent.

Rich and warm, the dry-down includes sweet amber, smooth patchouli, pleasant vanilla and spicy cedar. Essence Pure Pour Femme by S.T. Dupont is a fantastic, sophisticated and feminine fragrance presented in a classic bottle. Wear this long-lasting scent to your special occasions. Perfect for winter.

The fragrance opens sharply with a mixture of tasty black currant, delicious passion fruit, fresh melon, fine mandarin orange, bitter green galbanum and sour lemon. Blooms of jasmine and magnolia shine at the heart, elegantly topped off by orchid. An unmistakable and eternal blend of vibrant cyclamen, fresh magnolia, strong carnation, sweet gardenia, radiant ylang-ylang, serene lily-of-the-valley and lovely rose. The dry-down is sexy and warm with sandalwood, amber, patchouli, musk, oakmoss, cedar and Brazilian rosewood blended harmoniously. S.T. Dupont pour Femme is a noble, elegant and feminine gem for special occasions.
Ingredients: black currant, passionfruit, melon, mandarin orange, galbanum, lemon,cyclamen, magnolia, carnation, gardenia, orchid, jasmine, ylang-ylang, lily-of-the-valley, rose,sandalwood, amber, patchouli, musk, oakmoss, cedar, brazilian rosewood.

Base_note: sandalwood, amber, patchouli, musk, oakmoss, cedar, brazilian rosewood.

Description: An aromatic citrus fragrance with medium stability and aroma, which is very wonderful in the summer period and gives you a refreshing and lively dose, suitable for romantic and intimate moments, with a mixture of lemon, lily of the valley and musk.

Description: Etienne Aigner Pour Femme radiates with unique and harmonious essences that accentuate femininity, sensibility, and elegance of a lady. This fragrance aims to reflect the quality and style of the brand. Top notes encompass fine, spicy tacts of black pepper, fresh dew drops, bergamot, and mandarin. The heart intertwines Bulgarian rose, freesia and fruity taste of apricot, while the base is built around fines notes of amber, patchouli, white musk, and woody cedar. Its woody-oriental finish closes down with gourmand almond aroma. The flacon has the same form as the violet Starlight edition, and the advertising poster is made in a similar style.
Ingredients: black pepper, dew drops, bergamot, mandarin,bulgarian rose, freesia, aprictot,amber, patchouli, white musk, woody cedar

Name: Angel Schlesser Pour Elle
Description: A floral fragrance with bergamot that mixes with mandarin, red berries and grapefruit. It blends with jasmine, orange blossom, peony and pear. This scent combines with patchouli, votive, dark chocolate, vanilla and Tonka bean that gives you joyful and fresh sense. This fragrance comes in an elegant package to complete your luxury.
Ingredients: bergamot, mandarin, grapefruit, cherry, pear, peony, orange blossom, jasmine, tonka bean, vanilla, dark chocolate, vetiver
Base_note: tonka beans, vanilla, dark chocolate, vetiver

Name: Montale Vanilla Extasy
Description: Vanilla Extasy by Montale is a feminine oriental vanilla fragrance crafted by famous perfumer Pierre Montale. It was launched in the year 2008. The top notes of the perfume are apricot and apricot blossom; heart notes are ylang-ylang, jasmine, and vanilla; base notes are sandalwood, resins, benzoin, and mahogany.
Ingredients: apricot, apricot blossom, jasmine, ylang ylang, amber, benzoin, vanilla, mahogany, sandalwood

Name: Montale Pure Gold
Description: Pure Gold by Montale belongs to the Golden Selection collection of the same brand. It is crafted by Pierre Montale and launched in the year 2009. The fragrance has notes of neroli, Egyptian jasmine, Italian tangerine, white musk, apricot, patchouli, and vanilla. The main accords of the perfume are white floral, musky, citrus, fruity, and patchouli.
Ingredients: orange blossom, neroli, jasmine, mandarin, apricot, white musk, vanilla, patchouli

Name: Givenchy Very Irresistible
Description: Very Irresistible is an exhilarating perfume that combines a plethora of rose notes mixed with green and aromatic accords for a delightful and luminous scent thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s sure to draw attention your way, no matter where you go. Top notes of zesty lemon verbena, crisp cassia leaf, and exotic star anise introduce the aroma with a bright, revitalizing atmosphere. Meanwhile, heart notes of flirty pink peony, rich magnolia, and various elegant rose essences take center stage with their lavish floral bouquet. Finally, the base note of vibrant taif rose wraps the entire perfume in more luxurious, feminine sophistication for a dazzling and enticing fragrance that works perfectly as a warm-weather accessory.
Ingredients: star anise,bouquet of roses,patchouli, vanilla

Name: Givenchy Very Irresistible
Description: GIVENCHY Very Irresistible a great mixture from rose, floral and soft spicy, it's an irresistible perfume and perfect to use it day and night.
Ingredients: star anise,bouquet of roses,patchouli, vanilla

Name: Montale Pink Extasy
Description: Pink Extasy by Montale is a feminine, floral, fruity fragrance created by Pierre Montale. It was launched in the year 2014. The top notes of the perfume are orange, tangerine, and black pepper; heart notes are jasmine, iris, Turkish rose, and orange blossom; base notes are white musk, peach, raspberry, and vanilla.
Ingredients: orange, tangerine, black pepper, jasmine, turkish rose, iris, orange blossom, white musk, vanilla, raspberry, peach
Middle_note: jasmine, turkish rose, iris and orange blossom
Base_note: white musk, vanilla, raspberry and peach

Name: Montale Intense Pepper
Description: Intense Pepper by Montale is a unisex oriental spicy fragrance created by famous perfumer Pierre Montale. it was launched in the year 2014. The top notes of the perfume are Sicilian lemon, pink pepper, and black pepper; heart notes are floral notes, base notes are oud, cedar, amber, oakmoss, and white musk.
Ingredients: sicilian lemon, pink pepper, black pepper, floral notes, agarwood, cedar, amber, oakmoss, white musk
Top_note: peruvian pink pepper, madagascan black pepper

Name: Montale Day Dreams
Description: Day Dreams by Montale is a unisex floral, fruity gourmand fragrance. This fragrance was launched in the year 2017. The top notes of the perfume are mandarin, orange, and orange blossom. Heart notes of the fragrance are neroli, tiare flower, and jasmine. The base notes are vanilla, sandalwood, and coconut.
Ingredients: mandarin orange, orange blossom, neroli, tiare flower, jasmine, sandalwood, vanilla, coconut.

Name: Kenzo World EDT
Description: This floral fragrance embodies excitment as it is designed for the woman who dares to be different, filling her with joy. Her need for enthusiasm attracts everyone through an amazing blend of peony, rose along with white musk and vanilla. It comes in an eye-shaped powdery pink bottle, revealing the femininity of the fragrance.
Ingredients: red fruits, peony, floral notes, egyptian jasmine, ambroxan.

Name: Montale Dark Aoud
Description: Dark Aoud by Montale is a unisex woody fragrance crafted by Pierre Montale. It was launched in the year 2011. The fragrance has notes of sandalwood and oud. The main accords of the perfume are oud, woody, balsamic, powdery, and warm spicy.
Ingredients: sandalwood and agarwood (oud)

Name: The Beautiful Mind Series Volume 1 Intelligence Fantasy
Description: It's a Natural Eau de Parfum that with a composition that begins with notes of Magnolia Bud, Hedione, Bergamot., the heart notes of Pink Pepper that represents the essence of the parfume, and the base notes of Cashmeran, Sandalwood, Cedar, Light Musk which stays with you through out the day.
Ingredients: magnolia bud, hedione, bergamot., pink pepper, cashmeran, sandalwood, cedar, light musk

Name: Montale Crystal Flowers
Description: Crystal Flowers by Montale is a unisex oriental floral fragrance which is created by Pierre Montale. It was introduced to the world in the year 2007. The fragrance has notes of mandarin orange, rose, lily-of-the-valley, amber, and musk. The main accords of the perfume are rose, musk, floral, citrus, and amber.
Ingredients: rose, lily of the valley, mandarin, amber, orange blossom, musk
Middle_note: lily of the valley, rose and orange blossom

Name: Givenchy Very Irresistible Electric Rose
Description: Very Irresistible Electric Rose is a magnetic womenÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s fragrance by Givenchy. Top notes of tart citrus lemon, fresh green basil, breezy lemon verbena and dark, sweet blueberry start the scent with a bright and energetic tone. Heart notes of dewy violet, exotic star anise and lush red rose incorporate some Oriental flair with its luscious floral and spicy bouquet. Completing the fragrance are base notes of fresh-cut cedar and pearly white musk for a sensual, feminine perfume thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s entirely seductive, charming and alluring. Perfect for casual wear during a night out on the town.
Ingredients: lemon, basil, lemon verbena, blueberry,rose, anise, violet,musk, cedar

Name: Sofia Vergara Tempting
Description: It's a Extravagant Eau de Parfum that is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women with a composition that begins with notes of Acai Berry, Mandarin Blossom, Pineapple, the heart notes of Star Jasmine, Vanilla Orchid, Passion Flower that represents the essence of the parfume, and the base notes of Sandalwood, Musk, Vanilla which stays with you through out the day.
Ingredients: acai berry, mandarin blossom, pineapple, star jasmine, vanilla orchid, passion flower, sandalwood, musk, vanilla
Middle_note: star jasmine, vanilla orchid, passion flower

Name: Montale Aoud Melody
Description: Aoud Melody by Montale belongs to oud-agar inspired fragrances. It was crafted by famous perfumer Pierre Montale and launched in the year 2014. The top notes are intense oud with a blend of leather, spices like cloves, saffron, and elemi resins. Heart notes are rose, jasmine, and ylang-ylang, while base notes are amber, musk, and sandalwood.
Ingredients: agarwood, leather, cloves, saffron, elemi, rose, ylang-ylang, jasmine, sandalwood, amber, musk
Top_note: montale aoud melody provide intense oud notes mixed with lather and spices with cloves, saffron and elemi resins
Middle_note: bouquet of roses, jasmine and ylang-ylang resting on a warm and creamy

Name: Salvatore Ferragamo Amo Ferragamo
Description: Salvatore Ferragamo Amo Ferragamo is a feminine oriental floral fragrance launched in the year 2018. It was crafted by Marie Salamagne. The top notes of the fragrance are Campari, rosemary and black currant, heart notes are jasmine sambac, rhubarb, and mate, base notes are sandalwood, ambroxan, and Tahitian vanilla.
Ingredients: campari,black currant,rosemary,sambac jasmine,mate,rhubarb,tahitian vanilla,ambroxan,sandalwood.

Name: Montale Aoud Ever
Description: Aoud Ever by Montale has a woody aromatic fragrance. It is a unisex fragrance crafted by Pierre Montale. Aoud Ever was launched in the year 2012. The top notes are oud, citron, bergamot, and Calabrian mandarin; heart notes are vetiver, white sandalwood, patchouli, and black pepper; base notes are leather, Tonka beans, and ambergris.
Ingredients: agarwood,citron,bergamot,calabrian mandarin,vetiver,white sandalwood,patchouli,black pepper,leather,ambergris,tonka bean.
Top_note: agarwood (oud), citron, bergamot and calabrian mandarin
Middle_note: vetiver, white sandalwood, patchouli and black pepper

Name: Montale Amber & Spices
Description: Amber and Spices by Montale resonates oriental dry heat with its woody notes. It was crafted by Pierre Montale and launched in the year 2009. The top notes are rose and nutmeg, and heart notes are agar and cumin; base notes are ebony, sandalwood, and amber. The main accords of perfume are fresh spicy, woody, oud, amber, and rose.
Ingredients: nutmeg, rose, agarwood, caraway, sandal wood, ebony wood, amber

Name: S.T.Dupont Special Edition Pour Femme
Description: Special Edition Pour Femme by S.t Dupont is a limited edition perfume for women, presented in a feminine pink bottle. This fragrance is floral and fruity to suit the style of the cosmopolitan woman. The fragrance has a fruity opening with fresh aromas of lemon, soft pear notes and lavish black current aromas. The captivating opening gives way to a delicate heart of flowers. The floral mid-phase is a combination of smooth jasmine, sensual rose and radiant ylang-ylang. The dry-down is a marvelous mixture of rich musk, powdery patchouli and sweet vanilla.
Ingredients: pear,black currant,lemon tree,lemon blossom,rose,jasmine,ylang-ylang,musk,vanilla,patchouli.
Middle_note: peony, jasmine, lily of the valley, magnolia

Name: Mont Blanc Lady Emblem L'eau
Description: This amazing perfume is for women with a floral and fruity aroma. It was launched in 2017. High notes consist of white peach, litchi, mandarin leaf, bergamot, and orange; central notes consist of rose, jasmine, magnolia, pear, and peony; bottom notes consist of resins, musk, cedar, and cashmere.
Ingredients: mandarin leaf, white peach, litchi, rose, magnolia, cedar, musk, resins

Name: Calvin Klein Ck All
Description: Bring together an aromatic table for women and men filled with many varieties of fresh and light citrus that stimulate the senses, an experience worth the adventure in the summer
Ingredients: mandarin orange, bergamot, grapefruit blossom,jasmine, lily, rhubarb, freesia,amber,musk, vetiver.

Name: Michael Kors Wonderlust Sensual Essence
Description: Wonderlust Sensual Essence is an Oriental Floral fragrance for women inspired by the exhilaration of a new adventure. It combines notes of pear, black cherry, orange blossom, amber and cashmere wood. These components give a charming, sensual indulgence and cosy essence.
Ingredients: pink pepper, pear, sour cherry, peony, jasmine, orange blossom, amber, cashmere wood, suede.
Top_note: pink pepper, pear, sour cherry and peony

Name: Michael Kors Glam Ruby
Description: Glam Ruby parfume for women is inspired by the beauty and attractiveness of Ruby stone. It is suitable for romantic evenings because of its bold sensuality. The smell of the freshly cut apricot provides the parfume with exotically feminine allure, while cashmere woods delivers a luxuriously warm finish.
Ingredients: raspberry, apricot, cashmere woods.

Name: Michael Kors Exotic Blossom
Description: Exotic Blossom Eau de Parfum is a fruity sweet popular parfume that designed for women to transport them to a tropical oasis with its hypnotic aroma. It combines mango and rose notes for a vibrant scent, while woodsy musk delivers a warmth of carefree days.
Ingredients: mango, rose petals, musk.
Base_note: sleek woods, musk, touch of vanilla

Name: S.T.Dupont Noble Wood
Description: Noble Wood by S.T. Dupont is a new oriental unisex fragrance. This scent is, like its name, noble, magnificent and alluring. The elegant composition starts with sparkling pink pepper and invigorating bergamot before it develops into smooth woody notes mixed with aromatic sandalwood, powdery patchouli and spicy Frankincense in the heart. The base emits balsamic sweetness from benzoin. The rich and intense amber dancing in the woody aromas leaves a sweet scent that would soon mingle in your skin. Noble Wood with its tall and exquisite bottle is ideal for fall and winter occasions.
Ingredients: pink pepper, bergamot,frankincense, sandalwood, patchouli,amber, woods, benzoin

Name: Marina De Bourbon Royal Marina Intense
Description: This floral oriental fragrance symbolizes to the femininity and elegant touches to show your beauty in a special evening.
Ingredients: acai berry, narcissus, jasmine, iris, tonka bean, patchouli, vanilla, musk.

Name: Marina De Bourbon Cristal Royal Rose
Description: This refreshing floral fragrance fills you with a joyful and delightful scent that inspires you with its an amazing mixture of pears, freesia, peach and musk.
Ingredients: lemon , pear , rose , freesia , violet , peach , ambroxan , musk , cedar .

Name: Mancera Roses Jasmine
Description: The perfumer Pierre Mancera presents Roses Jasmine which hits you first with notes of Mandarin, Pear, Citrus from Calabria and then sneaks on you with Jasmine, French Rose, Orange Blossom & Leaves of Patchouli with the base notes of Cedarwood, Oakmoss, White Musk, which lingers on with you the whole day long with chypre floral fragrance.
Ingredients: mandarin, pear, citrus from calabria, jasmine, french rose, orange blossom & leaves of patchouli, cedarwood, oakmoss, white musk
Middle_note: jasmine, french rose, orange blossom & leaves of patchouli.

Name: Mancera Indian Dream
Description: hurry up and get this unique feminine perfume, which the white floral, woody and vanilla mixture, in a way that reflects your self-confidence and vitality.
Ingredients: geranium , heliotrope , orange blossom , jasmine , amber , rose , sandalwood , white musk , vetiver , vanilla .

Name: Ralph Lauren Safari
Description: It's a Extravagant Eau de Parfum that is inspired by American life and symbolizes the spirit of freedom, adventure, and the joy of discovery with a composition that begins with notes of Galbanum, Mandarin, Hyacinthion, the heart notes of Rose, Lily Of The Valley, Narcissus, Iris that represents the essence of the parfume, and the base notes of Vetiver, Moss, Tonka Bean, Styrax which stays with you through out the day.
Ingredients: orange,black currant,tagetes,mandarin orange,narcissus,galbanum,hyacinth,cassis,rosemary,orange blossom,orris root,italian jasmine,rose,sandalwood,amber,patchouli,vetiver,cedar.
Middle_note: rose, lily of the valley, narcissus, iris

Name: Mancera Amber & Roses
Description: This floral musky fragrance is characterized by bold, sensual notes that make it year-round wearable. Sicilian lemon come at the top, giving a way to each of the roses, jasmine and labdanum at the heart, while the base has notes of white musk blended with amber.
Ingredients: lemon, rose, amber, labdanum, white musk

Name: Justin Bieber Justin Bieber's Girlfriend
Description: Girlfriend by Justin Bieber parfume is seducing and extravagant, Girlfriend is a parfume for women who want to feel the power and emotion of a first love. This modern fragrance blends extreme feminine notes into a sweet mix that gloats everyone you meet.
Ingredients: mandarin, blackberry, strawberry, pear, pink freesia, star jasmine, apricot, orange blossoms, vanilla orchid, musk, white amber
Middle_note: pink freesia, star jasmine, apricot, orange blossoms

Name: Parfums Gres Cabotine Gold
Description: Cabotine Gold by Perfumes Gres is a limited edition perfume for women presented in a unique, elegant and colorful bottle. This perfume is developed for a groovy, chic and beguiling woman. The fragrance opens with a delightful fruity mixture of mandarin orange, pink pepper softened by melon. The floral heart encompasses jasmine, Tiare flower and peony. The base is earthy with vetiver, patchouli and amber. Cabotine Gold is an uplifting scent for a more confident and poised presence. This fancy fragrance is perfect for summer. Spice up your collection with beautiful scent and gorgeous bottle.
Ingredients: melon, pink pepper, mandarin orange ,peony, tiare flower, jasmine,amber, vetiver, patchouli

Name: Moschino Pink Fresh Couture
Description: The first thing shoppers are sure to notice about Moschino Pink Fresh Couture is its interestingly ironic packaging. However, this Moschino creation has much more to offer than just an original exterior. The contents contain a one-of-a-kind fragrance thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s well-liked among perfume aficionados worldwide. The top notes include black currant, pink grapefruit, and lily-of-the-valley. The core notes consist of pomegranate, pink hyacinth, and heady rose. Base notes of ambroxan, cedar and musk wrap up the experience and add a bit of smoothness to the otherwise sweet mixture. Moschino Pink Fresh Couture has a soft sillage despite the number of notes involved in the mixture and offers a very long-lasting wear time.
Ingredients: pink grapefruit, black currant, lily-of-the-valley, rose, pomegranate, pink hyacinth, musk, ambroxan, cedar.

Name: Chanel Coco EDT
Description: A wonderful women's perfume that contains amazing ingredients that increase your confidence with every whiff, with a great mix of mimosa, peach and amber.
Ingredients: coriander, mandarin orange, peach, jasmine, bulgarian rose, mimosa, cloves, orange blossom, clover, rose, labdanum, amber, sandalwood, tonka bean, opoponax, civet, vanilla.

Middle_note: mimosa, cloves, orange blossom, clover, rose
Base_note: labdanum, amber, sandalwood, tonka bean, opoponax, civet, vanilla.

Name: Oscar De La Renta Oscar Velvet Noir
Description: It's an Eau de Parfum that has a floral, woody and musk scents that make it a unique fragrance for women with top notes of Sweet Orange, Ginger, Jasmine, Tunisian Orange Blossom that will grab your attention immediately, the heart notes of Violet, Rose, Osmanthus that represents the essence of the parfume, and the base notes of Musk, Amber, Oud which will linger on with you through out the day
Ingredients: sweet orange, ginger, jasmine, tunisian orange blossom violet, rose, osmanthus musk, amber, oud
Top_note: sweet orange, ginger, jasmine, tunisian orange blossom

Name: Escada Delicate Notes
Description: Duplicate the soul of spring breeze with Especially Escada Delicate Notes, for daytime & night use. A soft base of musk enhances the blended memorable fragrance that won't be forgotten. Enjoy this unique blend of notes in an airy, fresh, and light version of the Escada, which is based on the note of rose. The fragrance is chic and refined for a pleased girl, springtime, and good mood.
Ingredients: grapefruit, pear, japanese rose, rose, imbrette, ylang-ylang, woody, musk

Name: Carven Dans Ma Bulle
Description: A floral oriental fragrance is full of fantasy that mixes Parisian chic and relaxation. This fragrance combines a fresh fruity scent of Litchi Rose with a soft feminine scent of Jasmine Sambac that leaves y natural look and elegant sensuality.
Ingredients: bergamot, mandarin, peony, rose, litchi, lemon, jasmine sambak, lily of the valley, succulent notes, green notes, canadian almonds, pears, peaches, amber woods, vanilla, sandalwood, patchouli
Top_note: bergamot, mandarin, peony, rose, litchi, lemon
Middle_note: clematis, jasmine lily of the valley, sweet notes, green notes, canadian almonds, pears, peaches

Name: Escada Especially Escada
Description: Make your good mood lasts with your gorgeous upbeat look with this feminine fragrance made by Escada, before leaving the house. This sophisticated fragrance ensures that the world notes your vibrant femininity, while moving with cheerfulness and spontaneity all day.
Ingredients: ambratte, pear, ylang-ylang, rose, water scent , musk

Name: Oscar De La Renta Bella Blanca
Description: It's an Eau de Parfum that represents the natural elegance of floral, woody and musky undertones with top notes of Pear, Green Leaves, Lily-of-the-valley that will grab your attention immediately, the heart notes of Jasmine, Rose, Orange Blossom, Tuberose that represents the essence of the parfume, and the base notes of Sandalwood, White Orris, Musk which will linger on with you through out the day
Ingredients: pear, green leaves, lily-of-the-valley jasmine, rose, orange blossom, tuberose sandalwood, white orris, musk

Name: Caron L'Eau Pure
Description: A citrus fragrance that combines with woody and spicy notes of nutmeg and cedar which leaves a fresh and natural scent. This fragrance comes with a soft and delicate touch of lemon.
Ingredients: lemon, bergamot, sea sage, coriander, nutmeg, cedarwood, guaiac wood

Name: One Direction That Moment
Description: It's an Extravagant Fruity perfume for Women that is suitable for Day occasions with a composition that begins with notes of Apple, Grapefruit, the heart notes of Violet, Jasmine that represents the essence of the perfume, and the base notes of Wood, Musk which stays with you for a long time.
Ingredients: apple, grapefruit, violet, jasmine, wood, musk

Name: Elie Saab Le Parfum Intense
Description: A feminine fragrance for each women, looks for revealing her ultimate femininty, confident stride and unique personality. Wherever you go, you will leave oriental floral scents, so that no one could forget your presense.
Ingredients: orange blossom, ylang-ylang, rose, honey, patchouli, amber

Name: DKNY Be Delicious
Description: A modern feast for the senses. Served in a sleek metal and glass apple bottle, this juicy fragrance combines the scent of apple with a sophisticated blend of exotic flowers and sensual woods. Like the city that inspired it, Be Delicious celebrates individuality with refreshing spirit.
Ingredients: unknown

Name: Britney Spears Hidden Fantasy
Description: Hidden Fantasy by Britney Spears is a floral, fruity aroma specially crafted for women. It was launched in the year 2008. The perfume is created by perfumer Rodrigo Flores-Roux. The fragrance has accords of Sweet Oranges, Grapefruit Blossom, Tangerine, Clove, Verbena, Napolitano Cake, Stargazer Lily, Sambac Jasmine, Jacaranda Wood, Vanilla Beans, Amber, and Sandalwood.
Ingredients: neroli , lemon verbena , tangerine , orange , clove, sweet notes , lily , jasmine , vanilla , woodsy notes , sandalwood , amber .
Middle_note: sensual jasmine, sweet napolitano cake, stargazer lily, jasmine, clove
Base_note: jacaranda woods, sandalwood, amber, mexican vanilla bean

Name: Dior Addict
Description: Dior Addict EDP is a sensual oriental fragrance for women. Tropical mandarin leaf is tempered with soft, juicy blackberry in the top notes. White floral middle notes include orange blossom, night-blooming cereus, and jasmine, colored with a hint of rose. Base notes blend bittersweet tonka bean with milky sandalwood and sweet vanilla, creating a rich, creamy effect. There is nothing shy or subtle about this long-lasting fragrance; with its heavy sillage, it is best worn at night. Its bold floral notes bring warmth and light to chilly evenings, so it is good for the fall and even better for winter.
Ingredients: blackberry, mandarin leaf,jasmine, queen of the night, orange blossom, rose,bourbon vanilla, sandalwood, tonka bean
Middle_note: jasmine, queen of the night, orange blossom, rose

Name: Dior Addict
Description: Dior launches Addict Eau de Toilette, a rebranded version of their original 2002 Dior Addict Eau de Parfum. This 2012 Addict Eau de Toilette featured two more editions, Dior Addict Eau Fraiche and Dior Addict Eau Sensuelle, and a year after that Dior Addict Eau Delice was also launched. Dior Addict Eau de Toilette is a fresh oriental, floral fragrance that offers notes of Sicilian mandarin in the top, Sambac jasmine and Tunisian neroli in the heart, and vanilla and sandalwood in the base.
Ingredients: sicilian mandarin,jasmine sambac, tunisian neroli,vanilla, sandalwood

Name: Britney Spears Island Fantasy
Description: Island Fantasy by Britney Spears is a sweet, floral and fruity fragrance. It opens with the accords of Watermelon, Red Berries, Citruses, Mandarin, and Clementine. The heart notes have the accords of Jasmine, Violet, and Freesia. The lower notes contain Musk and Sugar Cane.
Ingredients: citruses , clementine , mandarin orange , red berries , watermelon , jasmine , violet , freesia , musk , suger cane .
Top_note: watermelon, red berries, mandarin orange, clementine, citruses

Name: Braccialini Purple
Description: BRACCIALINI Purple is floral, fruity and sweet fragrance for women. It is the last finish that you need for a bright and fulfilling day. The fragrance opens with a delightful mixture of mandarin, airy black current and lush pear. The middle notes are a floral blend of Sambac jasmine, ylang-ylang, orange blossom and white flowers. The base contains oriental notes including amber wood, white musk and Tonka bean. Purple is a ravishing color that flatters charming gorgeous women, giving them a seductive aura. Wear this scent for romantic cool nights.
Ingredients: pear, blackcurrant, mandarin, jasmine sambac, orange blossom, ylang-ylang, amberwood, tonka bean, white musk

Name: Braccialini Pour Femme
Description: Braccialini Pour Femme an oriental fragrance for women. The scent is strong, unique, nice and long-lasting and is developed for an ambitious chic woman who relishes fashion and style. The fragrance opens with fresh green notes of bergamot blended with bright tangerine and lush red berries. The middle notes include honey aromas mixed with white flowers and juicy peach. The dry-down is powdery thanks to Florentine iris. Praline and patchouli give a warm woody trail. The yellow bottle is modern corresponding to the woman it is designed for; trendsetting and striving.
Ingredients: bergamot, tangerine, red berries, honey, peach, white flowers, rose, patchouli, praline, iris.
Middle_note: lily-of-the-valley, lotus, white wisteria, waterlily, lime blossom

Name: Braccialini Casual Pour Femme
Description: Braccialini Casual Pour Femme a floral woody musk fragrance for stylish and aspiring women. The fragrance opens fresh, rich and crispy with a mixture of bergamot, black currant and green leaves. The heart bursts with a bouquet of lily-of-the-valley, rose, ylang-ylang and jasmine. The dry-down is woodsy and musky with notes of vanilla, sandalwood, white cedar extract and musk. Braccialini Casual Pour Femme with its soft and feminine blue bottle is designed for a funky cool woman with high aspirations. Indulge in your favorite pursuits with the blue magic from Braccialini.
Ingredients: bergamot, black currant, green leaves,lily of the valley, rose, violet, jasmine, ylang-ylang,vanilla, sandalwood, white cedar, musk
Middle_note: lily of the valley, rose, violet, jasmine, ylang-ylang

Name: Dior Miss Dior
Description: Miss Dior, by Dior, was created for the elegant and spirited young woman in love. Romantic by nature, Miss Dior inspires an intense and playful love. The fragrance is characterized by an instant and captivating charm. Miss Dior is a chypre that develops step by step. It glides from the sharp charm of a fresh, fruity, citrus prelude into blossoming floral notes, then on to the noble elegance of patchouli, before finally concluding with musk, the last trace of memory. With veritable riches concealed in its heart, Miss Dior develops most intensely and astonishingly.
Ingredients: italian mandarin,arabian jasmine absolute,indonesian patchouli, musk

Name: Dior Miss Dior
Description: Miss Dior, by Dior, was created for the elegant and spirited young woman in love. Romantic by nature, Miss Dior inspires an intense and playful love. The fragrance is characterized by an instant and captivating charm. Miss Dior is a chypre that develops step by step. It glides from the sharp charm of a fresh, fruity, citrus prelude into blossoming floral notes, then on to the noble elegance of patchouli, before finally concluding with musk, the last trace of memory. With veritable riches concealed in its heart, Miss Dior develops most intensely and astonishingly.
Ingredients: tunisian neroli oil,bulgarian rose, turkish rose,indonesian patchouli

Name: Dior Pure Poison
Description: Pure Poison is a romantic perfume for sultry evenings. Bold and powerful, this 2004 release enchants with a sensual strength. Irresistible bergamot captivates at the top. Luscious and bright, it instantly draws you in. Fresh jasmine and gardenia thrust a lush powder into the fragrance. Their hypnotizing aromas create a dreamy experience. Musk, amber, and sandalwood are the base notes, layering on a luxurious cream. Pure Poison by Dior is your go-to accessory to complement your look for any evening occasion. Wear this alluring scent to seduce the object of your desire.
Ingredients: bergamot, jasmine, mandarin, orange,gardenia, neroli,sandalwood, white amber, cedar

Name: Boucheron Quatre Absolu De Nuit
Description: A soft fragrance with almond butter that mixes with bergamot and pink pepper. This fragrance combines a fresh scent of vanilla and jasmine with delicious pears and warm tonka beans that touch your heart from the first moment you use it.

Name: Bottega Veneta Knot Eau Florale
Description: A refreshing fragrance that adds vitality feeling to appear elegant in your occasions and evening parties. this fragrance mixes rose and peony with a soft smell of musk. It comes with a delicate glass bottle with a floral knot to complete your elegance.

Base_note: tonka beans, tonka beans, cedar wood

Name: Dior J'Adore
Description: The eau de parfum is the great Dior floral for women with a generous and well-balanced bouquet, and its richness is a source of inspiration. By celebrating Ylang Ylang from the Comoro This feminine fragrance is a blend of elegant florals and fresh fruits with a touch of woody and earthy notes. Its top notes include melon, peach, pear, magnolia, bergamot, and mandarin orange. Its heart consists of powerful florals with a touch of fruit and freshness. They include tuberose, orchid, lily of the valley, rose, violet, jasmine, plum, and freesia. Earthy musk, warm vanilla, aromatic cedar, and juicy blackberry form the base notes of this stunning fragrance. Sillage is moderate and longevity is high, making this the perfect perfume for a long day or evening. Wear this powerful scent for special occasions when you want to make an impression.
Ingredients: ylang-ylang,damask rose,jasmine sambac, sandalwood

Name: Beyonce Rise Beyonce
Description: Rise Eau de Parfum by BeyoncÃƒÂ© is the perfume launched in the year 2014, and the nose behind the perfume is Loc Dong. An intoxicating, addictive, and luminous floral composition that makes it perfect for a woman. The top notes contain Apricot, Italian Bergamot, and Iced Basil Sorbet. The heart notes contain Orchid, Freesia, and Sambac Jasmine Flowers. The base notes contain Autumn Woods, Cashmere, Musk, and Vetiver.
Ingredients: basil , apricot , bergamot , freesia , jasmine sambac , orchid , woodsy notes , vetiver , musk , cashmeerwood ,
Top_note: italian bergamot, golden apricot, iced basil sorbet
Middle_note: gold symphony orchid, freesia blossom, natural jasmine sambac
Base_note: autumn woods accord, cashmere musk, vetiver extract

Name: Beyonce Midnight Heat
Description: Midnight Heat Eau de Parfum by BeyoncÃƒÂ© is that perfect sensual fragrance you are searching for, a perfect synonym for passion. It embodies the excitement of hot summer nights. The top notes of the perfume contain rich, fruity flavors of plum and starfruit, Black Tulips, and Orchid. The heart notes contain Purple Peony. The base notes contain Amber, Patchouli, and Sandalwood.
Ingredients: dragonfruit, starfruit and armenian plum, purple mokara orchid, queen of the night black tulip and purple peony, warm amber, patchouli and sandalwood
Middle_note: purple mokara orchid, queen of the night black tulip and purple peony

Name: Hayari Goldy
Description: Hayari Goldy symbolizes the French-style luxury and mesmerizes with its top notes of rosemary and mugwort herb; heart notes of narcissus, jasmine; and base notes of musk, cedarwood, and sandalwood. This perfume strikes a perfect balance between extravagance and refinement.
Ingredients: artemesia, rosemary, white jasmine, narcissus, orange blossom, sandalwood, cedarwood, musk

Name: Givenchy Dahlia Divin Eau Initiale
Description: Givenchy Dahlia Divin Eau Initiale is a perfume made for women using white magnolia, the flower symbolizing purity and dignity. This fragrance is made for classy women using beautiful blend of fresh jasmines and rose petals. The opening notes are bergamot and blood orange. The heart notes are fresh magnolia, jasmine, rose and lotus; while the base notes are clean musk and sandalwood. Its light weight mingles with the skin so naturally, it becomes a part of it. This well-balanced and well-composed scent is pretty, feminine and warm. It speaks elegance and delicacy. For every special woman, there is Givenchy Dahlia Divin Eau Initiale.
Ingredients: fresh magnolia,petals of jasmine, rose,musk

Name: Elizabeth Arden Red Door
Description: Elizabeth Arden Red Door is an irresistible floral, fruity and woody fragrance. A luxurious and elegant perfume for an irresistible presence. The opening of the perfume is a promising medley of lily of the valley, freesia with a light trace of violet. The heart of the composition is accentuated by a bouquet of red roses, giving it a romantic feeling. The flower combination goes on to include delicate, fresh and fragrant Moroccan orange flower, warm and sensuous jasmine and intoxicating ylang-ylang. The floral heart gives way to a masculine and sexy base that starts with a dose of honey, a splash of oak moss and sandalwood.
Ingredients: orange blossom , plum , violet , peach , anise , rose , honey , carnation , tuberose , orchid , freesia , lily , jasmine , ylang-ylamg , lily of the vally , sandalwood , amber , musk , benzoin , vetiver , heliotrope , cedar .
Top_note: lily of the valley, freesia, wild violet
Middle_note: red roses, morocan orange flower, jasmine, ylang-ylang

Name: Balmain Extatic
Description: This floral fragrance shows the fresh green mandarin that combines with soft flowers and warm breeze of wood that adds beauty to your unique elegance which accompanies you in your steps.
Ingredients: black currant, lychee, green mandarin, mangolia, jasmine, turkish rose, musk, cedar, ambroxan

Name: DKNY Nectar Love
Description: Dkny Nectar Love is an original fragrance for women released in 2017 by American designer Donna Karan. The perfume combines floral, fruity, and fresh accords to create a scent that is reminiscent of fresh honey. It is anchored in warm, sweet base notes of beeswax, vanilla, cedar, neroli, and musk. These are followed by fresh middle notes of Mirabelle, jasmine, and lily of the valley. Finally, its top notes consist of juicy nectarine, mandarin orange, grapefruit, and yellow freesia. All of these blend together to create a unique perfume that is sweet, playful, and youthful, but still appropriate for women of almost any age.
Ingredients: solar notes , yellow freesia , nectarine ,mandarin orange, grapefruit beeswax , jasmine , lily of the valy , mirabelle , cedar , vanilla , musk , neroli .
Top_note: yellow freesia, mandarin, grapefruit, nectarine, salicylate

Name: Azzaro Mademoiselle L'Eau Tres Belle
Description: Mademoiselle L'Eau Tres Belle by AZZARO is a sweet, fruity and floral fragrance for women, presented in a gorgeous bottle. The top notes open with a miraculous scent. Blueberries unlock the fruity entrance. Red berries give out a sweet vibe. The middle phase preserves the floral notes with Jasmine and Hawthorn. The sexy base consists of purple macaroons. Mademoiselle L'Eau Tres Belle by AZZARO is a long-lasting scent that is ideal for spring and summer. Sway with confidence and style as you wear this beautiful scent to your most whimsical adventures.
Ingredients: blueberry , red berries , orange , grapefruit , jasmine , hatwthorn , peach , rose , macarons , sandalwood , caramel , violet , vanilla.

Name: Azzaro Mademoiselle
Description: Mademoiselle by Azzaro is a fresh floral and fruity fragrance presented in a pretty feminine bottle. The fragrance opens with a unique fruity vibe composed of aromatic peach and invigorating mandarin blossom. The middle notes add freshness and slight sweetness with soft peony, smooth jasmine and exquisite orange blossom. The base is mellow with orris and woody notes. AZZARO Mademoiselle is a fresh girly scent for a bubbly woman with romantic dreams. This fragrance is ideal for spring and summer. Wear Azzaro Mademoiselle for a fresh and invigorating feel and a positive aura.
Ingredients: peach, mandarin blossom , peony, jasmine, orange blossom, orris, woodynoets.

Name: Dolce & Gabbana Pour Femme
Description: A floral fragrance for women embodies the essence of the emotional, attractive and sensitive woman, from which feelings of motherhood flow, with a great blend of orange blossom, jasmine, and vanilla.
Ingredients: neroli, raspberry, tangerine, jasmine, orange blossom,marshmallow, vanilla, sandalwood, heliotrope.

Name: Aigner Starlight Gold
Description: Aigner Starlight Gold is a renovated version of the original Starlight perfume. This fragrance includes oriental notes along with the classic floral aromas to add depth to the delicacy of the original perfume. It opens with fruity top notes of plum and bergamot before revealing the middle notes of jasmine, tuberose, ylang-ylang, and violet. These floral notes are brought back down to earth with base notes of moss, amber, vanilla, and sandalwood. Aigner Starlight Gold is a white floral, woody and powdery smell, it will amaze you every time you use it, and for sure it will inspire everyone to try it.
Ingredients: bergamot , plum , champaca , jasmine , violet , rose , white orchid , tuberose , ylang-ylang , amber , sandalwood , white musk , moss , vanilla .
Middle_note: rose, violet, ylang-ylang, jasmine, tuberose, white orchid
Base_note: vanilla, sandalwood, white musk, moss, amber

Name: Adrienne Vittadini AV
Description: AV by Adrienne Vittadini is a floral fragrance for women, presented in a sensational bottle. The opening is aromatic-floral with lovely notes of bergamot, sweet cyclamen and bewitching lily-of-the-valley. The heart is a combination of floral freesia, soft may rose, warm jasmine and lovely ylang-ylang. The base has an excellent mixture of mellow orris, rich sandalwood, woody moss, sensual musk and delightful Tonka bean. The fragrance is sensual but fresh, crisp and pleasant. Feel the ocean air wearing this sexy scent. Ideal for summertime, AV is exquisite, charming and enchanting.
Ingredients: bergamot , cyclamen , lily-of-the-vally , yellow freesia, may rose, jasmine, ylang-ylang, orris , sandalwood , moss , musk , tonka bean .
Middle_note: yellow freesia, may rose, jasmine, ylang-ylang
Base_note: orris, sandalwood, moss, musk, tonka bean

Description: A fragrance with an unexpected flowers scent, for every woman who believes in luck, and in the spirit of adventure, with an amazing mixture of jasmine, vanilla, and iris.

Name: Chanel Chance EDP
Description: This chypre floral fragrance has a charming feminine scent. Its marvelous composition has notes of iris, vetiver, and white musk, providing you with a romantic fragrance for the modern woman who impresses everyone out there.

Description: An exceptional and wonderful fragrance that contains a great deal of excitement and elegance and transports you to a fictional world with its incredible scent, and combines the experiences of luxurious aromatherapy with its sparkling oriental touch and a mix of charm and mystery, with a blend of bergamot, vanilla, and white musk.

Name: Chanel Coco Noir
Description: It's an oriental woody fragrance that distinguishes itself. Its delicate composition contains notes of rose, patchouli, and white musk, delivering a simple and attractive fragrance that spreads femininity everywhere and imposes itself upon everyone who smells it.

Name: Chanel Coco EDP
Description: Oriental perfume for women with the scent of wonderful spices, and pulsating with the finest and richest notes thanks to its imaginative formula !, It is considered one of the most luxurious perfumes throughout history.

Description: Cartier La Panthere was launched by the established Cartier brand in 2014. A feline floral fragrance born out of radiant, delicate gardenia coming together with velvety notes of musk. Within the flask, a sculpture depicts the majestic, fascinating panther. The fragrance in this set contains captivating perfume that reflects a liberated, passionate woman starting with the top note of the whimsical and intoxicating gardenia flower blended with sweet rose, earthy musk, deep patchouli, and leathery oakmoss. La Panthere is a long-lasting scent accessory and features a moderate sillage thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s sure to complement any ensemble without overwhelming others.
Ingredients: apple, apricot, strawberry, rhubarb, dry fruits,gardenia,oakmoss, musk ketone
Top_note: apple, apricot, strawberry, rhubarb, dry fruits

Name: Giorgio Armani Acqua Di Gioia
Description: THE ESSENCE OF JOY. There is a charming sensation of freshness from the very first notes which are carried along in a deliciously heady current of crushed Mint, with a zest of Italian Limone Primo Fiore Femminello", harvested from the first spring blossoms in Calabria. At its base, ACQUA DI GIOIA bears the signature of water rooted in the Earth, revealed by luscious LMR Cedarwood Heart sprinkled with sensuous Brown Sugar and Labdanum, which is one of the rare plants to possess animal notes. A beautiful fresh floral fragrance ideal for the warm season.
Ingredients: mint, pink pepper, jasmine, peony, cedar, , brown sugar
Middle_note: aquatic green accord, pink pepper, jasmine sambac, peony

Name: Giorgio Armani Acqua Di Gioia
Description: In honor of the creative and successful women, this fragrance is inspired by the heart of nature and Italy's Mediterranean coast. The composition combines notes of mint in the top, peony in the heart, and cedar in the base, offering you an irresistible scent that keeps you elegant and chic with a soft touch to impress everyone there.

Armani Code for Women Eau de Toilette has the orange blossom essence replacing absolute. The clarity of this neroli is enhanced and accentuated by cyclamen, jasmine and lily-of-the-valley, a new fresh facet, crisp and radiant. From chapter to chapter, the story of Armani Code for Women continues to fascinate and seduce.

Name: L'Arc Traversee Cedre D'ifrane
Description: This fragrance honors the wintry epoch of MaÃƒÂ®tre de ClaudeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s at the heels of the Atlas Mountains in Ifran. Its blend of birch, violet and musk provides both men and women with an amazingly unique scent that complements your look and elegance.

Name: L'Arc Memoire Carnet De Voyage

Name: L'Arc Balade Tiare De Tahiti
Description: This woody floral fragrance will take you on a journey to the magical island of Tahiti. The nice combination of tangerine, jasmine and peony will take your spirits high to a level that is rarely reached, getting you on an amazing experience.
Ingredients: tangerine, rose, honeysuckle, peonies, jasmine, tiarãƒæ’ã‚â©, sandalwood, musk, patchouli

Name: L'Arc Aventure Jasmin De Kanak

The top notes of the fragrance are peach, plum, pepper, and red lily, heart notes are jasmine, peony, and ambrette, base notes are white musk, sandalwood, and ambergris. The main accords of the perfume are white floral, fruity, woody, powdery, sweet and balsamic.

Name: Loewe Quizas Seduccion

Name: Calvin Klein Euphoria Amber Gold

Name: Xerjoff Casamorati Regio

Ingredients: bergamot, grapefruit, lemon blossom, lavender, carnation, geranium, ylang ylang, cardamom, rose, plum, musk, patchouli, vanille, ambrette.

Name: Victoria's Secret Bombshell
Description: Victoria's Secret Bombshell is a parfume for women, described by the scent of fruits, orchids, vanilla and passion. The parfume is said to be an eye-catching parfume, Bombshell was developed by skilled parfumers known for crafting some of the most exciting parfumes in the world.

Name: Victoria's Secret Bombshell
Description: This is a fragrance with an award-winning wrapped and ready, with four luxe essentials in a glam gift package. Bombshell is a fruity floral fragrance with notes of purple passion fruit, Shangri-La peony, and vanilla orchid. Launched by the design house of Victoria's Secret.
Ingredients: mandarin, grapefruit, pineapple, strawberry, jasmine, red berries, lily of the valley, peony, musk vanilla orchid, woods, oakmoss, and oak moss.

Name: Rihanna Reb'l Fleur

Name: Chloe Absolu Edition Limitee

Name: Boucheron Oud De Carthage

Name: Dolce & Gabbana Dolce Garden

Name: Loewe Aura Loewe Magnetica
Description: It's a floral woody scent that provides women with luxury and care you desire. Enjoy the sensual touches of beauty with its combination of bergamot, jasmine sambac and patchouli which gives you charisma and longevity.

Description: This floral fragrance for women is full of contradictions and secrets, filling you with refreshing scent that lasts for long. Its aromatic composition of jasmine, patchouli, vanilla and musk providing you with the feminine effect that captivates everyone.

Name: Cartier Baiser Fou
Description: Baiser Vole Fou, a fragrance by Cartier, debuted in early 2017 as a member of the Baiser Vole or Ã¢â‚¬Å“Stolen KissÃ¢â‚¬Â collection. Meant to evoke images of flirtatious lipstick kisses, Baiser Vou was designed with luxurious orchid as a middle note. Orchid, a fragrance reminiscent of lipstick, summons imagery of desire and beauty. This strong aroma is carried by coy base notes of white chocolate and vanilla. Raspberry lingers as a top note, giving this sweet fragrance a taste of candy kisses. This aromatic powdery fragrance is a splendid add for any woman's day.
Ingredients: rasepberry,orchid,vanilla, white chocolate

Name: Thierry Mugler Angel Muse EDP
Description: Mugler Angel Muse is a woody fragrance for women. Very soft and gentle on skin. Full of life and attractiveness for a long time. Suitable for daily use.
Ingredients: grapefruit, pink pepper, hazelnut cocoa spread, vetiver, patchouli.

Name: Ferrari Noble Fig
Description: The Ferrari Noble Fig fragrance awakens your senses as you experience its fresh yet sensual accords. Using crisp and spicy top notes of fig leaf, mandarin and pink pepper, this cologne immediately lifts your spirits. The essence is then rounded off to softer notes of clary sage and iris, which make up the heart of this fragrance and bring forth its fresh, green impression. Finally, the finishing notes remain to reveal the warm and earthy scents of deep musk and sweet patchouli, which keep you in the virtual warmth of summer.
Ingredients: fig leaf, pink pepper, mandarin orange, clary sage, iris, musk, patchouli.
Top_note: fig leaf, mandarin orange, pink pepper

Name: Dior Poison
Description: Poison is an iconic fragrance described as dark and mysterious. Designed by Edouard Flechier, this elegant scent was released in 1985. The deep, juicy aroma of plum acts as the main accord for this perfume partnered with the subtle sweetness of mixed berries. It then takes a floral turn, the romantic scents of carnation, jasmine, and incense making up the heart, topped off with a spicy hint of cinnamon. The perfume finishes on a warm note with a base that features amber, heliotrope, cedar, and vanilla. This fragrance is available in 3 different sizes of eau de toilette and comes in a dark-colored bottle topped with a crystal-like cap
Ingredients: coriander seeds, plum, forest fruits, anise, brazilian rosewood,carnation, jasmine, orange blossom, tuberose, opoponax, incense, rose, honey,vetiver, rose, honey
Top_note: coriander seeds, plum, forest fruits, anise, brazilian rosewood
Middle_note: carnation, jasmine, orange blossom, tuberose, opoponax, incense, rose, honey
