Name: Elie Saab Essence No.7 Neroli
Description: A light floral fragrance, expresing romance and love to fly and dream high as possible as you can. It is a legend of wonerful lovely scents of neroli, orange blossom, cloves, musk, and white cedar extract all together to make all our dreams come true.
Ingredients: neroli, orange blossom, cloves, musk, white cedar extract

Name: Elie Saab Essence No.9 Tubereuse
Description: A deep elegant yet light fragrance for sensitive people that desire to feel unique and on spot all the time. It is an exciting journey in a garden composes of tuberose, bergamot, sweet and bitter cinnamon, and sensual white musk
Ingredients: tuberose, bergamot, cinnamon, musk

Name: Elie Saab Essence No.8 Santal

Name: Elie Saab Essence No.8 Santal
Description: Unknown

Name: Elie Saab Essence No.6 Vetiver

Name: Elie Saab Essence No.6 Vetiver
Description: A deep woody fragrance that takes you in a wonerful journey of exitment and joyness thanks to the composition of scents strarting with haitian vetiver, java vetiver oil, moving to calabrian bergamot, grapefruit, papyrus, and cloves.
Ingredients: haitian vetiver, java vetiver oil, calabrian bergamot, grapefruit, papyrus, cloves

Name: Elie Saab Essence No.3 Ambre
Description: An oriental fragrance that celebrates a wonderful group of calmy scents of Amber, Opoponax, Patchouli, Sandalwood. This composition let you feel comfortable as you have morning walks in woody gardens.
Ingredients: amber, opoponax, patchouli, sandalwood

Name: Elie Saab Essence No.1 Rose
Description: A deep floral fragrance that compose a great unique group of rose. It starts with Bulgarian and Turkish roses to feel calm, comfortable and joyful. Moving to petal and damask roses in the heart to enjoy beautiful mornings of roses. While in he base, you can enjoy he most wonderful scents of Grasse and Turkey.
Ingredients: bulgarian and turkish roses, petal and damask roses

Name: Elie Saab Essence No.2 Gardenia
Description: A floral woody fragrance that take you in a wonderful journey through different countries, as it strats with Gardenia, moving to he egyptian jasmine in the heart, to end with the indian sandalwood in the base.
Ingredients: gardenia, egyptian jasmine, indian sandalwood

Name: Narciso Rodriguez Santal Musc Eau De Parfum Intense
Description: Santal Musc comes with a floral musk scent that is suitable for women with top notes of ylang-ylang and cardamom and middle notes of musk and a base of sandalwood and other woody notes.
Ingredients: ylang ylang, cardamom, musk, sandalwood, woody notes

Name: Lalique Terres Aromatiques Noir Premier 1905
Description: Lalique Terres Aromatiques Noir Premier 1905 is an aromatic fragrance for both men and women. It has a subtle black character that is dark, sharp and mysterious. The opening is a blast of tropical scents. The cool and spicy cardamom contrasts with bright lemon tones that are softened with sweet and juicy pineapple. Freesia blends smoothly with thyme and lavender in the heart. The dry-down is warm and lush with a mixture of Tonka, with its deep aroma, woody vetiver and the unique molecule orcanox. Lalique Terres Aromatiques Noir Premier 1905 is a very classy and versatile perfume that glows the best in winter.
Ingredients: cardamom, lemon, pineapple,thyme, lavandin, freesia,vetyver, tonka beans, orcanox

Name: Lalique Elegance Animale Noir Premier 1989
Description: Lalique Elegance Animale Noir Premier 1989 is a woody fragrance for both men and women. A beautiful, natural, soft and cool scent which gives you a unique and an elegant feel. The composition opens with a refreshing peachy tone and a hint of geranium. Saffron occupies the background adding an alluring air. The heart of the fragrance unfolds with rose, elegantly accompanying jasmine. The Gurjum balsamÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s sweet and spicy touch gives way to the animalistic base of leather and sandalwood. This scent can be worn year around and is perfect evening and nighttime occasions.
Ingredients: saffron, geranium, peach, rose, jasmine, gurjan balsam, leather, sandalwood.

Name: Lalique Fleur Universelle Noir Premier 1900
Description: Lalique Fleur Universelle Noir Premier 1900 is an oriental fragrance for both men and women. This attractive scent with fancy notes will give you an elegant feel. Fleur Universelle is a unisex fragrance; warm and rich, spicy but sweet. Aromal rum blends smoothly with Cardamom and Chypre in the opening. Pink Pepper adds a delicate sparkle to the resplendent notes. Immortelle, Myrrh and Cinnamon give an intoxicating impact in the heart. The base is woody with Molecule Lorexon. The bottle with its magnificent design and brilliant packaging is the cherry on top.
Ingredients: pink pepper, cardamom, immortelle, cinnamon, patchouli, tonka bean.

Name: Lalique Rose Royale Noir Premier 1938
Description: Lalique Rose Royale Noir Premier 1938 is a fruity floral fragrance for both men and women. A very classy and modern scent, Rose Royale will last and linger as it sweetly mingles with your skin. Peach and Apricot open the fragrance with a sweet welcome. The ephemeral opening fades away to be overcome by the exotic Osmanthus and Rose Absolute in the heart. Musk dominates the base with a faint trace of sweet Cashmere Wood. Lalique Rose Royale is an elegant fragrance that combines luscious fruit accords and exotic tones to produce a sensational scent.
Ingredients: peach, apricot,osmanthus, rose, cashmere wood, musk.

Name: Lalique L'origine Or Intemporel Noir Premier 1888
Description: Lalique L'origine Or Intemporel Noir Premier 1888 is a spicy oriental fragrance for both men and women. It is a scent that combines tobacco and coffee producing an out-of-the-world scent. The opening of the fragrance is beautiful and spicy thanks to Cardamom mixed with Black Pepper and Bergamot. The heart bursts with an explosion of sexy Tobacco before leaning in to the dark notes of Coffee. Violet lingers in the background as the base notes take over. The Vanilla fragrance is dominant in the base along with earthy Patchouli, which is ready to burst, overflowing you with warmth.
Ingredients: bergamot, cardamom, nutmeg, black pepper, violet, coffee, vanilla, tolu balsam, patchouli.

Name: Lalique Nilang
Description: Lalique Nilang is an oriental fruity fragrance for women, presented in a gorgeous bottle with a flower stopper and crystal glass that celebrates beauty, femininity and nature. The top notes open with a miraculous scent. The Lotus Flower floats ahead of the fruity entrance. Peach and Melon give out a sweet vibe. The middle phase preserves the floral notes with Jasmine, Clove Flower, Freesia and Wild Blueberries. The balanced and sexy base consists of hints of Sandalwood and Amber with delicious Praline and pure Vanilla. This creative blend of different accords is a unique characteristic of Lalique.
Ingredients: lotus, mandarin orange, peach, melon, jasmine, freesia, blueberry, musk, patchouli, amber, vanille, sandalwood, sweet notes.
Middle_note: freesia, clove, blueberry, narcissus, water jasmine
Base_note: amber, musk, pralinãƒæ’ã‚â©, patchouli, sandalwood, vanilla

Name: Elizabeth Arden 5th Avenue Royale
Description: Elizabeth Arden 5th Avenue Royale is an oriental fragrance for glorious women that gives them an elegant aura and alluring charm. Inspired by New York City nightlife, this fragrance is for an adventurous woman who engages in the glamorous social life with grace and flair. The opening of the fragrance is deep, dark and smoky with raspberry before turning into sweet and fruity with liquor notes. The heart beats with richness and seduction as patchouli warms the scent up. The leather-suede base is intensely exotic and sexy. Elizabeth Arden 5th Avenue Royale is for ladies with individuality and oomph.
Ingredients: raspberry, patchouli, suede.

Name: Amouage Sunshine
Description: Refreshingly uplifting, Amouage Sunshine brings a bit of sunshine into any life. This oriental floral fragrance artfully blends fruity and floral notes to create a sophisticated scent that shows off your ability to brighten any room. Long-lasting with a moderate sillage, this fragrance ensures your presence makes a head-turning entrance no matter the room, without being overpowering. Leading off the scent are the tops notes of almond, black currant and artemisia. Floral heart notes include vanilla, magnolia, jasmine and osmanthus. Spicy base notes of white tobacco, papyrus, patchouli and juniper supporting the lighter upper layers.
Ingredients: almond, blackcurrant, artemisia,osmanthus, magnolia, jasmine, vanilla,white tobacco, juniper, papyrus, patchouli

Name: Amouage Sunshine
Description: Amouage Sunshine cologne is a fragrance for men who love the outdoors. This elegant scent weaves together the warmth and brightness of afternoon sunshine to produce an aromatic cologne for any time of the year. It effortlessly blends into daytime adventures and shifts gears seamlessly when the sun goes down and the night heats up. Long-lasting with a moderate sillage, this is one cologne that wonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t have any trouble keeping up with your fun-loving, adventurous lifestyle. Top notes for this cologne are immortelle, lavender, yellow flowers and brandy. Heart notes feature clary sage, juniper berries, and bergamot. Base notes include vanilla, Tonka beans, and cedar.
Ingredients: orange, lavender, immortelle, brandy,bergamot, juniper berries, clay sage,tonka bean, vanilla, cedar

Name: Paris Hilton Heiress Gift Set
Description: Paris Hilton Heiress Gift Set consists of an Eau de Parfum Spray, Shower Gel, and Body Lotion. It is specially created for Women by the brand Paris Hilton.
Ingredients: passion fruit, orange, juicy peach, mimosas and champagne, star jasmine, tiare lily, delightfully sweet ylang-ylang, honeysuckle and grenadine, violet leaf, tahiti tonka and light wood
Top_note: passion fruit, orange, juicy peach, mimosas and champagne
Middle_note: star jasmine, tiare lily, delightfully sweet ylang-ylang, honeysuckle and grenadine
Base_note: violet leaf, tahiti tonka and light wood

Name: Bvlgari Le Gemme Lilaia
Description: This fragrance inspired by the treasured secret of EgyptÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Ancient that emblematic of life, prosperity and regeneration. This Lilaia fragrance adds fresh and rejuvenated feelings with the natural scent of Galbanum and Musk.
Ingredients: mint, orange, fellow, mastic

Name: Bvlgari Le Gemme Calaluna

Name: Bvlgari Le Gemme Maravilla
Description: This fragrance is taking you to a journey into the Iberian Peninsula with its sunny morning and a luminous stone. This elegant scent combines with citrus notes and sweet peach. A chypre fragrance mixes with Orange Flower and Patchouli that adds fortify and energy sense of the Mediterranean light.

Name: Bvlgari Le Gemme Maravilla
Description:
Description
It is a floral, fruity fragrance for women that was launched in 2014. The nose behind this fragrance is Daniela (Roche) Andrier. It is blended with peach, jasmine, patchouli, Italian lemon and orange blossom notes.
Ingredients: peach, jasmine, patchouli, italian lemon, orange blossom

Name: Boucheron Ambre D'Alexandrie

Name: Elizabeth Arden Green Tea Bamboo
Description: Elizabeth Arden Green Tea Bamboo is a relaxing and refreshing fragrance for women. This perfume is classy and glamorous. This perfume opens with a harmonious blend of sparkling lemon, calming bergamot, grapefruit, relaxing bamboo, sweet tamarind and galbanum. The heart beats with a touch of deep green tea accord, violet leaves, sweet cucumber and syringa Scent TrekÃ¢â€žÂ¢. The dry-down is mellow with soft musk, white birch, lentisque resin, moss, Italian orris and mate. Elizabeth Arden Green Tea Bamboo transmits tranquility, freshness and sparkly sweetness; making it ideal for summertime, holidays and love stories.
Ingredients: grapefruit, lemon, bergamot, bamboo, tamarind, galbanum, green tea, violet leaf, cucumber, musk, woody notes, orris root, mate.
Top_note: bergamot, grapefruit, lemon, bamboo, tamarind, tree leaves, galbanum

Name: Bottega Veneta Bottega Veneta
Description: A rich and exciting fragrance that creat luxurious memories that inspired in an old house in the Veneto region of Italy surrounded by green hills that adds charm and fresh sense. It comes with an attractive curved bottle for your luxury.

Name: Thierry Mugler Miroir Des Majestes

Name: Tiffany & Co. Tiffany

The parfume, high quality, compositions opens with an inimitable accord of fresh, green and citrus notes, followed by floral touches of delicate lily-of-the-valley and exotic jasmine and finishing with the elegant, femininity of gardenia flowers in full bloom at dawn.

The product features classic notes of white flowers, orange, and jasmine. It provides a fruity finish and vibrant with the contemporary nuance of soft, velvety musk and honey.

The top notes of the perfume are a mix of grapefruit and sering flowers and apple notes. The heart notes are floral notes of a blend of peony and hibiscus with the fruity touch of apricot. Name: Dolce & Gabbana Light Blue Eau Intense

Name: Lancome Poeme
Description: Lancome Poeme a floral oriental fragrance for women. A beautiful, rich, voluptuous, strong, deep and so smooth scent. You will get compliments a lot with this perfume!
Ingredients: black currant, plum, green notes, mandarin orange, narcissus, peach, bergamot, leather, orange blossom, freesia, jasmine, ylang ylang, vanilla flower, tuberose, rose, tonka bean, amber, musk, vanilla, cedar.

Name: Perry Ellis Perry Ellis 18
Description: It's an Eau de Parfum that has a delicate and fruity scent which is made with femininity in mind with a composition that begins with notes of Pear, Raspberry, Mojito, the heart notes of Nimfea, Pink Orchids that represents the essence of the parfume, and the base notes of Sandalwood, Vanilla which stays with you through out the day

Description: Gold Rush by Paris Hilton was launched in the year 2016. The fragrance of the perfume takes inspiration from the enchanting beauty of Old Hollywood Glamour. The top notes contain Bergamot, Lemon, and Nectarine. The heart notes contain Velvet Orchid, Rose petals, and Violet. The base notes contain Praline, Vanilla, and Cashmere Wood.

Name: Paloma Picasso Paloma Picasso
Description: It's an Eau de Parfum that has an elegant floral fragrant with a Mediterranean temperament and is considered complex in its composition with top notes of Coriander, Angelica, Carnation that will grab your attention immediately, the heart notes of Ylang Ylang, Jasmine, Hyacinth that represents the essence of the parfume, and the base notes of Oakmoss, Patchouli, Sandalwood, Vetiver, And Tobacco which will linger on with you through out the day

The heart has a blend of rose, violet, jasmine, Japanese osmanthus, coming on a base of vanilla, amber, cedar and patchouli.
Ingredients: pimento, apricot, pepper, coriander, almond, rose, violet, jasmine, japanese osmanthus, vanilla, amber, cedar, patchouli

Name: Mauboussin Elixir Pour Elle

Name: Mont Blanc Femme Individuelle

Name: Lolita Lempicka Lolita Lempicka
Description: This soft floral scent will fill you with captivating smell full of happiness and joy. The wonderful combination of violet, amaryllis, along with cherry and praline will leave a charming effect that gets you noticed wherever you go.

Name: Mercedes Benz Woman

Name: Laura Biagiotti Roma

Name: Lanvin Jeanne

Ingredients: blackberry, lemon, pear, peony, freesia, raspberry, rose, sandalwood, amber, musk.

Name: Lalique Reve D'Inflni Lalique
Description: Lalique Reve D'Inflni is a floral fragrance for women. A gorgeous, classic, fresh and long-lasting perfume with a unique bottle. It smells great and is addictive for spring. The scent of femininity and elegance, Reve D'Inflni flaunts with a soft pink box decorated with Ardente; the symbol of eternity. The fruity top notes start off with the Lychee note. Fresh notes of Bergamot added to rich notes of Freesia set off the spirit of the scent. The heart of the perfume is formed with a hint of Peach and a splash of satin Rose Absolute. The dry-down has a woodsy vibe and is slightly sweet thanks to the vanilla and musk.
Ingredients: lychee, bergamot, freesia,peach, rose absolute, cedarwood,musks, vanilla, sandalwood

Name: Lalique L'Amour
Description: Lalique L'Amour is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women. A sweet, fresh and glamorous scent, this unique perfume with a very charming blend of notes will give you the sensual aura that compliments your gorgeous self. The perfume opens with gorgeous mÃƒÂ©lange of elegant Rose Buds, Bergamot and Neroli. A hint of Tuberose with soft Gardenia and floral Jasmine beat at the heart. The beautiful floral combination is supported on a base of creamy sandalwood, cedar and smooth, delicate musk. The bottle is extremely elegant and captivating. A gracefully refined beauty, Lalique L'Amour is a fragrance made for a sensual woman.

Name: Korloff In Love

Ingredients: peony, pink pepper, rose, jasmine sambac, ylang ylang, papyrus, agarwood, patchouli, tonka bean.

Name: Givenchy Ysatis
Description: Givenchy Ysatis a floral woody fragrance for women. Classy, feminine and sophisticated, mature, for the special occasion, for the evening. Must have!
Ingredients: unknown

Name: Lalique Perles De Lalique

The heart notes emerge with smoky and sexy breeze as pepper and patchouli mix perfectly. The dry-down is a radiant veil of cashmere woods and Tonka beans. Perles De Lalique is a very attractive and glamorous scent that is soft and gentle on the skin. The Ã¢â‚¬Å“cactusÃ¢â‚¬Â flacon is breathtakingly elegant. Created by a woman, for women, this Ã¢â‚¬Å“nicheÃ¢â‚¬Â fragrance is all that you need to fall in love.
Ingredients: orris, bulgarian rose,bourbon pepper, patchouli,cashmere woods, tonka beans

Name: Lalique Satine
Description: Lalique Satine is an oriental woody fragrance for women. The fragrance opens with a burst of powder floral including jasmine, heliotrope and sweet gardenia. Floral notes give way to warm, soft Tonka beans, to-die-for vanilla notes highlighted by a pepper explosion. The dry-down is soft, powdery with a hint of floral sweetness. The sandalwood, vetiver and patchouli temper the sweetness producing an elegant and womanly trace. Lalique Satine melts into the skin mingling with the senses and becoming a part of the beauty that is you. A sweet, nice, smooth and long-lasting perfume with a unique bottle, Lalique Satine is your scent.

Name: Kim Kardashian Gold
Description: It's a luxurious, rich fragrance made by Kim Kardashian, who named it after gold as she says its glamour remains as it stands the time test, providing a fascinating scent that combines between bergamot, sandalwood, rose and violet.

Ingredients: blood mandarin, pomegranate, tea, tuberose, freesia, sandalwood, musk.

Top notes of a fresh citrus cocktail and red berries, in the heart, the softness of a bouquet of silky peas and roses, and finally, an erotic white musk with creamy sandalwood. The bottle reflects the light through a precise dÃƒÂ©gradÃƒÂ© polished in the shadow of pink. The diamond cap associates juvenility and sophistication. The outer packaging is highly apparent due to an intensive chinny pink color and gorgeous glitters.
Ingredients: citruses, red berries, raspberry, sweet pea, rose, sandalwood, white musk.

Name: Jimmy Choo Jimmy Choo L'eau
Description: Jimmy Choo LÃ¢â‚¬â„¢EAU elicits a shinny femininity as the parfume mixes a harmony of floral, fresh and musky notes. Top notes of hibiscus flower and bergamot mix with sugary nectarine and floral peony at the heart of the fragrance. The fruity and floral notes are landed by the parfume base notes of sugared cedarwood and musk; embodying the sensational yet sweet inequality at the core of the Jimmy Choo woman.

Name: Jennifer Lopez Glow
Description: Glow is the first fragrance by Jennifer Lopez. This perfume was created by Louise Turner and Catherine Walsh. The notes of the perfume contain Neroli, Pink Grapefruit, Rose, Sandalwood, Amber, Musk Jasmine, Iris, and Vanilla. It is explained as clean, even soapy with a sweet, powdery trail. It is popularly described as Ã¢â‚¬ËœSkin-ScentÃ¢â‚¬â„¢.

Name: Jean Paul Gaultier Classique
Description: A wonderful fragrance from the fruity floral family, full of warmth and femininity to add to your beauty a touch of softness that makes you comfortable and love, let those around you confuse your unreasonable attractiveness with this wonderful fragrance that lasts for long periods of time
Ingredients: delicate rose, fresh anis, orange blossom and exciting ginger, vanilla, amber

Name: Hermes 24 Faubourg
Description: Hermes 24 Faubourg Eau De Toilette Spray is a classic fragrance for women that evoke sophistication and sensuality with its warm floral scent.

Name: Hermes 24 Faubourg
Description: Hermes 24 Faubourg is a perfume of light designed by Maurice Roucel in 1995. Top notes of brilliant and white flowers, matched by a floral heart, infused with wood, mystery, vanilla, and ambergris.
Ingredients: white flowers, iris, woods, vanilla, ambergris

Description: Halloween fragrance by J. Del Pozo, Released in 1997. It is mysterious and seductive, which makes it ideal for evening wear. Violet, petitgrain, banana leaf, and sea notes mix together smoothly to give this parfume a floral overtone with a hint of an herbal tone. The heart of the parfume uses pepper, magnolia, tuberose, and lily-of-the-valley. The floral notes deepen the sweetness of the scent while the pepper lends just a hint of spice.
Ingredients: petitgrain, violet, banana leaf, sea notes, tuberose, violet, pepper, magnolia, lily of the valley, sandalwood, incense, madagascar vanilla.

Name: Dior Dolce Vita
Description: Dolce Vita, a womenÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s fragrance released by Christian Dior in 1994, is a floral and woody perfume with just the right touch of sweet and spice. Crafted by Pierre Bourdon and Maurice Roger, this feminine scent produces the kind of luscious aroma that wonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t be easily forgotten in your wake. Bursting with luscious fruits, the top notes of the scent contain soft lily, fleshy and juicy peach, tart grapefruit, citrusy bergamot, romantic rose, and sweet cardamom. Fuzzy apricot, lush magnolia, sensuous cinnamon, heliotrope, and woody palisander rosewood combine to form the heart of the fragrance. Milky sandalwood, tropical coconut, comforting vanilla and familiar cedar comprise the perfumeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s base notes.
Ingredients: magnolia, lily-of-the-valley, rose,apricot, peach, cinnamon,heliotrope, sandalwood, vanilla

Name: Clinique Happy Heart
Description: An amazing floral feminine fragrance that gives you a fresh scent with deep and warm feelings, with a mixture of tangerines, carrots, and white woods, let everyone around you wonder about your unreasonable appeal!

Name: Cartier Le Baiser Du Dragon
Description: Le Baiser du Dragon by Cartier, which refers to a Dragon's Kiss in French, is an exotic woody-aromatic fragrance that layers rich almond and musky florals over a subtly sensual base of vetiver and patchouli. The fragrance opens with a sumptuous, fiery almond and amaretto accord rounded out by citrus and floral tones of neroli and gardenia. Heady jasmine, iris and powdery-fresh red rose dominate the heart notes, flanked by cedar and white musk. Lightly bitter, woody vetiver and earthy-sweet patchouli combine with nuances of caramel, benzoin and dark chocolate to produce a deeply satisfying finish.
Ingredients: gardenia, bitter almond, neroli, iris, musk, jasmine, cedar, rose, amber, patchouli, dark chocolate, caramel, vetiver.
Base_note: amber, benzoin, caramel, patchouli, chocolate, vetiver

The peachy shades linger along with the green tea notes. The dry-down is musky. This heavy scent ends with warm, spicy notes of patchouli, oakmoss, cistus, sandalwood, amber, vetiver, labdanum, ambergris, and castoreum. This is the type of scent that people will take notice of and that will linger when youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re gone. It is sensual, heavy and robust.

It also introduces the new revolution in the world of perfumes, ethylvanillin, blended with the Jicky accord. Shalimar takes flight with the freshness of flowers and bergamot. Warm at the heart are the powdery notes of iris, jasmine and rose. The final notes are sensual with vanilla and Tonka beans.
Ingredients: bergamot, lemon, mandarin, rosemary,iris, jasmine, rose, patchouli, vetiver,vanilla, opoponax, tonka bean, frankincense, sandalwood, musk, civet, ambergris, leather, coumarin, peru balsam

About the Brand:
Thomas Carlyle Ford is a famous American fashion designer and filmmaker. He has been one of the most important people in pop culture from the 1990s till this day. He is the owner of the luxury brand which was founded in 2005, in New York City. Tom Ford has produced amazing menswear, beautiful fragrances, high quality sunglasses and cool watches that are very popular with high fashion enthusiasts. His line can be found all over the world. In Europe alone, you can shop his products in many countries such as UK, Spain, France, Belgium, Germany, Greece, Finland, Sweden, Portugal, Ireland, etc.
Ingredients: alcohol denat., water\aqua\eau, fragrance (parfum), limonene, benzyl salicylate, linalool, hydroxycitronellal, geraniol, citronellol, butylphenyl methylpropional, citral, eugenol, benzyl benzoate, isoeugenol, benzyl alcohol, bht "

By the 1990s, La Perla was expanding both nationally and internationally, with stores in international fashion capitals Milan and Paris. La Perla expanded into ready-to-wear with the release of its first women's collection in 2002. Continuing the luxury tradition of the house, the collection features feminine outfits in silk and chiffon.

It opens with notes of pineapple, bergamot, black currant and apple, The core is where you get patchouli, dry birch; rose and Moroccan jasmine. It ends with an assortment of vanilla, musk, oakmoss, and ambergris. The scent of Aventus was developed by Olivier and Erwin Creed. The bottle comes adorned with an image of a man riding a horse.

Name: Dior Homme EDT
Description: Introduced in 2005, Dior Homme by Christian Dior is an aromatic, woody floral fragrance for men, and the first of its kind to use iris as part of its scent makeup. Sage, lavender, and bergamot are the top notes of this masculine perfume, with middle notes of iris, cacao, cardamom, and amber. Bookended with base notes of Tahitian vetiver, leather, and patchouli, this perfume formulated by Olivier Polge is elegant, sexy, and unique, especially for winter and evening wear. Dior Homme is worn as a sleek modern suit, leaving behind an immediately recognizable woody and spicy trail of elegance.
Ingredients: bergamot, pink pepper, elemi, cashmere wood, atlas cedar, patchouli, iso e super, haitian vetiver, white musk.

Wear this frosty composition to inspire fearless confidence at any time of day.

The fragrance is strong and intense and stays with you for long hours, grabbing the attention of everyone around you.
About the Brand:
Thomas Carlyle Ford is a famous American fashion designer and filmmaker. He has been one of the most important people in pop culture from the 1990s till this day. He is the owner of the luxury brand which was founded in 2005, in New York City. Tom Ford has produced amazing menswear, beautiful fragrances, high quality sunglasses and cool watches that are very popular with high fashion enthusiasts. His line can be found all over the world. In Europe alone, you can shop his products in many countries such as UK, Spain, France, Belgium, Germany, Greece, Finland, Sweden, Portugal, Ireland, etc.
Ingredients: cardamom, jasmine, leather, patchouli, moss, amber

  About the brand:
Created by the Arabian perfume house "Sarib", this collection is designed for the fragrance experts & unique perfume collectors who enjoy blending notes to create their own scent. "Waw" refers to the word in Arabic meaning "And", as these notes can be mixed together or applied individually.
Get to know SaribÃ‚Â®:
An Arabian Perfume House that established a collection of luxurious trending perfume lines, aiming to reinvent the concept of Arabic perfumes. SaribÃ‚Â® combines Arabian heritage & modern western concepts in its fragrances. With every perfume line, SaribÃ‚Â® draws a new perfumic identity that prevails its own fusion of western & eastern charm, using the highest quality of ingredients & materials. The inspiration of this Arabian brand came from the meaning of SaribÃ‚Â® an Arabic word that refers to the Ã¢â‚¬Å“last remaining dropsÃ¢â‚¬Â a poetic ideology of what remains from past heritage to the upcoming future generations.
*Approved by the Saudi Food & Drug Authority

This unique, musky scent comes in a burgundy bottle and is available in a variety of sizes and styles, from a compact 1.7-ounce eau de toilette to a 5-ounce deodorant spray. Dior Fahrenheit is the perfect choice for the confident man who knows what he wants.

Name: Amouage Dia

Top notes of labdanum, incense, bitter orange, and cardamom start the scent off with an exotic twist, while the heart notes of ylang-ylang, plum, peach and orris root infuse the blend with a floral and fruity aroma. Base notes of patchouli, amber, Brazilian rosewood, vetiver, and leather finish the combination for a virile and intense fragrance that inspires confidence in whoever wears it.

Base_note: leather, amber, patchouli, vetiver, brazilian rosewood

This wholly original and mysterious blend fuses balsamic, smoky and spicy accords for an entirely male signature fragrance. Top notes of saffron, cardamom, pink pepper, and nutmeg open the scent with their rich, bold essences, while the heart notes of myrrh and geranium add a touch of vintage Oriental tradition. Base notes of patchouli, incense, oud, and leather finish the blend for a stunning balance of hazy, earthy-sweet elements that you can wear with confidence, day or night.
Ingredients: pink pepper, cardamom, saffron, nutmeg, caraway, myrtle, mace, olibanum (frankincense),geranium, myrrh,agarwood (oud), patchouli, inscense, leather, sandalwood, styrax, cedar, musk

Its top notes combine spicy black pepper, orange, and grapefruit, followed by fresh cardamom to open floral heart of geranium, jasmine, orris, and saffron. The cologneÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s rich, comforting base is intricately woven of cedarwood, guaiac, leather, and patchouli, finished with lingering musk and earthy vetiver to create a deep, sensual and enduring chypre. A classy and imposing scent that is long-lasting while not too overpowering. Amouage Beloved is a perfect choice to give yourself or someone you love. An ideal choice for the spring season.
Ingredients: orange, grapefruit, elemi,geranium, jasmine, orris, saffron,cedar wood, guaiac, leather, patchouli, musk, vetiver
Base_note: cedar wood, guaiac, leather, patchouli, musk, vetiver

The cologne starts with notes of pimento berry oil, bergamot, and oregano. The heart introduces traditional spices, including frankincense, opoponax, and myrrh, alongside the sweet and warm notes of amber and cistus. The base notes of sandalwood, agarwood smoke, leather, and patchouli create a lasting fragrance and give the cologne a bit more depth. This combination of strong middle eastern scents makes it very long-lasting and intense, which is perfect for special occasions.
Ingredients: bergamot, oregano, pepper,incense, opoponax, amber, labdanum,agarwood (oud), patchouli, sandalwood, leather

A masterful blend of woody, spicy and green accords, this attractive cologne is a gem to have in your collection. Top notes of mint, basil and wormwood bring a sharp, refreshing vibe to the mix while the middle notes of rose, incense, and lavender lower the intensity with their soothing, heady scents. Base notes of guaiac wood, oakmoss, sandalwood, tobacco, leather, vanilla, and warm amber combine some of the richest elements in nature to enhance the fragrance with their sensual and masculine touch.
Ingredients: basil, mint, wormwood,lavender, incense, rose,sandalwood, guaiac wood, oakmoss, amber, vanille, tobacco, leather
Base_note: sandalwood, guaiac wood, oakmoss, amber, vanille, tobacco, leather

The mesmerizing fragrance starts with Lychee and Pomelo that rounds out this enigmatic and seductive aroma till the heart notes of lily and pure Red Rose jewel tones. Then, threads of warm dark-hued Oud anchor the composition transforming it into a wonderful night garden named MIDNIGHT ROSE, side by side with the sumptuous effect added by final notes of Labdanum and Amber. Indulge in a magnificent scent that lingers long after midnight.

Name: Amouroud Miel Sauvage
Description: Amouroud's Miel Sauvage evokes a precious harmony between seduction and mystery. This parfume heightens the sense of sensuality when embodying the sense of nostalgia for the ancient east. This parfume is a rich olfactive treasure that anchors the composition of the hypnotic Incense, addictive Wild Honey and Night Blooming Jasmine, which have been magically intertwined. The inclusion of the spellbinding heart of Oud in this fragrance offers unparalleled intensity and longevity. Miel Sauvage is the smell of the beauty of the night rain and the gloomy evening.
Ingredients: bergamot, wild honey, red pepper, oud, jasmine, sandalwood, patchouli, tonka bean, incense

Description: Aigner Blue is a floral woody fragrance for men; this sensual cologne with a very unique, sparkling, classy notes and ingredients offers you an elegant and natural presence. The fragrance opens with a contrast of aromas presented in lemon, apple, and clove. At heart, the floral notes of lily-of-the-valley and rose give it a hint of sweetness, while the note of leather offers depth to the blend. To balance all that, the cologne is set on base notes of vanilla, amber, musk, and cedar. Aigner Blue is perfect for any occasion, day or night!
Ingredients: lemon, apple, cloves, rose, lily of the valley, leather, saffron, cedar, musk, vanilla, amber.

Name: Usher Usher Vip
Description: Usher Usher Vip Eau de parfume for men is a fragrance made of premium quality ingredients and launched in 2009. Top notes are bergamot, mandarin and kumquat. This parfume is classified as citrus.
Ingredients: bergamot, mandarin and kumquat, saffron and nutmeg, violet and lotus leaves. suede, timber, vetiver, oakmoss, oak moss.
Top_note: violet, lotus leaves. suede, and timber,

Name: Salvatore Ferragamo Attimo Black Musk

The top notes of the fragrance are marjoram, mandarin orange, black pepper, and cardamom, heart notes are saffron, olibanum, sage, and pimento, base notes are vetiver, labdanum, black musk, and patchouli.
Ingredients: marjoram, cardamom, mandarin orange, black pepper, pimento, saffron, sage, black musk, patchouli, vetiver.

Name: S.T.Dupont Be Exceptional
Description: Be Exceptional from S.T. Dupont is a woody oriental fragrance for men. A captivating luxurious scent that is ideal for seductive nightlife and formal occasions. The opening is fruity. Grapefruit and Bergamot give it freshness, while ginger gives it a spicy vibe. It settles with a leathery feel. Iris will boost your energy level and Tonka will enhance the seductive note. The dry-down is smoky, mysterious and masculine thanks to the vetiver note. Patchouli with its sensual aura and amber with its divine power is all that you need. Long-lasting, complex and mature, Be Exceptional is presented in a gorgeous bottle for a masculine man.
Ingredients: bergamot, grapefruit, ginger, iris, leather, tonka bean, patchouli, vetiver, amber

Name: Lanvin Eclat D'arpege Pour Homme
Description: Ãƒâ€°clat dÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ArpÃƒÂ¨ge Pour Homme by Lanvin has a masculine essence. The top notes are Bergamot, Lime, and Mandarin. The heart notes are Jasmine, Rosemary, and Violet leaves. The base notes are Sandalwood, Cedar, and Musk. The composition clearly represents a blend of sophistication, tradition, and style.
Ingredients: bergamot, lemon, orange, mandarin, violet leaves, rosemary, jasmine, musk, cedar wood, sandalwood

Name: Ralph Lauren The Big Pony Collection 2
Description: It's a Charismatic Eau de Parfum that has an oriental elegant scent to it with a composition that begins with notes of Musk, the heart notes of Mexican Chocolate that represents the essence of the parfume, and the base notes of Spicy Notes which stays with you through out the day.
Ingredients: musk, mexican chocolate, spicy notes

Name: Ralph Lauren The Big Pony Collection 2
Description: Unknown

Name: Marly Byerley
Description: This bold and strong fragrance made for the energetic and adventurous men that takes you to see the wild horses seeking to win to fill you with love of adventure and competition.

Name: Mercedes Benz Le Parfum

Ingredients: pink grapefruit, tangerine, bay leaf, basil, geranium, oakmoss, maasoiawood, cedarwood, sandalwood, amber, vanilla, musk

Name: Lalique White
Description: Lalique White is a citrusy, musky, spicy and elegant fragrance for men. Quite calm, clear and clean, this perfume emits a natural scent, which gives a peaceful vibe. This unique and beautiful scent opens with a blast of Calabrian Bergamot and Lemon Tree Leaves. The Sicilian Tamarind accord is mysteriously tempting and exotic as it blends with Philippine Elemi. The shift to peppery and spicy heart is complex in a pleasant way. A light shade of Nutmeg and Cardamom help the scent evolve. The powdery touch by Vanilla perfect the heart notes that yield gracefully to a velvety base as Musk, clean, fresh and classy blend with White Cedar. The scent evolves sweetly thanks to the Moss and Amber.
Ingredients: tamarind, lemon leaf, bergamot, nutmeg, white pepper, violet, cardamom, amber, musk, cedar, oakmoss.
Top_note: calabrian bergamot, lemon tree leaves, sicilian tamarind, philippine elemi
Middle_note: white pepper, nutmeg, cardamom, violet flower
Base_note: white cedar, white amber, moss, musks

Name: Lalique Pour Homme
Description: Lalique Pour Homme is a woody aromatic fragrance for men presented in an elegant bottle with a lion engraved on. It is fresh, sweet, aromatic and slightly woody. Very classic and elegant in a modern sense. The top notes are citrusy, powdery and sparkling as clean-smelling Rosemary is added to a splash of Bergamot. Mandarin and Grapefruit add freshness to the top. The Lavender lightens up the sharpness of the citrusy notes before giving way to blooming Jasmine and smooth Cedarwood in the mid-phase. The base notes are classy. Oak Moss, Sandalwood and Amber shine through the floral notes into a full dry-down supported by Patchouli and a powerful Vanilla scent.
Ingredients: rosemary, lavender, mandarin orange, grapefruit, bergamot, tangerine, pomelo, iris, jasmine, lily of the valley, cedar, sandalwood, amber, patchouli, vanilla, oakmoss.
Base_note: oak moss, amber, patchouli, santalwood, vanilla

Name: Lalique L'Insoumis
Description: Lalique L'Insoumis is a woody aromatic fragrance for men. A rich and masculine scent, this fragrance spells energy. Made for a charming, sophisticated, original modern man. Lalique L'Insoumis celebrates the adventurous, audacious, cosmopolitan man whose limit is nonexistent. The composition of the fragrance is exquisite as the top notch ingredients blend together marvelously. The opening notes are fresh and fruity. The combination of Bergamot and Basil give a picnic-like feel. Along with Rum, the mood is uplifted and shiny. At the heart, Lavender gives a distinct personality to the scent as it blends with Clary Sage and Black Peppercorn. The sandalwood base sends you to the core of a waterfall rejuvenating you with the scents of Haiti Vetiver, Patchouli, Clearwood and dewy moss.
Ingredients: bergamot, basil, lavender, black pepper, clary sage, haitian vetiver, patchouli, woody notes, moss.

Top notes of this cologne contain nutmeg, estragon, and sweet orange, while the heart concentrate the fragrance with rose, patchouli and cedarwood. The base notes completeness the other layers with musk, vanilla, and oak. This parfume is masculine, fresh and woodsy, making it the ideal everyday fragrance.
Ingredients: aldehydes, herbal scents, tarragon, sage, bergamot, lemon, sandalwood, patchouli, iris, jasmine, cedar, tobacco, rose, amber, tonka, musk, vanilla, oak

The top notes are a blend of bergamot, lemon, mandarin orange, hawthorn, lavender, chamomile, nutmeg, and cedar notes. At the heart, violet leaf, jasmine, cloves, cedar, honey, and sandalwood mix harmoniously. The dry-down is a combination of musk tones and leather. Imperial by Jaguar is an explosion of eternal and stylish freshness meant for the modern man. The luxurious flacon is a magnificent last touch to the divine fragrance.

The fragrance opens with the delightful combination of bergamot and neroli. The glittering freshness of lemon and mandarin adds to the magic of the top notes. At the heart, vetiver and cedar sharpen, before giving way to the prominent mix of tobacco, pepper, walnuts and Tonka bean. This wonderful scent brings back memories of old places and people, of forgotten smells and times long gone.
Ingredients: unknown

Name: Givenchy Insense Ultramarine

Ingredients: black currant, galbanum, bergamot, watermelon, magnolia, carnation, iris, mint, sage, lily of the valley, cardamom, cedar, vetiver.

Name: Escentric Molecules Escentric 01
Description: If youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re a fan of unisex, remarkable scents Ã¢â‚¬â€œ as opposed to rich, sugared floral onesÃ¢â‚¬â€œ we suggest making Escentric 01 your olfactory perfume. Not just an unbelievable stroke of perfumery, itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s also incredibly wearable. The top notes have accords of orange, mahogany, lemon, sage, coriander, lavender, and vodka. The heart notes are lily-of-the-valley, jasmine, geranium, and rose. Description: Opus V Perfume by Amouage is a classy perfume that first debuted in 2011 for both men and women. This unisex fragrance is perfect for romantic occasions, and it is the ideal choice when you want to make an impression. It features a dazzling composition that opens with rum and orris root as the top notes. These merge in the heart notes, which are a blend of jasmine, rose and iris. The woodsy base notes of Civetta and agarwood give it a fresh finish for a scent that is both charming and durable.

Description: Woody accords come out in full force with Aramis 900 cologne. This fragrance launched in 1973, and it has been a signature aroma for many men since. It opens with a strong kick with notes of lemon, Brazilian rosewood, bergamot, green notes, and coriander. The core brings geranium, rose, lily of the valley, jasmine, orris root, and carnation into the scent profile. The aromas of vetiver, oakmoss, civet, patchouli, amber, and sandalwood make up the base. Aimed to give a classical and timeless aroma, Aramis 900 is perfect for the modern-day traditional man.
Ingredients: coriander seeds, green notes, brazilian rosewood, bergamot, lemon,carnation, orris root, jasmine, lily-of-the-valley, rose, geramium,sandalwood, amber, patchouli, civet, oakmoss, vetiver

The top notes are bergamot and mandarin orange for a refreshing suggestion of citrus. These ingredients are combined with Spikenard lavender for a delightful sweetness, and cardamom, amber, Peruvian pepper tree and cinnamon for a bit of spicy pleasure. The base is contrived of white cedarwood, patchouli, sandalwood, and vanilla. This is an ideal masculine fragrance for the fall and winter months and is a perfect option to wear either at night or during the day.
Ingredients: sandalwood, amber, musk, green leaves, incense, cedar, petitgrain.

A gorgeous oriental woody fragrance, that takes you to another world with its charming scent, through the fabulous blend of lavender, jasmine, and vanilla.
About the brand
Davidoff has received acclaim since it introduced its first fragrance in 1988. The brand was founded in Switzerland and has been known for luxurious accessories like watches and leather goods. It offered popular fragrances for men and women.

Davidoff has received acclaim since it introduced its first fragrance in 1988. The brand was founded in Switzerland and has been known for luxurious accessories like watches and leather goods. It offered popular fragrances for men and women.

Description: Calvin Klein Ck Free is a woody aromatic fragrance for men. Is the top pick when it comes to masculine fragrance. Description: Guerlain Habit Rouge is a woody oriental fragrance for men. Rich, dense and challenging, this scent is meant for the stylish man who does everything passionately and strives for a signature look. This dynamic scent opens with bergamot, orange, basil, tangerine, lemon, lime and Brazilian redwood. The heart embraces notes such as carnation, sandalwood, cinnamon, patchouli, jasmine, cedar and rose. The base notes include leather and oud softened by vanilla notes. The magnificent creation of Guerlain awakens the senses and boosts self-esteem. Guerlain Habit Rouge is a sophisticated fragrance that gifts the ultimate freedom.
Ingredients: orange, basil, bergamot, brazilian rosewood, lemon, carnation, sandalwood, patchouli, cinnamon, jasmine, cedar, rose, leather, amber, oakmoss, vanilla

Name: Calvin Klein Obsession Night For Men
Description: The most beautiful woody oriental perfume is distinguished by the fact that it always has a strong and steady smell of masculine ingredients that reflects the determination and enthusiasm for your distinctive personality, to enjoy an exciting and enjoyable nights must be from your next group!

Name: Giorgio Beverly Hills Gior Gio Pour Homme

Name: Azzaro Silver Black
Description: Azzaro Silver Black is a woody aromatic fragrance for men. The opening of the fragrance is youthful and invigorating with a mixture of green apple, bergamot and lime. The addition of anise in the opening adds a sweet aroma to it, enhanced by the spicy notes in the heart; coriander and cardamom, which are mixed with a hint of juniper. Juniper slowly gives way to an earthy, woody base combining sandalwood, vetiver, and patchouli, completed by a touch of smooth white musk. Azzaro Silver Black is a long-lasting, fresh and cool scent for summertime and casual wear.
Ingredients: lime, apple, anise, bergamot,coriander, cardamom, juniper,sandalwood, patchouli, vetiver, white musk

Name: Azzaro Chrome Legend
Description: Azzaro Chrome Legend is an aromatic fruity fragrance for men. This fresh and cool scent is perfect for the modern man. The fragrance opens fresh and pleasant with green apple and a blast of orange and tea giving an exquisite vibe. The heart notes are magical with soft musk and a hint of cedar. Tonka bean and amber give a sweet vibe to the heart while vetiver and oakmoss surround it with spiciness. The dry-down is delightful with amber. Azzaro Chrome Legend is a refreshing and uplifting fragrance that is ideal for daywear and summertime.
Ingredients: tonka bean, amber, musk, oakmoss, green apple, tea, vetiver, cedar, orange.

Name: Burberry For Men
Description: A stunning male fragrance with a unique woody composition that gives you a feeling of freshness throughout the day, you will not be able to dispense with it throughout the spring thanks to its fresh notes of fresh mint, lavender and sandalwood, there is no doubt that it is worth the experience
Ingredients: fresh mint, lavender, sandalwood

Name: Bentley Infinite
Description: Bentley Infinite is an oriental fragrance for men. A beautiful sensual and sweet scent that is perfect for the warm weather. Very unique and masculine. An enticing blend of woody and spicy accords that lends a robust and attractive fragrance thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s entirely magnetic. Top notes of citron, light cedar and lavender promote a lively, tantalizing aroma thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s a refreshing boost for the senses, while heart notes of floral geranium, bourbon pepper and delicate violet incorporate their sophisticated twist. Base notes of Haitian vetiver, marine ambergris and earthy patchouli finish the scent for a seductive and masculine cologne thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s impossible to ignore.
Ingredients: citruses, lavender, cedar, violet, geranium, ambergris, patchouli, haitian vetiver.
Middle_note: bourbon pepper, geranium bourbon, violet leaves
Base_note: patchouli, vetiver from haiti, ambergris accord

Name: Aramis Tuscany Peruomo
Description: Tuscany Cologne by Aramis, A classic cologne launched in 1984, Tuscany is a fresh and spicy Fougere fragrance with a zest thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s easy to indulge in. The top notes are lavender, lemon, lime, and bergamot. As the cologne settles and the top notes evaporate, the vivid blend in the heart arises; anise and carraway spices combined with the sweet green scent of tarragon and orange blossom. The woodsy base of the fragrance features the classic combination of tonka bean and oakmoss, joined by basil, patchouli, sandalwood, cinnamon, and leather. Fashionable and masculine, this cologne works just as well in the office as it does at social events.
Ingredients: lime, lavender, bergamot, lemon,caraway, orange blossom, tarragon, anise,leather, sandalwood, tonka bean, patchouli, cinnamon, basil, oakmoss
Base_note: leather, sandalwood, tonka bean, patchouli, cinnamon, basil, oakmoss

Name: Aigner First Class
Description: Aigner First Class is an aromatic woody fragrance for men. This perfume gives you a unique and elegant feel, a refreshing scent you will fall in love with. This fragrance is inspired by a man sitting elegantly in an airplane's first-class seat. It is a blend of fresh and woody scents with a glimpse of sweetness. The top notes are grapefruit, bergamot, and apple, matching the drinks served on the plane. The heart notes include spicy pepper, sweet melon, and jasmine, resting on sensual aromas of patchouli, vetiver, amber, and oakmoss.
Ingredients: bergamot, grapefruit, cardamom, orange blossom, pepper, lavender, guaiac wood, vetiver, musk.

Name: Acqua Di Parma Colonia Mirra
Description: An elegant original fragrance consists of a unique combination of aromas where the citrus notes are intertwined with the deep, warm, and aromatic notes of myrrh, blend with the delicate aromas of the orange flowers.
Ingredients: citruses, orange blossom, nutmeg, patchouli, amber.

Name: Acqua Di Parma Colonia Ebano
Description: This parfume crafted to suit the modern sophisticated man to show his success and self-confidence. It is characterized by its woody citrus fragrance where the notes of bergamot and petitgrain combined with honey and ebony ending with vetiver and patchouli to offer you the perfect long-lasting parfume.
Ingredients: petit grain, bergamot, ebony, elemi oil, vetiver and patchouli

Name: Acqua Di Parma Colonia Ambra
Description: This parfume is crafted to express the sensual masculinity. the glamorous scent of this oriental woody fragrance reflects your self-confidence and success with the special combination between the sweet Orange and Bergamot melting in the warm spicy scent of Amber and Sandalwood.

Lastly, cedarwood combined with base notes of sandalwood and Tonka bean allow for the perfect combination of spice and woody musk. The cologne is enhanced with a light and airy green smell from the additional ingredient of moss.
Ingredients: lavender, clary sage, geranium, lemon,carnation, iris, orris root, jasmine, cedar, rose,leather, sandalwood, tonka bean, musk, oakmoss, vetiver, cedar

Name: Cartier Eau De Cartier
Description: Eau De Cartier, introduced in 2001, enchants the nose with the crispness and warmth of citrus and spice. A befitting fragrance for daytime, it lingers with the fresh green scents of nature. The top notes are zingy bergamot and yuzu, which are expertly paired with the green essence of herbal coriander. Lavender and violet heart notes soften the sharpness of the earlier aromas, infusing the fragrance with intoxicating, flowery charm. White amber, patchouli, and cedar bring the motif to the ground, adding an earthy depth that is both richly savory and slightly sweet. Eau De Cartier is a unique, botanical cologne sure to stand out in a crowd.
Ingredients: coriander seeds, yuzu, bergamot,violet leaf, lavender, violet,cedar, patchouli, musk, amber

Jasmine is adorned by the ylang-ylang flower and beautified by the rich sandalwood. The base is elevated with iris, tonka beans and vanilla. As the first woody perfume for women, this balanced fragrance is bewitching and embracing. It takes you on a trip to the Oriental mountains and into exotic realms.

Ingredients: unknown

This Eau de Parfum surprises you with its vibrant freshness lent by the mojito accord, the fresh floral accord, and the green woody accord, which come together in an intense composition. This strength ensures its powerful and refined trail. Guerlain Homme boasts a bolder, woodier personality.
Ingredients: linden, spicy mint, rum, smell of flowers, cedar wood, patchouli, vetiver

Name: Guerlain Homme
Description: Guerlain Homme, where vigor and originality meet in an intense harmony. The powerful fragrance addresses the wild side to a man. The scent is a beautiful blend of floral and woody notes highlighted by the mojito accord. The opening is bewitching with the mojito accord touched by rum. The fragrance settles in the heart drifting away from the sharpness of the opening to a sweeter, more masculine feel with cedar and vetiver in control. Mojito is still there setting the background. Feel instantly better with elevated spirit by wearing this powerful fragrance. Guerlain Homme is for the cool, casual and classy man.
Ingredients: lime, peppermint, rum,pelargonium, tea,cedar, vetiver

The sensual heart of jasmine and rose blends with the luxurious base notes of Australian sandalwood and white musk.

The dry-down is a blissful mix of iris and violets. This fragrance is created for the ambitious cool woman, who welcomes new opportunities, fearlessly. Guerlain is a legendary French perfume house, one of the oldest perfume houses in the world, with more than 175 years in the world of perfumes. It offers you a group of the most luxurious perfumes that were officially used by the royal families in Europe.

This fabulous story inspired Jacques Guerlain to create this exquisitely seductive scent, the worldÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s very first oriental fragrance: Shalimar. Warm at the heart are the powdery notes of iris, jasmine and rose. The final notes are sensual with vanilla, Peru balsam and tonka beans.

At the top of the scent composition are notes of mandarin, orange, peach, neroli, rosewood, and plum. The heart is a floral bouquet consisting of black currant, acacia, gardenia, tuberose, neroli, and mimosa. The base ends warmly with cedar, amber, vanilla, sandalwood, musk and tonka bean. Dominique Ropion developed the scent profile for Amarige. Ropion is a true innovator in the industry, and he aims for perfection with each new fragrance. Amarige is a soft, sensual, and romantic fragrance that is worthy of making a staple in your fragrance collection.

Spicy notes of cardamom and nutmeg form the heart of the perfume together with flowers of iris and heliotrope. The base consists of cedar, tonka and amber.

Name: Candy Addict Intense Candy Mini Hair Mists Set
Description:
Candy Addict hair mists are now available in Ã¢â‚¬Å“minisÃ¢â‚¬Â to take with you wherever you go! They contain Vitamin E, a powerful antioxidant that moisturises, smoothes & adds shine to the hair! Can't decide on your favorite scent? No problem! The Intense Candy set includes:
Marshmallow Mash:
A deliciously nostalgic scent combination that will transport you to a land of fairgrounds and campfires with every spritz! The opening notes of juicy peach lead to the sweet marshmallow leaving you smelling good enough to eat! Marshmallow Mash is your go-to fragrance that keeps your hair subtly fragranced throughout the day!
Berry B:
Ready to be instantly transported to a tropical island full of tasty fruit and summer vibes? Berry B hair mist ensures you leave a deliciously addictive scent behind you everywhere you go! A perfect blend of raspberry, vanilla and freesia notes. Berry special indeed.
Powdery Pow:
Want to be that person that smells so good you make everyone wonder what you're wearing? The fresh, dry sweetness of Powdery Pow will make you that person! The opening notes of osmanthus, musk & amber lead to the clean, powdery sweet base notes and POW! Love at first spritz.
How to use:
From about 20 cm away, spritz the mist evenly over your hair. Then, go and enjoy your deliciously beautiful hair! Don't forget to shake the bottle before use to liven up the candy!
Reapply throughout the day whenever you need a dose of awesomeness!
