Name: Moschino Cheap And Chic I Love Love
Description: I Love Love was launched in 2004. A refreshing fragrance for women, it is the perfect balance of flowers and fruits. The top notes introduce this with red fruits and citrus and the heart notes consist of tea rose, bulrush, lily of the valley and cinnamon leaves. The base notes bring this all together with musk and woods. This fragrance is what you keep in your perfume wardrobe when you need a burst of warm and bright citrus. The woods stop it from being too fruity and the hint of spice gives it a little depth. A fun fragrance!
Ingredients: orange, grapefruit, red currant, lemon,tea rose, bulrush, lily-of-the-valley, sugar cane, cinnamon,musk, cedar, woody notes
Middle_note: tea rose, bulrush, lily-of-the-valley, sugar cane, cinnamon

Name: Creed Sublime Vanille
Description: Sublime Vanille is a vanilla fragrance with hints of citrus. It begins with the highest quality bourbon vanilla and vanilla orchid. Tonka bean sits at the heart of this carefully-crafted perfume, while lemon, bergamot, and musk form the base notes. This high-end fragrance has moderate sillage and high longevity, making it a great choice for all-day wear. ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s fresh and sweet without being overly sugary or offensive. Wear it to the office, for an evening out, or a casual weekend with friends and family. This uplifting, adaptable scent pairs well with any outfit and can be dressed up or down.
Ingredients: vanilla from comoros (africa), tonka bean,white bergamot, lemon,tonkin musk

Name: Creed Aventus Cologne
Description: The perfect perfume exudes style, success, true grit, and vigour. The classic perfume maintains the utmost quality and longevity of this newest menÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s scent. It was well designed to remain with you for a long time with an attractive, refreshing scent.
Ingredients: apple, black currant, bergamot, pineapple, raspberry, patula, patchouli, jasmine, vanilla, musk, oakmoss, amber

Name: Creed Aventus For Her
Description: Creed released a masculine version of this perfume in 2010, but in 2016, it decided to launch the female accompaniment. Aventus For Her is floral, fruity and warm all wrapped into one. A couple spritzes is all you need to excite your senses. It has a rather intriguing blend of notes that exudes confidence. It opens with a luscious array of violet, lemon, green apple, patchouli, pink pepper, and bergamot. The heart is composed of styrax, rose, Mysore sandalwood, and musk. It ends powerfully with amber, lilac, sweet peach, ylang-ylang, and black currant.
Ingredients: egyptian green apple, pink berries, indonesian patchouli, italian bergamot,bulgarian and turkish roses, indian sandalwood, styrax, musk,sweet peach, cassis, lilac, amber, ylang ylang
Top_note: egyptian green apple, pink berries, indonesian patchouli, italian bergamot
Middle_note: bulgarian and turkish roses, indian sandalwood, styrax, musk
Base_note: sweet peach, cassis, lilac, amber, ylang ylang

Name: Creed Love In White
Description: Love in White by Creed is an Oriental fragrance for women that was launched in 2005. It was largely inspired by a love for sailing and features symbolism of freedom, nature, and harmony. In keeping with that theme, this fragrance features scent notes from most of the continents. The top note is composed mainly of orange peel, hailing from South Spanish orchards. The middle notes are composed of a handful of scent notes. You may notice jasmine from Italy, narcissus from France, Egyptian iris, and Tonkin rise. The final notes to hit your senses include vanilla, sandalwood, and a touch of ambergris.
Ingredients: orange zest from italy,florentine iris, daffodils from france, magnolia, bulgarian rose, tonkin rice,vanilla, ambergris, mysore sandalwood
Middle_note: florentine iris, daffodils from france, magnolia, bulgarian rose, tonkin rice

Name: Creed Tabarome
Description: This fragrance is designed for men who aspire to be leaders. Its top notes feature Bergamot, lemon, mandarin, and ginger, complemented by a heart of jasmine, sandalwood, and vetiver. The base has notes of Musk, tobacco, and tea.
Ingredients: bergamot, lemon, mandarin, ginger, jasmine, sandalwood, vetiver, musk, tobacco, tea

Name: Creed Sublime Vanille Les Royales Exclusives
Description: This soft oriental scent is suitable for both him and her. Its top notes feature Tahitian vanilla and South American bourbon vanilla, complemented by a heart of Tonka bean. The base has notes of Bergamot, Calabrian lemon and Musk.
Ingredients: tahitian vanilla, south american bourbon vanilla, tonka bean, bergamot, calabrian lemon, musk
Top_note: tahitian vanilla, south american bourbon vanilla

Name: Creed Viking
Description: Celebrate your power with Viking Eau de Parfum for the fearless and fiery modern man. This bold men's fragrance combines fresh citrus notes of Calabrian bergamot and Sicilian lemon with pink peppercorn, Bulgarian rose, and peppermint. Woody base notes of Indian sandalwood and Haitian vetiver complete this masculine masterpiece.
Ingredients: pink pepper, calabrian bergamot, sicilian lemon, pink pepper, bulgarian rose, spicy mint, sandalwood, haitian vetiver, indian patchouli, lavender.
Top_note: pink pepper, calabrian bergamot, sicilian lemon
Middle_note: pink pepper, bulgarian rose, spicy mint
Base_note: sandalwood, haitian vetiver, indian patchouli, lavender.

Name: Creed Pure White Cologne
Description: This perfume is often compared to a burst of English mist. This citrusy blend gives way to subtle sweetness and powdery elegance, calling to mind the fine mist of a foggy London day. The fragrance's blend lasts with you for a long time with an attractive, wonderful scent.
Ingredients: lemon, bergamot, grapefruit, galbanum, pears, baby grains, amber, white musk, rice powder

Name: Creed Original Santal
Description: Original Santal is a distinctive menÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s scent steeped in the heritage of centuries of perfumery. This scent pays homage to the spiritual richness and royal splendor of India. As the name hints, precious sandalwood is the center of this scent, around which all other elements slowly dance. Top notes of Indian sandalwood, coriander, cinnamon, and juniper berry provide immediate satisfaction. The olfactory journey continues with middle notes of ginger, lavender, rosemary, and leaves of the absolute orange tree. The warm base of vanilla and tonka bean provides a lingering, satisfying finish.
Ingredients: coriander, juniper berries, cinnamon, sandalwood, rosemary, ginger, lavender, petitgrain, tonkabean, vanilla.
Top_note: orange tree absolute, jamaican ginger, sicilian lemon
Base_note: mysore sandalwood, virginia cedar, vanilla, siam benzoin, ambergris, tonkin musk

Name: Creed Asian Green Tea
Description: A morning spritz of Asian Green Tea, by Creed, is an invigorating start to the day. This exquisite fragrance boasts a playful bit of citrus grounded in earth tones and calming florals. Citrus characterizes the top notes, which consist of mandarin orange, lemon, bergamot, and neroli. A field of wildflowers grows in the middle notes, with violet, heliotrope, rose and black currant in the forefront. Here, too, is where the perfume gets its name, as green tea ties it all together. Earth tones like sandalwood, musk, and amber make up the base notes.
Ingredients: bergamont, mandarin, lemon, neroli,violet, heliotrope, green tea, rose, black currant,amber, sandalwood, musk
Middle_note: violet, heliotrope, green tea, rose, black currant

Name: Creed Neroli Sauvage
Description: This fragrance will provide you with charm, elegance and confidence. Its relaxed and stylish floral-citrus notes make it suitable for all ages. It features lemon, bergamot, and petitgrain on the top, coming on a heart of verbena and orange flower. The base has notes of ambergris and sandalwood.
Ingredients: lemon, bergamot and petit grain, verbena, orange flower, ambergris, sandalwood

Name: Creed Spice And Wood
Description: The second product from its Royal Exclusives line, Spice and Wood by Creed was released in 2010. This unisex fragrance is noble and powerful, making it ideal for evening and formal wear. Like its name, this scent is spicy and woody with a hint of velvety sweetness. It opens with a tantalizing mix of apple, bergamot, and lemon. A deep richness is exuded from its heart of angelic root, vetiver, patchouli, and cloves. The essence of alive and glorious woods soon seeps in with notes of cedarwood, oakmoss, and musk..
Ingredients: apple, bergamot, lemon,angelic root, pinkberries, vetiver, patchouli, cloves, pimento (jamaican pepper), birch,iris, cedarwood, oakmoss, tonkin musk
Middle_note: angelic root, pinkberries, vetiver, patchouli, cloves, pimento (jamaican pepper), birch

Name: Creed Bois Du Portugal
Description: This rich, warm scent embodies the tapestry of the forested Iberian Peninsula. Its smooth blend makes it perfect for men, thanks to its exotic wood and spice notes. It has Bergamot on the top, complemented by lavender in the heart, while the base has notes of sandalwood, vetiver ambergris and cedar.
Ingredients: bergamot, lavender, sandalwood, vetiver ambergris, cedar

Name: Creed Bois Du Portugal
Description: Encounter a fantasy of rich woodland landscapes with Bois du Portugal, a spirited menÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s fragrance. This warm and sophisticated cologne dazzles the mind and the senses with its woody and spicy accords. Opening with the fresh, rejuvenating scent of bergamot evokes an atmosphere of high energy and sparkling refreshment. Meanwhile, the middle note of soothing lavender contradicts that intensity with its therapeutic floral remedy. Finally, base notes of marine ambergris, light cedar, sandalwood and vetiver balance the entire fragrance with their neutral accords for an intoxicating aroma thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s powerful yet not overbearing. Perfect for daywear at the office or a casual weekend afternoon.
Ingredients: bergamot, lavender,cedarwood,sandalwood, vetiver, ambergris

Name: Creed Jardin D'amalfi
Description: The perfume makes you cruise down the beautiful Amalfi Coast on the iridescent sea to landscapes glistening with exotic fruits and luxurious spices. It gives you an undeniable sense of Italian romance and elegance. The perfume was designed with a long-lasting blend rich in cedar, apple, and rose in a blend of floral-fresh perfection.
Ingredients: mandarin, bergamot, pink pepper, small grain, cedar wood, apple, rose, vetiver, white musk, cinnamon
Top_note: mandarin, bergamot, pink pepper, small grains

Name: Creed Pure White Cologne Le Royal Exclusives
Description: A citrus fresh scent launched in 2011, Pure White Cologne, by Creed, is part of the Royal Exclusives Line created to celebrate the houseÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s 250th anniversary. This fragrance is also known as Original Cologne. Top notes of this scent are all citrus, with bittersweet grapefruit, tart lemon, and tangy bergamot. Middle heart notes are pear, neroli, and galbanum, followed by the interesting base note mix of rice, ambergris, white musk, and powdery notes. Best worn as a daytime cologne in the warmer months. A must-have for your perfume vanity!
Ingredients: lemon, bergamot, grapefruit,galbanum, petitgrain, sweet pear, nerol, ambergris, white musk, rice powder

Name: Creed Royal Princess Oud Millesime
Description: Royal Princess Oud Milesime, by Creed, was launched in 2015 for women. The word Milesime appears on many of Creed's fragrances as a mark of quality and means that the best crops from a particular year's harvest were used in that bottle. This floral fragrance opens with top notes from rose, the queen of flowers; powdery violet; and the fresh, complex scent of bergamot. The floral heart features sweet jasmine, Tuscan iris with its earthy aroma and the musk of patchouli, smoothed and sweetened by vanilla. Warm, exotic orientals comprise the base: Siam benzoin; deep, woody oud; resinous and sweet styrax; and milky sandalwood, with its lingering sweetness.
Ingredients: sicilian bergamot, rose, sweet violet,jasmine, vanilla, patchouli, iris from tuscany,benjoin siam, mysore sandalwood, styrax
Middle_note: jasmine, vanilla, patchouli, iris from tuscany

Name: Creed Jasmin Imperatrice Eugenie
Description: A perfume that is distinguished by its seductive, floral-oriental charm. The bergamot mixes with vanilla and amber in this perfume create a sensual fragrance that is full of strength and warmth. The perfume also contains other wonderful ingredients such as in this perfume are Tangerine, Green orange, sandalwood ambergris, and neroli.
Ingredients: bergamot, tangerine, green orange,sandalwood, ambergris, vanilla, and neroli

Name: Creed Original Vetiver
Description: Modern and sophisticated, Original Vetiver is a refreshing cologne for the active man. The masculine fragrance, launched in 2004, is inspired by the clean, clear scents of the great outdoors. Crisp bergamot and mandarin orange are the top notes. Juicy and sweet, they awaken you to a new day. A spicy kick of ginger clears your mind and energizes your body. Green vetiver stands out at the middle, grassy and deep in profile. Floral iris and creamy sandalwood add body and warmth. Musk and ambergris end the fragrance with an alluring sensuality, making you irresistible to those in your path. Wear this woody cologne to get in touch with nature.
Ingredients: mandarin, ginger, bergamot, iris, vetiver, sandalwood, musk, amber.
Top_note: bergamot, bitter orange, mandarin, vetiver leaves
Base_note: mysore sandalwood, vetiver, ambergris, tonkin musk

Name: Creed Spring Flower
Description: Stop and smell the roses with Spring Flower fragrance by Creed. This perfume is a fresh bouquet of femininity. With base notes of luxurious ambergris and warm and woody musk, you enjoy a deep feeling of contentment. Rose and jasmine blend together for a romantic splash of sun. Next, the fragrance tops its signature scent with notes of melon, peach, and apple that caress you like a cool breeze. Floral, fresh fruity, and delightful; that is all you need for kick starting your day.
Ingredients: bergamot, apple, apricot, melon, peach,jasmine, rose,musk

Name: Creed White Flowers
Description: Created in 2011 to mark the brandÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s 250th anniversary, Creed White Flowers perfume for women captures the purity and intoxication of bright, fruity botanicals in its top notes of green apple, violet leaves, and fresh lemon. Middle notes of spicy geranium, lush rose, and exotic jasmine reveal the lush, titular white florals. Foundational notes of sandalwood and musk are joined by a lingering floral coda of narcissus. A gorgeous trail of refined femininity follows the wearer of this delightful fragrance. Creed White flowers is a complex and impressive blend of floral scents designed to make you feel heavenly.
Ingredients: violet leaves, green apple, lemon,jasmine, geranium, rose,musk, sandalwood, narcissus

Name: Creed Jardin D'Amalfi
Description: Jardin D'amalfi by Creed, released in 2011, brings elements of nature together for a unique and feminine fragrance. It opens with a burst of juicy citrus. Tangerine, lemon, bergamot, and berries combine to capture the fresh crispness of an orchard. Hints of rose add a delicateness to the strong opening, which soon welcomes the green and woody scents of vetiver, cedarwood, and musk. A little cinnamon is added to the mix, giving this perfume a little spice and an exotic elegance. This unisex fragrance adds a lot to the appeal of your look so much that it makes you the focus of everyone's eyes.
Ingredients: mandarin, bergamot, lemon, pink pepper, petit grain, cedar, rose, apple, vetiver, white musk, cinnamon.
Base_note: vetiver from haiti, white musk, cinnamon

Name: Creed Fleurissimo
Description: This fragrance has a sophisticated blend of glamour and elegant aristocracy. It has a magnificent blend of notes that will awaken the essence of femininity in every woman. It has notes of tuberose, violet, iris, and Bulgarian rose, which will draw all eyes in the room upon her.
Ingredients: bergamot, violet leaves, bulgarian rose, tuberose, ylang ylang, florentine iris, ambergris

Name: Creed White Amber
Description: White Amber Perfume by Creed, Creamy, ethereal florals fuse with fruit, aquatic notes and warm wood in White Amber, a floral oriental fragrance that can be worn by women or men. The opening is a bright and uplifting fruity fusion of peach and citrus harmonized with marine undertones of ambroxan. Elegant floral and subtle vanillic notes emerge at the heart, mingling jasmine and benzoin with saltwater nuances. Warm amber and buttery sandalwood merge in the base notes to create a lightly lingering finish thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s perfect for casual spring and summer wear.
Ingredients: amber, vanilla, fruity accord,floral accord, sandalwood, benzoin,floral accord, absolute jasmine, sandalwood, benzoin
Base_note: floral accord, absolute jasmine, sandalwood, benzoin

Name: Creed Royal Mayfair
Description: This perfume captures the essence of classic British style and pays homage to the place where things first began. It was perfectly designed to suit the elegance of a gentleman. The perfume has a great long-lasting blend.
Ingredients: raspberry, green lemon, pine nuts, rose, tuberose, orange, cedarwood, eucalyptus.

Name: Creed Royal Mayfair
Description: Introduced in 2015, Royal Mayfair is a fruity, floral fragrance that was created for men and women. Named after the posh, London neighborhood of Mayfair, this gourmand scent is a fresh and imaginative experience. This original scent was a bespoke creation for the Duke of Windsor; however, 80 years after the original was made, it is now available to you. The top notes are composed of gin, lime and pine tree. The heart centers around the perfect floral experience of a rose. The base notes finish with orange, cedar, and eucalyptus.
Ingredients: british gin, jamaican lime, scottish highland pine,duke of windsor roses,bahamian orange, canadian cedar, australian eucalyptus
Top_note: british gin, jamaican lime, scottish highland pine
Base_note: bahamian orange, canadian cedar, australian eucalyptus

Name: Creed Aqua Fiorentina
Description: A fruity-fresh perfume for women and was released in 2009. The fragrance contains a wonderful blend of fruits such as valuable plum, and apple mixed with Rose, white carnation bergamot and lemon then enhanced with Virginia cedar, sandalwood, and delicious grapefruit. The production of this perfume was actually discontinued for a while and re-launched after an adjustment to the formula.
Ingredients: plum, greengage, apple, rose, white carnation, bergamot, lemon, virginia cedar, sandalwood, and grapefruit

Name: Creed Tubereuse Indiana
Description: The sultry, yet soft, Tubereuse Indiana is a tribute to the exotic and carnal tuberose from Comoros. Bergamot and tuberose combine to form the captivating head and heart notes of this Eau de Parfum, whilst vanilla and ambergris deliver sweetness and warmth. Equally floral and rich, this fragrance can be worn by both men and women.
Ingredients: bergamot, indian tuberose, vanilla, ambergris.

Name: Creed Royal Oud
Description: Released in 2011, Royal Oud is a synthesis of Parisian and Persian style and grace. It incorporates elements of a Persian palace with marble, wood, leather, and gold along with the historical components of its personal design house. The rarity of oud makes it a treasured scent note, and to own a fragrance that features it so strongly is a fortunate occurrence. The top notes are a citrusy mixture of lemon, Sicilian bergamot, and pink pepper. The heart notes reach out with galbanum, cedar and angelica root. The base is a luxurious finish of oud, sandalwood, and musk.
Ingredients: lemon, pinkberries, bergamot,cedar, galbanum, angelica roots,sandalwood, oud, tonkin musk

Name: Creed Viking
Description: Creed Viking is an aromatic woody fragrance for men. The incredibly beautiful, heavy and warm perfume. Very attractive scent with very unique notes. Suitable for daily use.
Ingredients: pink pepper, calabrian bergamot, sicilian lemon, bulgarian rose, spicy mint, sandalwood, haitian vetiver, indian patchouli, lavender.
Top_note: calabrian bergamot, sicilian lemon, la reunion baie rose (pink peppercorn)
Base_note: indian sandalwood, haitian vetiver, indian patchouli, lavandin absolute

Name: Creed Viking Cologne EDP
Description:
This is an aromatic fragrance for men that will capture the attention of everyone around you.
It begins with touches of mandarin and lemon that gives it a tangy yet attractive scent combined with the spicy accords of pink pepper.
It envelopes the air around you in a mix of lavender and geranium with the clam and distinct accords of nutmeg, sage and rosemary.
This perfume finishes with the magical touches of vetiver, sandalwood and cedarwood which combined with accords of olibanum and patchouli stays with you for a long time.
Ingredients: unknown

Name: Creed Rose Imperiale
Description: This perfume was created to remember the elegance and grandeur of classical Europe and the gilded crowns, thrones, and triumphs of extraordinary monarchs. This luxurious scent is a tribute to the noble rose and its countless devotees throughout history. It has a beautiful, long-lasting blend full of natural ingredients.
Ingredients: white iris, bergamot, angelica, may flowers, tuberose, rose, cedarwood, patchouli, pink pepper, neroli, amber, caramel, cocoa, benzoin
Top_note: white iris, bergamot, angelica, may flowers
Middle_note: tuberose, rose, cedarwood, patchouli, pink pepper, neroli

Name: Creed Millesime Imperial
Description: This amazing perfume was perfectly designed to suit both men and women. This fresh and stylish scent captures warm and sparkling notes richly layered with a sophisticated base. It has a beautiful, long-lasting blend. It was launched on the perfumeryÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s 150th anniversary.
Ingredients: sea salts, fruits, bergamot, sicilian lemon, iris, mandarin, sea breezes, woods, musk

Name: Creed Love In Black
Description: This perfume is an endless length of black velvet strewn with Parma Violets: both the opulent musky purple flowers and the rare tender white blossoms. It was perfectly designed with a long-lasting blend that's rich in blackcurrant buds and clove.
Ingredients: wildflowers, cedarwood, italian violet, musk, carnations, iris, bulgarian flowers, blackcurrant

Name: Creed Himalaya
Description: This perfume combines Himalayan fresh and woody notes for a perfectly balanced rugged, masculine, and exhilarating fragrance. It has a perfect, long-lasting blend full of natural ingredients. The perfume provides you with an attractive, refreshing scent.
Ingredients: bergamot, grapefruit, lemon, mandarin, nutmeg, black pepper, pink pepper, gunpowder, cedarwood, sandalwood, vetiver, amber, tonka bean, musk
Middle_note: nutmeg, black pepper, pink pepper, gunpowder, cedarwood, sandalwood, vetiver

Name: Creed Himalaya
Description: This seductive scent embodies fusing the power of man and nature. It has a blend of citrus along with warmer notes of sandalwood and cedarwood, which will provide you with a long-lasting effect that you cannot resist.
Ingredients: bergamot, grapefruit, lemon, mandarin, juniper berry, nutmeg, sandalwood, vetiver, pepper, ambergris, musk, tonka bean
Middle_note: juniper berry, nutmeg, sandalwood, vetiver, pepper

Name: Creed Fleurs De Gardenia
Description: The perfume is a stroll through a British meadow lavished with delicate and fragrant blooms, with your fingertips grazing the petals as you walk. Fleurs de Gardenia is an amalgamation of both future and historic English love stories. It has a great perfect blend that lasts with you for a long time.
Ingredients: black currant, galbanum, pink pepper, pink jasmine, california, rose, lily of the valley, gardenia, cedarwood, patchouli, musk
Middle_note: pink jasmine, california, rose, lily of the valley, gardenia

Name: Creed Erolfa
Description: This Eau de parfum is inspired by family memories of sailing on a beautiful yacht. Its scent embodies the sparkling seas, salty air and citrus-scented breeze with its marvelous notes that feature Bergamot, Lemon, Orange, Violet, Cumin, Basil, Rosemary and Melon on the top. The heart has notes of Cyclamen, Jasmine, Ginger, Coriander and Pepper, coming in a base of Cedarwood, Sandalwood, Oakmoss, Amber and Musk.
Ingredients: bergamot, lemon, orange, violet, cumin, basil, rosemary, melon, cyclamen, jasmine, ginger, coriander, pepper, cedarwood, sandalwood, oakmoss, amber, musk
Top_note: bergamot, lemon, orange, violet, cumin, basil, rosemary, melon

Name: Creed Pure White
Description: A citrus fresh scent launched in 2011, Pure White Cologne, by Creed, is part of the Royal Exclusives Line created to celebrate the houseÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s 250th anniversary. This fragrance is also known as Original Cologne. Top notes of this scent are all citrus, with bittersweet grapefruit, tart lemon, and tangy bergamot. Middle heart notes are pear, neroli, and galbanum, followed by the interesting base note mix of rice, ambergris, white musk, and powdery notes. Best worn as a daytime cologne in the warmer months. A must-have for your perfume vanity!
Ingredients: lemon, bergamot, grapefruit,galbanum, pear, petitgrain,ambergris, white musk, rice powder

Name: Creed Love In White For Summer
Description: Taking the inspiration from CreedÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s best-selling womenÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s fragrance Love In White, The House of Creed debuts the new seasonal Love In White For Summer. A dreamy fresh floral that bottles white-hot nights on the CÃƒÂ´te d'Azur and the quest for eternal summer. This scent transports wearers to the French Riviera where chic white accessories, crisp waves and long holiday escapes reign. Like the sparkling hues of the oceanÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s reflection, iris and cedar shine through at the heart of this serene seasonal scent. A fresh, long-lasting, that does not overpower your presence, a perfect choice for any of your occasions.
Ingredients: south spain orange juices. italian jasmine, french riviera narcissus, tonkin rice, egyptian iris, guatemala mountain magnolia, java vanilla, calabrian ambergris, indian sandalwood.
Top_note: bulgarian roses, calabrian bergamot, sweet magnolia
Middle_note: florentine iris, basmati rice, virginia cedarwood

Name: Creed Cedre Blanc
Description: Cedre Blanc is a distinguished fragrance by Creed. Subtle, yet empowering, the mix of bold spices and woody cedar are softened by floral accents. A strong base of cedar, sandalwood, and vetiver hold the aromatic adventure together. Top notes of bergamot, cardamom, galbanum, and bay leaf bring out the woody blend of the base while adding the spice. To ensure the impact of the entire assortment, fragrant geranium and white floral jasmine and lily make up the alluring middle notes for the perfect daytime wear fragrance.
Ingredients: laurel, cardamom, bergamot, galbanum,geranium, lily, jasmine,virginia cedar, vetiver, sandalwood

Name: Creed Aberdeen Lavender
Description: Creed introduced Aberdeen Lavander in 2014 to add to its Oriental Fougere collection. Rosemary, artemisia, bergamot and lemon top notes start the scent off with herbal touches and a citrus edge. This dissipates into a floral bouquet of middle notes dominated by its namesake scent, lavender. Rounding out the heart are subtle glimpses of rose and lily. Finally, the base notes are earthy and woody, with patchouli and leather giving the overall aroma and exotic green feel. This fragrance is appropriate for all seasons at any time of day, making it a versatile scent for almost every occasion.
Ingredients: bergamot, rosemary, lemon, artemisia, lavender, lily, tuberose, rose, patchouli, leather, vetiver.

Name: Creed Virgin Island Water
Description: Virgin Island Water is an exotic paradise in an aromatic form. The bright, refreshing cologne, released in 2007, brings you all of the delicious aromas of the tropics. The composition starts with a fruity blend of white bergamot, Sicilian mandarin, and Jamaican lime. Tropical copra adds the smooth, milky scent of coconut. The heart is a rich blend of seductive florals. Jasmine, ylang-ylang, and hibiscus add a velvety freshness before being cooled by a spicy jolt of crisp ginger. The sweet base is an irresistible mix of sugar cane, white rum, and musk. Wear this exciting cologne at any time you need a relaxing escape.
Ingredients: sicilian white bergamot, jamaican lime, sicilian mandarin,hibiscus, ylang ylang, indian jasmine,tonkin musk, tropical wood
Top_note: sicilian white bergamot, jamaican lime, sicilian mandarin

Name: Estelle Vendome Infinite Pleasure Just Girl
Description: This fragrance is a woody floral perfume for women. It has a rich musky blend with a beautiful bouquet of floral notes and a splash of fruit from its top notes of davana and plum to the heart that moves you with accords of tuberose, jasmine sambac, and stargazer lily and the finishing touch that consists of a mix of scents extracted from labdanum, musk, agarwood, cashmere wood, patchouli, ebony tree wood, and Madagascar vanilla.
Ingredients: pineapple, muguet, peach, extravagant,

Name: Estee Lauder Modern Muse Le Rouge Gloss
Description: It consists of the molecule Iso E Super which hovers close to the skin to create an indefinable aura around the wearer. It is characterized by a hyper-modern cedarwood note with a velvety sensation that is comforting & interesting.
Ingredients: rose, jasmine, leather, vinyl, extravagant,
Base_note: patchouli, vanilla, styrax, labdanum, saffron, honey

Name: Estee Lauder Pleasures
Description:
Start your day with absolute vitality with the attractive blend of refreshing masculine fragrance that is rich with water and green notes with touches of perfumed floral scents and glowing peppercorns that open the door to prospect and give you the energy needed to achieve all your daily tasks with success. The perfume is also your perfect companion in special evenings and nights with an ever-lasting scent.
About the Brand:
Estee Lauder is an American company founded in 1946 in New York City. Mrs. Lauder gained early experience in the skincare and cosmetics industry under the patronage of her chemist uncle and skincare specialist. Various wonderful products such as cosmetics and perfumes. The first fragrance by Estee Lauder was announced in 1953.
Ingredients: water drops, grapefruit, green leaves, nectarine, rose, pepper, lavender, ginger, coriander, red pepper, geranium, ebony, oak moss, benzoin, sandalwood
Top_note: water drops, grapefruit, green leaves, nectarine
Middle_note: rose, pepper, lavender, ginger, coriander, red pepper, geranium

Name: Estee Lauder Modern Muse Le Rouge Gloss Vinyl Edition
Description: It consists of Vetiveryl Acetate that could be described as a hybrid molecule, half-natural, half-synthetic. It also contains vetiver oil from the roots of an Indian grass mixed with acetic acid to remove the bitter and leathery aspects of the root.
Ingredients: rose, jasmine, leather, vinyl, extravagant,
Base_note: patchouli, vanilla, styrax, labdanum, saffron, honey

Name: Estee Lauder Pleasure Intense
Description: It focuses on Javanol in a formula that highlights the grapefruit which results in a uniquely fresh interpretation of a sandalwood fragrance, fizzing with crisp, bitter top notes of pink grapefruit peel with the added zest of lime.
Ingredients: lily, tiare, jasmine, rose, romantic,
Top_note: peony, black currant, ylang-ylang, lily, cassis

Name: Estee Lauder Sensuous Nude
Description: This fragrance for women was launched by the brand in 2000 and, as the names suggest, was defined by the company as a tribute to the Ã¢â‚¬Ëœwoman who listens to her inner voiceÃ¢â‚¬â„¢. This rich fragrance lives up to its description with a top of mandarin, bergamot, and garden notes. Then at the heart of the fragrance, you can sense notes of gardenia, rose, and freesia, and the base notes are precious woods, amber, and warm-skin accord.
Ingredients: musk, jasmine, lily-of-the-valley, coconut, honey, natural,
Base_note: amber, vanille, wood, heliotrope, sandalwood, musk

Name: Estee Lauder Beautiful Belle EDP
Description:
Amber and floral fragrance is offered to the elegant women.
The fragrance gives you a charming feminine appearance and enhances your beauty and attractiveness.
Enjoy the stunning scent of fragrance that is extracted from natural ingredients with distinctive scents.
The fragrance starts with refreshing notes of mimosa, lychee and rose.
The heart of the fragrance is enriched with an attractive blend of tuberose, gardenia and orange blossom.
The fragrance ends with a luxurious scent of musk, ambroxan, suede, and orris.
The fragrance is characterized by its high concentration and its scent stays steady with you for as long as possible.
About the Brand:
Estee Lauder is an American company that was founded in 1946 in New York City. Mrs. Lauder gained early experience in the manufacturing of skin care and cosmetics under the patronage of her chemist and skincare specialist uncle, until she was famous for introducing different splendid products, such as cosmetics and perfumes. The first fragrance by Estee Lauder was released in 1953.

Name: Estee Lauder Pleasures Eau Fraiche

About the Brand:
Calvin Klein is an American fashion brand that began its journey at the end of the 1960s. The brand is famous for its simplicity and classic style. Calvin Klein is known internationally for its casual, lingerie and fragrance collections. The watches and jewelry collection became part of the brand's launching in 1997. The companyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s logo "cK" is as well-known as its brand name and decorates many of its products. It released its first fragrance in 1981. Since then, Calvin Klein has launched a series of successful perfumes.

It is a woody spicy leathery scent that opens with elegant vetiver, accompanied by accords of bergamot, cardamom and red hot pepper. The heart captures clary sage and mahogany leaving an impression of freshness and sophistication, while the leather and tobacco form the base.
Ingredients: vetiver, bergamot, cardamom, paprika, clary sage, mahogany, leather, tobacco

Name: Chopard Enchanted Midnight Spell
Description: It is a deep sensuality fragrance. The composition has a harmonious floriental-woody contrast, inspired by scents of glamourous nights. It opens with pear flavor, followed by a floral and powdery heart while the base is classic with patchouli and sandalwood.
Ingredients: raspberry, pink pepper, pear, sunflower, jasmine, heliotrope, cashmeran, amber, sandalwood, patchouli

Name: Chopard 1000 Miglia Extreme
Description: This strong masculine fragrance brings the feeling of intensity and excitement of the competition with vibrant and addictive woody oriental that harmony combines with a fresh floral scent of lavender and powerful note of leather. This scent leaves activity and enthusiasm feeling to achieve your victory.
Ingredients: lavender, asphalt, cedar, leather

Name: Coach Platinum
Description: Inspired by the classic All-American road trip, Coach Platinum is a dynamic new scent that was launched in the summer of 2018. Created by perfumer Bruno Jovanovic, this fragrance appeals to the modern adventurer who is unafraid of where the highway may lead him. Top notes of pineapple, juniper berries, and black pepper provide a refreshing opening. Heart notes of geranium and floral sage combine with masculine base notes of leather, sandalwood, patchouli, and cashmere to create a warmly sensual scent. The fragrance is offered in an iconic mirrored silver bottle featuring the manufacturerÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s famous horse and carriage logo and a leather hangtag charm.
Ingredients: unknown

Name: Coach Floral Set
Description: ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s floral, sweet, citrus and musky fragrance with core notes of Gardenia based on elegant creamy wood, patchouli essence and musky notes. It was launched in 2018.
Ingredients: unknown

Name: Coach Women Set
Description: It was launched in 2016. Coach Fragrance is designed as a scent that represent the youth, modern and authentic and natural beauty. The composition is floral with vibrant top notes of raspberry leaf, pink pepper and pear. The core includes an authentic accord of Turkish rose, laid on the base of suede musk and sandalwood.
Ingredients: unknown

Name: Coach Dreams Gift Set For Women
Description: Coach Dreams was presented in January 2020. The composition brings the blend of bitter orange and pear. The core is enriched by gardenias and cactus flowers, followed by Joshua tree and ambroxan in the base.
Ingredients: unknown

Name: Coach New York
Description: The floral, fruity perfume was inspired by the spontaneous energy and chic downtown style of New York City. It has an amazing blend that's rich in raspberry leaf, pink pepper, and pear to give you an irresistible scent. Its refreshing feeling stays with you for a long time.
Ingredients: unknown

Name: Coach New York
Description: This perfume evokes a sense of freedom that comes from the energy and spontaneity of New York City. It's a modern fragrance that combines fresh, energetic top notes and a skin-like warm sensuality in the amber, woody base notes. It has a great, long-lasting blend that's rich in cool, fresh green nashi pear, contrasted with spicy cardamom, and finishes with a textured vetiver base note, creating an aromatic, woody scent.
Ingredients: unknown

Name: Coach Set For Women
Description: Coach Set for Women is a three-piece gift set that contains a 100ml Eau De Perfum, a 7.5ml Eau De Perfum, and a 100ml body lotion. This gift set is designed to convey the spontaneous energy and cool vibe of New York City. The two Coach perfumes are fruity-floral fragrances for women. They open with top notes of pink pepper, pear, and raspberry leaf, and then reveals a luxurious heart of Turkish rose. The base notes are a blend of suede musk and rich sandalwood, to give the perfume an undeniable allure. This gift set is a perfect companion for keeping you fresh all day and night.
Ingredients: rasepberry leaf, pink pepper, pear,turkish rose,musk, sandalwood

Name: Coach Platinum Set
Description: Coach Platinum Set is a two-piece gift set that was inspired by the spirit of the open road. The set contains a 100ml Eau De Perfum and a 7.5ml Eau De Perfum. As the name suggests, the two Eau de Perfum bottles have a platinum color that gives a magnetic and captivating impression that soon unveils an inside masculine aroma that keeps you fresh all day. This set is the perfect gift to give yourself or your loved ones.
Ingredients: pineapple, juniper berries, black pepper,geranium, sage, cashmeran,vanilla, patchouli, sandalwood, leather

Name: Coach Floral Blush
Description: The attractive perfume is inspired by blushes. It has a unique blend rich in juicy goji berries that meet vibrant peony florals and creamy white woods in this bold, lively scent. The perfume stays for a long time on you with a refreshing amazing scent.
Ingredients: goji berries, grapefruit, peaches, peony, musk, white woods

Name: Coach Coach
Description: Launched in 2007, Coach from Coach is a perfume for the classy woman. The fragrance starts with fresh and energetic notes of mandarin and guava decorated with tender floral nuances of lily and violet leaves. The flower of Genet is in the center, arranged with jasmine and mimosa with just a hint of honey. The precious base includes woody notes, vanilla, amber, and iris. With this unique, beautiful, and elegant falcon design, you will feel the same. A fresh, energetic, and long-lasting scent that suits any occasion.
Ingredients: unknown

Name: Coach Man Blue
Description: It's an aromatic fragrance for men that provides you with a masculine scent to give you the power and strength you want. Its notes of lemon, black pepper, and cedarwood will boost your attractiveness, so your touch is felt everywhere.
Ingredients: unknown

Name: Coach Floral Blush
Description: This floral fragrance inspired by the signature Tea Rose and feminine spirit that adds soft velvaty touches in your Cheeks which fasinates all hearts around you. This fragrance comes with fresh and cools scent of grapefruit that mixes with delicious peach.
Ingredients: goji berries, grapefruit, peaches, peony, musk, white woods

Name: Coach New York Signature Rose D'or
Description: This Incredible fragrance was created by Coach in 2012. Its amazing scent includes a mix of Orange blossom and geranium appear first and are spiced with saffron and coriander. the center incorporates romantic notes of centifolia rose notes surrounded with jasmine and peony, sweetened skillfully with raspberry zest.
Ingredients: unknown

Name: Dunhill Travel Set
Description: This four-piece set from Dunhill is your perfect choice for your travels. It contains Icon, Icon Absolute, Elite and Racing. Icon is a woody aromatic scent that perfectly expresses natural refinement. Its blend of neroli, cardamom and leather is designed to ideally suit the sophisticated gentleman. Icon Absolute is a woody spicy scent that will awaken your senses, thanks to its accords of bergamot, tobacco leaf and leather. Elite Eau de Parfum is a luxurious woody spicy masculine fragrance designed for the elegant man and his timeless style, with its notes of bergamot, black pepper and sandalwood. Racing is a woody aromatic fragrance designed for the practical man who has a charismatic effect that impresses everyone, thanks to its notes of grapefruit, lavender and vetiver.
Ingredients: unknown

Name: Dunhill Fresh
Description: Dunhill Fresh by Alfred Dunhill is an exceptionally refreshing woody fragrance for men. With green notes propagating throughout, mint, sage, basil, and lavender clamber to the top of the bouquet. Floral notes abound with the unmistakable aroma of fressia and mimosa accompanied by the elegant subtleties of violet and iris. Base notes of amber, oakmoss, and cedar add a familiar sense of sophistication, while coumarin, vetiver finish to provide an exotic and tasteful memory. After launching in 2005, Dunhill Fresh has helped to define the scent of the modern gentleman. This cologne has been praised for its ability to provide a long-lasting, but not overpowering scent for the whole day.
Ingredients: basil, green notes, lavender, mint, sage,freesia, iris, mimosa, violet,amber, oakmoss, coumarin, patchouli, vetiver, cedar
Top_note: basil, green notes, lavender, mint, sage

Name: Dunhill Edition
Description: Dunhill Edition is a sophisticated fragrance for the man who craves quality in every aspect of his life. This aromatic Fougere delights with a rich mix of lavender and nutmeg then excites with a citrus explosion of bergamot and Amalfi lemon. The full-body experience blossoms from a carnation bouquet featuring lily-of-the-valley, clary sage, and jasmine. Earthy undertones of oakmoss, Tonka beans, fir and Virginia cedar float above a bed of fragrant embers. Dunhill Edition was originally released in 1984. The famed Alain Astori is the nose that crafted this classic cologne. This well-balanced concoction is noted for its moderate longevity and spread, so you can apply comfortably without worry.
Ingredients: unknown

Name: Dunhill London Icon Gift Set
Description: The classic gift set from Dunhill contains London Icon Eau de Parfum (100ml), Eau de Parfum (30ml), and shower gel (90ml). The men's fragrance Dunhill London Icon opens with the ultimate blend of rare and expensive ingredients with a unique twist of masculinity and originality.
Ingredients: neroli, italian bergamot, black pepper, petitgrain, lavender, cardamom, sage, juniper berry, iris, leather, vetiver, oud, oak-moss
Top_note: neroli, italian bergamot, black pepper, petitgrain

Name: Dunhill Century For Men
Description: Specially formulated to embody the spirit of the future itself, Dunhill Century is a refreshing blend that strikes a beautiful balance between clean and heady, approachable and exotic. It makes an energetic first impression via crisp top notes of juicy grapefruit and mandarin enhanced by just the right touch of sweet bergamot. It then finishes strong with toasty base notes of sandalwood, neroli, and exotic olibanum. This is a fragrance thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s an ideal fit for the modern man Ã¢â‚¬â€œ optimistic, innovative, and completely one of a kind. The scent itself is presented in a simple but striking bottle of clear glass that artfully juxtaposes a series of curves and contours.
Ingredients: bergamot, grapefruit, mandarin, neroli, cardamom, olibanum, sandalwood, musk, cypriol.

Name: Dunhill London Icon Elite
Description:
Icon Elite was launched in 2016 representing the spirit of Dunhill brand and olfactive face of the contemporary British that celebrates the elegant man and his timeless style. The fragrance was characterized as woody and very masculine. Among keynotes of the new edition, vetiver and sandalwood were harmoniously blended and skillfully spiced with sweet cardamom.
Anout the brand:
Dunhill is a British luxury goods brand, specializing in ready-to-wear, custom and bespoke menswear, leather goods, and fragrances. The company is based in London, where it also owns and operates a leather workshop. Dunhill is currently owned by Richemont Holdings Limited and managed by CEO Andrew Maag.
Ingredients: bergamot, kaffir lime, cardamom, vetiver absolute, blue sage, black pepper, ebony wood, sandalwood, black suede
Middle_note: vetiver absolute, blue sage, black pepper

Name: Dunhill Century Blue

Ingredients: black pepper, mandarin, bergamot, iris, strex, neroli, ginger, sea salt, ambroxan, patchouli, moss oak

Name: Dunhill Icon Racing Red

The composition combines upper notes of grapefruit, a heart of geranium and base of vetiver, bringing to you a fascinating scent with a long-lasting effect to make you spend a great time.
Ingredients: solar accord, black pepper, grapefruit, mandarin, orange, petitgrain, cypress, geranium, olibanum, pepper fusion, amber, cedarwood, cedar fusion, tanka beans, musks. moss, vetiver

Name: Dunhill Desire Blue Gift Set
Description: The classic gift set from Dunhill contains Blue Eau de Toilette (100ml), aftershave (90ml), and body spray (195ml). This aquatic, amber-like fragrance, Desire Blue Cologne by Alfred Dunhill, was inspired by a manÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s self-awareness. The fresh, deep notes of the bergamot and orange flower water impart a sparkling dimension while amber crystals, musk, and tonka bean warm and soothe the sense.
Ingredients: lychee, mandarin, lotus, bergamot, orange, brazilian rosewood, sea breeze, tonka bean, amber, musk, benzoin

Name: Dunhill For Men
Description: Alfred Dunhill released Dunhill cologne in 1934 and it quickly became a classic that has worn well over the years. Fresh top notes of geranium, Clary sage, lavender, and lemon are lightly floral in a masculine, classic way. The full-bodied center notes of carnation and iris add spice to the blend, with a touch of cedar for warmth. The base notes of musk, tonka bean, oakmoss, and leather are thoroughly masculine while retaining warmth and subtlety that women love. There is just a hint of powder in the finish that appeals to women of all ages. Dunhill is the ideal fragrance for the man who is the strong, silent type.
Ingredients: lavender, geranium, nutmeg, amalfi lemon, iris, rose, woody notes, jasmine, sandalwood, oak moss, virginia cedar, tonka bean, leather

Name: Dunhill 51.3 N
Description: Alfred Dunhill released Dunhill 51.3 N in 1934 and it quickly became a classic that has worn well over the years. The top notes are rhubarb, grapefruit, and ozone accord. The full-bodied center notes pink and black pepper, lavender, and cedar add warm, spicy, and sweet aromas to the blend. The base notes of sandalwood and vanilla set a classic finish to the fragrance. Dunhill 53.1 N is the ideal fragrance for the man who is the classic type. The fragrance has an impressive sillage and will become a favorite for you and your lady.
Ingredients: grapefruit, ozone, rhubarb,lavender, pink pepper, black pepper, cedar,sandalwood, vanilla
Middle_note: lavender, pink pepper, black pepper, cedar

Name: Dunhill Black
Description: This men's fragrance Dunhill Black plays with sensual and emotional contrasts, rugged yet soft, commanding yet tactile and yielding. Unashamedly masculine, it's a multi-faceted fusion that intrigues excites, and entices. The fragrance is crisp and fresh with the fragrance of green nettle, jasmine, and lavender, with luxurious suede for male richness.
Ingredients: nettle, lavender, jasmine, suede, guaiac wood, virginia cedar

Name: Dunhill Desire Blue Gift Set
Description: The classic gift set from Dunhill contains Blue Eau de Toilette (100ml), aftershave (90ml), shower gel (90 ml), and a bag. This aquatic, amber-like fragrance, Desire Blue Cologne by Alfred Dunhill, was inspired by a manÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s self-awareness. The fresh, deep notes of the bergamot and orange flower water impart a sparkling dimension while amber crystals, musk, and tonka bean warm and soothe the sense.
Ingredients: lychee, mandarin, lotus, bergamot, orange, brazilian rosewood, sea breeze, tonka bean, amber, musk, benzoin

Expertly crafted by the leading perfumer, Carlos Benaim, the cologne is designed for the Dunhill gentleman, a man of understated majesty and remarkable charisma.

Name: Dunhill Desire Gold EDT
Description:
It's a luxurious fragrance enriched with a woody spicy smell.
This fragrance is designed for modern and passionate men.
The fragrance gives you elegance and an attraction that draws attention to you.
The fragrance combines the mysterious notes of bergamot and oak moss with notes of sweet vanilla and a hint of precious musk at the end.

Name: Dunhill Pure
Description: Dunhill Pure is a bright and revitalizing fragrance great for any young man to enjoy all summertime long. This scent was launched by Alfred Dunhill in 2006, and its fresh quality is attractive to almost anyone and ideal for daytime wear. This cologne contains notes of a lotus leaf with spicy cardamom and white pepper. These qualities are topped off by the bright scent of a lotus flower, perfecting that summery garden aroma. This cologne possesses a soft to moderate sillage, so the scent is gentle and enjoyable but not overly potent. Its longevity is moderate but it should last long enough to make its use well worth your while.
Ingredients: white pepper, iris, lotus leaf, cardamom

Name: Dunhill Desire Blue
Description: Launched in 2002, Desire Blue is a contemporary aromatic green fragrance for men. The opening notes are a complex blend of fruit and florals. LycheeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s sugary sweetness is balanced by the juicy tartness of mandarin and bright, freshness of bergamot. Lotus lends its lightly floral and aqueous qualities for exotic appeal. Sea notes added to orange and Brazilian Rosewood are warm and salty giving the fragrance a youthful, energetic twist on a traditional combination. Aromatic tonka bean, benzoin, and amber provide a smooth powdery base with hints of chocolate that linger long after the other scents have evaporated. It is suitable for casual workdays and weekends.
Ingredients: unknown

Name: Dunhill Icon Racing Blue
Description: This fragrance is designed for the man who enjoys his life and loves to spend good time. The compelling composition has notes of bergamot in the top, neroli in the middle and patchouli in the base, providing a refreshing scent that keeps you elegant, chic and in a good mood for a long time.
Ingredients: bergamot, calamans sicilian lime, ambroxan, coriander, sea salt, neroli, green cardamom, indian sandalwood, ambre gris, patchouli coeur, seashore woods

Ingredients: bergamot, carrot, orris, moss, sandalwood, patchouli, cypriol oil or nagarmotha

Name: Dunhill X
Description: The gift set from Dunhill contains X-centric fragrance (100ml) and aftershave (150ml). It's a memorable fragrance for men that gets you noticed. Woods and spice dominate this heady combination of scents. The top notes grab your attention with the aroma of green leaves, cardamom, and nutmeg. The middle notes of rose and lotus stop you in your tracks. Finally, the base notes of musk and sandalwood keep people coming back for more. It's a truly memorable fragrance that lasts all day long.

Name: Dunhill Desire Blue Ocean

Heart notes of sea breeze and orange refreshingly harmonize with top notes of lime and peppermint over an aromatic and woody base of vetiver and patchouli. This warm, fresh and spicy blend will rise throughout the day due to your body warmth and is an ideal complement to spring and summer outdoor activities. The base notes also include hints of ambroxan, a musk-like aroma reminiscent of tobacco and clean laundry, along with tonka bean, a cinnamon-like essence that evokes almond and vanilla.
Ingredients: peppermint, tonic, lime, granny smith apple, orange blossom, bitter sea breeze accord, ambroxan, vetiver, patchouli, tonka bean.

About the Brand:
Established in Chicago in 1968 by Bernard Mitchell, Jovan Musk is a sophisticated production line for the production of perfumes. In 1972, Bernard Mitchell began designing different perfumes for both genders and he also offers different types of aftershave and deodorant products. Their scents are commonly sold in pharmacies and supermarket chains and are described as a mixture of uncommon spices and woods that meet the authentic strength of musk.
