It features top notes of lychee, followed by damask rose in the heart and benzoin in the middle, bringing to you a delicate scent that leaves your soft touch felt wherever you go.
Ingredients: raspberry, lychee, damask rose, akigalawood, benzoin

Name: Thierry Mugler Angel Nova
Description: Express your true femininity with this amazing scent. The composition features top notes of lychee, followed by damask rose in the heart and benzoin in the middle, bringing to you a delicate scent that leaves your soft touch felt wherever you go.
Ingredients: raspberry, lychee, damask rose, akigalawood, benzoin

Name: Thierry Mugler Alien Fusion
Description: Mugler Alien Fusion Eau de Parfum Spray will captive your senses from the first time. Its floral, spicy oriental scent will create intriguing sensuality. It opens up with the top notes of ginger and cinnamon, before welcoming tuberose and orange blossom bursts, wrapped in base notes of vanilla and white amber.
Ingredients: ginger, cinnamon, orange blossom, tuberose, white amber and vanilla.

Name: Thierry Mugler Angel Eau CroisiÃ¨re
Description: A sunny blend of fragrances. It was inspired by embodying refined yet carefree evasion that gives a fresh take on cruise spirit. The perfume was designed with a perfect blend that's rich in mango, grapefruit, black currant sorbet, patchouli, and pralines to give elegant women the proper effect with an attractive, refreshing scent.
Ingredients: watermelon, mandarin orange, cassia, jasmine, honey, fruits, raspberry and orchid, patchouli, vanilla, tonka bean, dark chocolate and caramel.
Base_note: patchouli, vanilla, tonka bean, dark chocolate and caramel.

Name: Thierry Mugler Alien EDT
Description: This fragrance is a magic elixir in a bottle. Alien is based on the composition of warm, white amber in the base, woody notes in the heart, and sunny Indian jasmine in the top.
Ingredients: jasmine, wood, amber

Name: Thierry Mugler Angel
Description: An elegant, delicate, sensual, and soft perfume was designed with a refillable bottle resembling a dazzling star in the night sky. It has a perfect blend that's enriched with bergamot and helional, to give you a refreshing, charming scent, keeping your attraction on for a long time.
Ingredients: jasmine, golden cashmere, blonde woods, and amber, vanilla, orange, orange blossom

Name: Thierry Mugler A Men Ultimate
Description: The extraordinary embodiment of a modern-day superhero. A vibrant, magnetic perfume was designed specifically for modern, seductive masculinity. Its direct inspiration is the whiskey flask, which is considered a masculine totem marked with a star. The fragrance is full of bergamot, cedar, cappuccino, and balsam fir to provide you with the perfect, attractive scent for more confidence and charm.
Ingredients: fruity, woddy notes, malt, oriental accords, smoky accords, peat.

Name: Thierry Mugler Angel Arty 2017
Description: It's a perfect perfume that was specially designed for classy men and women to impress them with its wonderful citrusy scent. It is soft and easy to wear. It gives a heavenly scent and tickles your senses with its woody and musky aromas. The fragrance is formulated with perfect components to make it stable for many hours, keeping your charm and attraction on.
Ingredients: honey, chocolate, caramel, vanilla, sandalwood, and patchouli, fresh citrus, melons, peaches, and plums.
Base_note: fresh citrus, melons, peaches, and plums.

Name: Thierry Mugler Alien We Are All Alien Collector Edition
Description: A white floral, woody perfume was launched in 2018 packaged in a colorful, rechargeable bottle for elegant women. It's full of notes of jasmine, golden cashmere, blond woods, and amber to make you more attractive than you can imagine with the perfect refreshing scent and high self-confidence.
Ingredients: pink pepper, syringa and lotus flower, white amber and hinoki wood

Name: Thierry Mugler Alien Mirage
Description: It's radiating with light and an ode to the creative strength of each and every woman, like a new invitation to all that is new and perfect. The fresh and surprising perfume was inspired by the vastness of a scorching desert, and a mirage entertain us with its freshness after a storm, giving life to an extraordinary flower bearing a message of hope.
Ingredients: ginger and cinnamon, osmanthus and leather, coffee and beech.

Name: Victoria's Secret Gift Set
Description: Victoria's Secret gift set includes four pieces of Eau de Parfum (Bombshell, Love, Tease and Angel Gold) in the size of 75 ml. This set contains 4 different aromas that catch your breath from the first moment. Its diversity will make you a new woman every day.
Ingredients: freesia, magnolia, ivy, yellow plum, pink peony, frangipani, angelica, woody notes, and white musk.
Base_note: angeli+a4367:s4370ca, woody notes, and white musk.

Name: Victoria's Secret Dream Angels Desire
Description: This aromatic floral fragrance is inspired by natural flowers with calm delicate notes of magnolia and peony mixed with original woody notes of musk to offer you a special olfactory experience.
Ingredients: star fruit, jasmine, madagascar vanilla

Name: Victoria's Secret Aloha From Paradise
Description: This refreshing mist is your fastest way to paradise. Its fragrance is like the watery fruits, beach woods, and sundrenched blooms. You will be happy to add it to your fragrance wardrobe.
Ingredients: water notes, calabrian bergamot, grapefruit, fig leaves, violet leaves, saddle, patchouli, black pepper, ambroxan, musk, incense, tonka bean and saffron.
Top_note: watery notes, calabrian bergamot, grapefruit and fig leaves
Middle_note: violet leaves, sedge, patchouli, black pepper and ambroxan
Base_note: musk, incense, tonka bean and saffron

Name: Victoria's Secret Love Star
Description: It is a new floral oriental fragrance for women, that will capture your feminity. Enjoy a unique blend of apple, white lily, and rum.
Ingredients: rum, apple, white lily.

Name: Tom Ford Metallique
Description: Tom Ford Metallique Eau de parfume for women contains a soft scent of vanilla layer and creamy sandalwood that gives the parfume a fabulous and wonderful soft touch. This floral fragrance blends with white flowers gives the product an attractive calm scent.
Ingredients: aldehydes, bergamot, pink pepper, hawthorn, lily of the valley, heliotrope, ambrett, peru balsam, vanilla, sandalwood
Middle_note: hawthorn, lily of the valley, heliotrope

Name: Tom Ford Costa Azzura
Description: It is a white floral and woody fragrance that is composed of a mixture of ylang-ylang and tuberose with intoxicating Bulgarian rose. Depth and strength are provided by vanilla and cedar. It was launched in 2015.
Ingredients: seaweed, driftwood, agarwood (oud), ambrette (muskmallow), celery seeds, cardamom, juniper, myrtle, lavender, lemon, yellow mandarin, artemisia, mastic or lentisque, olibanum, incense, vanilla, vetiver, oak.
Top_note: seaweed, driftwood, agarwood (oud), ambrette (muskmallow), celery seeds, cardamom
Middle_note: juniper, myrtle, lavender, lemon, yellow mandarin, artemisia
Base_note: mastic or lentisque, olibanum, incense, vanilla, vetiver, oak.

Name: Tom Ford Fleur De Portofino
Description: It is a new masculine fragrance for men that was launched in 2019. It represents a perfectly groomed gentleman. Described as classic, sharp, and maverick. It combines classic aromatic Fougere accords such as lavender, moss, and amber which are incorporated in rosemary, geranium, mint, oakmoss, basil, and patchouli
Ingredients: violet leaf, orange leaf, tangerine, sicilian lemon, bergamot, syringa, moroccan rose, orange blossom, magnolia, black locust, osmanthus, jasmine, civet, tolu balsam, vanilla, ambrette, labdanum, black locust honey
Top_note: violet leaf, orange leaf, tangerine, sicilian lemon, bergamot, syringa
Middle_note: moroccan rose, orange blossom, magnolia, black locust, osmanthus, jasmine
Base_note: civet, tolu balsam, vanilla, ambrette, labdanum, black locust honey

Name: Tom Ford Mandarino Di Amalfi
Description: It is a citrus aromatic Eau de Parfum for women and men that was launched in 2014. The nose behind this fragrance is Calice Becker. It combines tarragon, mint, black currant, grapefruit, lemon and basil along with black pepper, coriander, orange blossom, clary sage, shiso and jasmine. The base is enriched with vetiver, amber, labdanum, musk and civet.
Ingredients: lemon, grapefruit, basil, black currant, mint, terragon, shiso, clary sage, orange blossom, jasmine, coriander, black pepper, civet, musk, labdanum, amber, vetiver
Top_note: lemon, grapefruit, basil, black currant, mint, terragon
Middle_note: shiso, clary sage, orange blossom, jasmine, coriander, black pepper

Name: Tom Ford Vert Des Bois
Description: This is a new fragrance that was launched in 2016. It represents a provocative scent of woods and avant-garde processing of green perfume. It opens with clean buds of poplar and Ouzo accord with the smell of anise, along with plum and olive leaf. The heart of white flowers is defined by jasmine, enriched with green mastic. Roasted tonka bean and patchouli end the composition. This edition is available in a 250ml splash.
Ingredients: plum, olive tree, anise, poplar buds, jasmine, mastic or lentisque, woody notes, onka bean, patchouli
Top_note: plum, olive tree, anise, poplar buds

Name: Tom Ford Oud Fleur
Description: It is a balsamic woody chypre fragrance for women and men that was launched in 2013. The fragrance blooms with rose, patchouli, agarwood (oud), sandalwood, and resins.
Ingredients: resins, sandalwood, agarwood (oud), patchouli, rose

Name: Tom Ford Venetian Bergamot
Description: It is a woody, citrus fragrance that combines bergamot essence Italy orpur, petitgrain citronnier oil orpur, ylang Madagascar organic essence, magnolia China orpur essence, cedarwood Virginia essence orpur, and tonka bean Venezuela roasted absolute. It is available in a 250ml splash edition.
Ingredients: ginger, pink pepper, black pepper, bergamot, magnolia, pepperwood, cedar, gardenia, ylang- ylang, cashmeran, amber, tonka bean, sandalwood
Top_note: ginger, pink pepper, black pepper, bergamot
Middle_note: magnolia, pepperwood, cedar, gardenia, ylang- ylang

Name: Tom Ford Vert Boheme
Description: It is a free-spirited interpretation of a green scent, sparkling like a jewel in the sun. Sicilian mandarin and magnolia reflect the bohemian femininity, enhanced by gustavia wood, known as "The Tree of Heaven," with flowers that last only one day. Additional notes such as galbanum, violet leaf, and honeysuckle are also placed.
Ingredients: violet leaf, galbanum, honeysuckle, woody notes, magnolia, sicilian mandarin

Name: Tom Ford Sole Di Positano
Description: It is a floral, citrus fragrance that was launched in 2017. It opens its notes with citrus fruits such as Calabrian bergamot, bitter orange, mandarin, and lemon. The Mediterranean idyll and sunny atmosphere are captured in the heart of the perfume with notes of shiso leaf, orange blossom, ylang-ylang, jasmine, lily of the valley, and neroli. The base ends with a dose of green moss. It is available in a 100ml Eau de Parfum bottle.
Ingredients: petitgrain, bitter orange, bergamot, lemon, mandarin orange, lily-of-the-valley, ylang-ylang, neroli, jasmine, orange blossom, shiso, moss
Top_note: petitgrain, bitter orange, bergamot, lemon, mandarin orange
Middle_note: lily-of-the-valley, ylang-ylang, neroli, jasmine, orange blossom, shiso

Name: Tom Ford Fougere Platine
Description: It is a chypre floral fragrance for women and men that was launched in 2012. The top is filled with saffron, black pepper, and May rose. Turkish rose, Bulgarian rose, and coffee are sitting in the center with base notes of incense, amber, sandalwood, and patchouli.
Ingredients: basil, lavender, bergamot, clary sage, honey, spanish labdanum, olibanum, artemisia, woody notes, tobacco, cedar

Name: Tom Ford Santal Blush
Description: It is an enchanting, mysterious, glamorous, and exotic woody-spicy scent that was launched in 2011. It is ruled by creamy notes of sandalwood, cinnamon, and spices, with rich floral, musk, amber, and woody tones.
Ingredients: fenugreek, carrot seed, spices, carawy, cinnamon, rose, ylang-ylang, jasmine, agarwood (oud), benzoin, cedar, sandalwwod, musk
Top_note: fenugreek, carrot seed, spices, carawy, cinnamon

Name: Tom Ford White Suede EDP
Description: This fragrance was launched in September 2009 for women. Its collection is based upon the essence of musk, which is one of Tom Ford's favorite ingredients. It is a very feminine perfume. White suede is blended out of rose, saffron, thyme, mate tea, olibanum, lily-of-the-valley, amber, suede, and sandalwood to form the fragrance. This edition is available in a 100ml bottle.
Ingredients: thyme, tea, lily-of-the-valley, saffron, rose, suede, musk, sandalwood, amber, olibanum

Name: Tom Ford Costa Azzura EDP
Description: It is a white floral and woody fragrance that is composed of a mixture of ylang-ylang and tuberose with intoxicating Bulgarian rose. Depth and strength are provided by vanilla and cedar. It was launched in 2015.
Ingredients: seaweed, driftwood, agarwood (oud), ambrette (muskmallow), celery seeds, cardamom, juniper, myrtle, lavender, lemon, yellow mandarin, artemisia, mastic or lentisque, olibanum, incense, vanilla, vetiver, oak.
Top_note: seaweed, driftwood, agarwood (oud), ambrette (muskmallow), celery seeds, cardamom
Middle_note: juniper, myrtle, lavender, lemon, yellow mandarin, artemisia
Base_note: mastic or lentisque, olibanum, incense, vanilla, vetiver, oak.

Name: Tom Ford Ombre Leather Set
Description:
A luxurious elegant gift set includes (Ombre Leather 100ml + Body Mist 150ml)
The fragrance is rich in an exceptional scent that makes one feel different, alluring, and interesting.
The aromatic notes of black leather, patchouli, and vetiver will make this scent addictive at first.
Jasmine sambac blossoms in the fragrance evoke the beauty of the wild desert.
Amber and moss evoke the heat of rocks and sand.
With this wonderful body mist you will have an unparalleled feeling of freshness and vitality.
Ingredients: patchouli, vetiver, leather, jasmine sambac, amber, moss

Name: Tom Ford Tobacco Vanille All Over Body Spray
Description: It is an spicy oriental body spray for women and men that was launched in 2007. The nose behind this fragrance is Olivier Gillotin. Tobacco leaf and spicy notes are on the top with middle notes of tonka bean, tobacco blossom, vanilla, and cacao. Dried fruits and woody notes form the base.
Ingredients: spicy notes, tobacco, vanilla, tobacco blossom, tonka bean, cacao, dried fruits, woody notes
Middle_note: vanilla, tobacco blossom, tonka bean, cacao

Name: Tom Ford For Men
Description: It's a Natural Eau de Parfum that with a composition that begins with notes of Ginger, Mandarin Orange, Lemon Leaf Oil, Basil, Bergamot, Violet Leaf, the heart notes of Tunisian Orange Blossom, Pepper, Tobacco Leaf, Grapefruit Blossom that represents the essence of the parfume, and the base notes of Amber, Virginian Patchouli, Oakmoss, Vetiver, Cedar, Leather, Cypriol Oil Or Nagarmotha which stays with you throughout the day.
Ingredients: ginger, mandarin orange, lemon leaf oil, basil, bergamot, violet leaf, tunisian orange blossom, pepper, tobacco leaf, grapefruit blossom, amber, virginian patchouli, oakmoss, vetiver, cedar, leather, cypriol oil or nagarmotha
Top_note: ginger, mandarin orange, lemon leaf oil, basil, bergamot, violet leaf
Middle_note: tunisian orange blossom, pepper, tobacco leaf, grapefruit blossom
Base_note: amber, virginian patchouli, oakmoss, vetiver, cedar, leather, cypriol oil or nagarmotha

Name: Tom Ford Rive D'ambre
Description: Tom Ford Rive D'Amber is a golden-colored fragrance inspired by colonial elegance. It contains the precious citrus fruits with a warm and alluring, and seductive amber background. The parfume is for both men and women.
Ingredients: citruses, amber, bergamot, lemon, orange, tarragon, mint, cardamom, tolu balsam.

Name: Tom Ford Patchouli Absolu
Description: Tom Ford Patchouli Absolu parfume is one of the beloved new fragrances of patchouli. The production of this parfume transforms raw materials famous for their rich and mysterious sensitivity and long history in parfumery industry into a modern parfume. The parfume is for both men and women.
Ingredients: patchouli, laura leaf, rosemary, guaiac wood, capriol oil, cashmere wood, tonka, algae, amber, musk.
Middle_note: guaiac wood, capriol oil, and cashmere wood.

Name: Tom Ford Azure Lime
Description: It's a Natural Eau de Parfum that with a composition that begins with notes of Citrus, the heart notes of Floral, Wood that represents the essence of the parfume, and the base notes of Musk which stays with you through out the day.
Ingredients: citrus, floral, wood, musk

Name: Tom Ford Black Orchid
Description: It's a Natural Eau de Parfum that with a composition that begins with notes of Jasmine, Black Truffle, Ylang-ylang, Black Currant, Effervescent Citrus, the heart notes of Black Orchid that represents the essence of the parfume, and the base notes of Patchouli, Sandalwood, Dark Chocolate, Incense, Amber, Vetiver, Vanilla, Balsam which stays with you through out the day.
Ingredients: jasmine, black truffle, ylang-ylang, black currant, effervescent citrus, black orchid, patchouli, sandalwood, dark chocolate, incense, amber, vetiver, vanilla, balsam
Top_note: jasmine, black truffle, ylang-ylang, black currant, effervescent citrus
Base_note: patchouli, sandalwood, dark chocolate, incense, amber, vetiver, vanilla, balsam

Name: Tom Ford Beau De Jour
Description: It is a new masculine fragrance for men that was launched in 2019. It represents a perfectly groomed gentleman. It's described as a classic, sharp, and maverick scent. It combines classic aromatic fougÃƒÂ¨re accords such as lavender, moss, and amber incorporated in rosemary, geranium, mint, oakmoss, basil, and patchouli
Ingredients: lavender, lavender extract, rosemary, basil, oakmoss, mint, geranium, patchouli, amber

Name: Tom Ford White Suede
Description: This fragrance was launched in September 2009 for women. Its collection is based upon the essence of musk, which is one of Tom Ford's favorite ingredients. It is a very feminine perfume. White suede is blended out of rose, saffron, thyme, mate tea, olibanum, lily-of-the-valley, amber, suede, and sandalwood to form the fragrance. This edition is available in a 100ml bottle.
Ingredients: thyme, tea, lily-of-the-valley, saffron, rose, suede, musk, sandalwood, amber, olibanum

Name: Tom Ford White Suede All Over Body Spray
Description: This body spray fragrance was launched in September 2009. Its collection is based upon the essence of musk, which is one of Tom Ford's favorite ingredients. It is a very feminine perfume. White suede is blended out of rose, saffron, thyme, mate tea, olibanum, lily-of-the-valley, amber, suede, and sandalwood to form the fragrance.
Ingredients: thyme, tea, lily-of-the-valley, saffron, rose, suede, musk, sandalwood, amber, olibanum

Name: Tom Ford Vert D'encens
Description: This new fragrance represents the scented interpretation of the coast of Corsica, sophisticated, aromatic, and wild. The composition includes notes of incense, pine resins, balsam fir, heliotrope, and woods. It was launched in 2016. This edition is available in a 250ml splash.
Ingredients: woody notes, heliotrope, boxwood, balsam fir, wood resin, pine, incense

Name: Tom Ford Vert De Fleur
Description: It is a green floral fragrance for men and women with accords of galbanum, vetiver, and aromatic floral notes. It is available in a 250ml splash edition.
Ingredients: vetiver, galbanum, floral notes

Name: Tom Ford Tuscan Leather All Over Body Spray
Description: This body spray was launched in 2007. It is a fruity leather fragrance that blooms with saffron, raspberry, and thyme. Jasmine is found in the heart along with woody notes, leather, and amber base.
Ingredients: thyme, raspberry, saffron, jasmine, olibanum, leather, woody notes, amber, suede

Name: Tom Ford Tobacco Oud Intense
Description: It is a balsamic, woody fragrance for women and men that was launched in 2017. It combines coriander, tobacco, agarwood (oud), labdanum, amber, sandalwood, cedar, tonka bean, castoreum, and patchouli in its notes. It is available in a 100ml Eau de Parfum bottle.
Ingredients: coriander, tobacco, agarwood (oud), labdanum, amber, sandalwood, cedar, tonka bean, castoreum, patchouli

Name: Tom Ford Sole Di Positano All Over Body Spray
Description: It is a floral, citrus body spray launched in 2017. It opens its notes with citrus fruits such as Calabrian bergamot, bitter orange, mandarin, and lemon. The Mediterranean idyll and sunny atmosphere are captured in the heart of the perfume with notes of shiso leaf, orange blossom, ylang-ylang, jasmine, lily of the valley, and neroli. The base ends with a dose of green moss.
Ingredients: petitgrain, bitter orange, bergamot, lemon, mandarin orange, lily-of-the-valley, ylang-ylang, neroli, jasmine, orange blossom, shiso, moss
Top_note: petitgrain, bitter orange, bergamot, lemon, mandarin orange
Middle_note: lily-of-the-valley, ylang-ylang, neroli, jasmine, orange blossom, shiso

Name: Tom Ford Oud Minerale
Description: It is a woody aquatic fragrance for women and men that was launched in 2017. The nose behind this fragrance is Shyamala Maisondeau. It blooms with sea salt, sea notes, agarwood (oud), pink pepper, styrax, seaweed, balsam fir, pepperwood or hercules club, and ambergris.
Ingredients: sea salt, sea notes, agarwood (oud), pink pepper, styrax, seaweed, balsam fir, pepperwood or hercules club, ambergris
Middle_note: pink pepper, styrax, seaweed, balsam fir

Name: Tom Ford Mandarino Di Amalfi Acqua
Description: It is an aromatic citrus Eau de Toilette for women and men launched in 2014. The nose behind this fragrance is Calice Becker. It combines tarragon, mint, black currant, grapefruit, lemon and basil along with black pepper, coriander, orange blossom, clary sage, shiso and jasmine. The base is enriched with vetiver, amber, labdanum, musk, and civet.
Ingredients: lemon, grapefruit, basil, black currant, mint, terragon, shiso, clary sage, orange blossom, jasmine, coriander, black pepper, civet, musk, labdanum, amber, vetiver
Top_note: lemon, grapefruit, basil, black currant, mint, terragon
Middle_note: shiso, clary sage, orange blossom, jasmine, coriander, black pepper

Name: Tom Ford London
Description: It is a woody, spicy fragrance for women and men launched in 2013. It opens the notes with black pepper, saffron, cardamom, coriander, cumin, and coffee. Geranium, jasmine, incense, and labdanum sit in the middle. The base notes include agarwood (oud), musk, birch, cedar, and Amyris.
Ingredients: cumin, coriander, cardamom, saffron, black pepper, coffee, labdanum, incense, jasmine, geranium, amyris, cedar, birch, musk, agarwood (oud)
Top_note: cumin, coriander, cardamom, saffron, black pepper, coffee

Name: Tom Ford Italian Cypress
Description: This fragrance appeared on the market in September 2008, as part of the Private Blend collection. It is created in associations with Italian Cypress aromas, as fine alchemy of woody resins. Described by the designer as an aromatic chypre, the perfume includes notes of citrus, basil, mint, and woody notes, yielding to a warm heart of Cypress.
Ingredients: italian cypress, woodsy notes, mint, basil, citruses

Name: Tom Ford Champaca Absolute
Description: It is a floral fragrance for women and men introduced in 2009. Its top is enriched with cognac, bergamot, and dyerÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s greenweed. Champaca, orchid, violet, and jasmine are in the heart with base notes of vanilla, amber, sandalwood, and marron glacÃƒÂ©.
Ingredients: dyer's greenweed, bergamot, cognac, jasmine, violet, orchid, champaca, marron glacem sandalwood, amber, vanilla

Name: Tom Ford Black Violet
Description: It is a chypre floral fragrance for women and men that was launched in 2007. The nose behind this fragrance is Clement Gavarry. It opens its top with bergamot, citruses, and fruity notes. Violet comes in the heart with base notes of oakmoss and woodsy notes.
Ingredients: fruity notes, citruses, bergamot, violet, woodsy notes, oak moss

Name: Lacoste Eau De Lacoste L.12.12 Blanc
Description: The White color of this pure classic floral woody fragrance represents freshness, simplicity and elegance. It provides you with a masculine scent full of leadership spirits so you influence everyone around, thanks to its combination of grapefruit, y-lang y-lang and cedar.
Ingredients: grapefruit, cardamom, rosemary, cedar leaf, tuberose absolute, olibanum resinoid, ylang-ylang, vetiver, suede, cedarwood, georgywood

Name: Lacoste Eau De Lacoste Sensuelle
Description: Eau de Lacoste Sensuelle has an elegant, sensual fragrance, that captures the natural intensity of soft floral notes on a relaxed, warm evening. The fragrance has top notes of Blackcurrant, Fig and Pink Pepper. Heart notes are comprised of Turkish Rose, Gladioslus Inflexus, Sweet Pea. On the base are the scents of Nougatine Accord, Patchoulli and Amber.
Ingredients: pink pepper, black currant, turkish rose, sweet pea, gladiolus, nougat, almond, hazelnut, amber

Name: Lacoste Challenge
Description: The fresh blend of this woody spicy scent for men reflects challenge and energy that will fill your spirits. The nice composition of tangerine, ginger and violet leaves will provide you with sensual pleasant harmony, inspiring you to embrace challenges and surprises of life.
Ingredients: tangerine, lemon, bergamot, ginger, lavender, violet leaves, ebony, teak wood

Name: Lacoste Live
Description: This refreshing sweet fragrance is inspired by the short-sleeve polo shirt. The combination of lime, guaiac wood and licorice will provide you an irresistable fragrance that reveals your charismatic character. It comes in a glass cube colored in navy blue bottle.
Ingredients: lime, green leaves, watery notes, guaiac wood, licorice

Name: Lacoste Essential
Description: Woody and aromatic, this masculine scent will make you capture attention all day. Its enticing scent will keep you fresh and fragrant for long time, thanks to its impressive composition which includes bergamot, rose and sandalwood.
Ingredients: cassia, bergamot, tangerine, tomato leaf, pepper, rose, sandalwood, patchouli

Name: Lacoste Eau De Lacoste L.12.12 Pour Elle Elegant
Description: This classic yet fresh and modern fragrance is designed for today's woman to show her feminine freshness. Its nice composition of pink pepper, mimosa and vanilla will boost your confidence, making you feel fresh and self-confident.
Ingredients: citrus complex, pink pepper, cassis bud, violet, lily of the valley, mimosa, vetyver, vanilla, heliotrope.
Top_note: citrus complex, pink pepper, cassis bud
Middle_note: violet,, mimosa, lily of the valley

Name: Lacoste L.12.12 Pour Lui French Panache
Description: This aromatic oriental fragrance is inspired by the french elegance. The fresh composition of mandarin, lemon and patchouli will fill you with the spirit of victory and strength with a long-lasting effect.
Ingredients: mandarin, cardamom, lemon, red windsor apple, field clay accord, french lavander, sandalwood, patchouli
Middle_note: red windsor apple, field clay accord, french lavander

Name: Lacoste Eau De Lacoste L .12.12 Pour Lui Magnetic
Description: It is an aromatic spicy fragrance for men. It opens its notes with bamboo and juniper with a heart of violet and tea; floral base captures vetiver and patchouli.
Ingredients: artemisia, bamboo, juniper, geranium, violet, tea, amber, vetiver, patchouli

Name: Lacoste Pour Femme LÃƒÂ©gÃƒÂ¨re
Description: Feel the joy of life and stay confident with this woody floral fragrance that is designed for the unusal woman. The radiant notes of bergamot, jasmine petals and musk will spread the positive energy everywhere you go, unveiling all the freshness.
Ingredients: citric notes, jasmine, himalayan cedar, sandalwood, musk
Top_note: bergamot, mandarin, grapefruit, red pepper, blackcurrant

Name: Lacoste Eau de Lacoste L.12.12 Blanc Pure
Description: It is a pure classic floral woody fragrance. It opens its notes with grapefruit, and cedar leaf, mixed with the core of Mexican tuberose. Sensual notes of leather and cedar form the base.

About the Brand:
Kenzo is a French luxury fashion house founded in 1970 by Japanese designer Kenzo Takada, known for his Asian influence on traditional European styles. It is one of LVMH's branches, and its creative director is Felipe Oliveira Baptista. Kenzo began designing men's, then children's, and home collections in 1987, followed by designing perfumes in 1988. Her perfumes are known for their unique scents extracted from the finest natural ingredients.
Ingredients: sicilian lemon, lychee, ginger, mandarin orange, damask rose, rose water, chamomile, mimosa, white musk, madagascar vanilla, patchouli, amber.
Top_note: sicilian lemon, lychee, ginger, mandarin orange

Base_note: white musk, madagascar vanilla, patchouli, amber.

Ingredients: exotic fruits, frangipani, white musk, sandalwood

Name: Jimmy Choo I Want Choo EDP
Description:
These delicate soft floral scents come to honor your charming femininity and elegant look.
Start your day with the fresh taste of peach with orange to embody the spirit of spring.
Red lily comes in the heart to touch your heart powerfully, filling it with softness and romance.
The delicate base has notes of vanilla, which adds to the velvety sweetness of the scent and boosts your femininity.

Top notes encompass passionate strawberry combined with tangerine and pink pepper adding exciting and cheerful note to white floral notes in the heart. Ingredients: strawberry, pink pepper, tangerine, jasmine, lily, wood

Name: Jo Malone Red Roses EDC
Description:
The distinctive floral fragrance for women who seek elegance and excellence.
A charming feminine blend that gives you a perfect and very elegant look.
The fragrance opens with refreshing notes of lemon and mint to complete your day with full vitality and activity.
The heart of the fragrance is infused with touches of Bulgarian rose and violet leaves that give you an attractive look.
The fragrance ends with the distinctive scent of beeswax.
This amazing fragrance will be an essential part of your perfume collection.
About the Brand:
Jo Malone joined the EstÃƒÂ©e Lauder Companies, which is available in 69 countries and territories, in 1999. Jo Malone London is a British brand known for its unique fragrances and luxurious products for bath, body, and home. It has written the rules of perfumery by blending unexpected components of ingredients and introducing elegant and playful concepts, the Jo Malone world continues to develop beautifully.
Ingredients: lemon, mint, bulgarian rose, violet leaf

Name: Jo Malone Pomegranate Noir EDC
Description:
Enjoy a delightful aromatic composition of exotic fruits.
The fragrance is enriched with an amazing aromatic blend of natural ingredients with unique aromas.
The fragrance opens with berries, watermelon, and pomegranate to give you a feeling of freshness and happiness.
The heart of the fragrance is infused with touches of carnation and pink pepper to give you a special elegance.
The fragrance ends on a base of luxurious musk and amber.
About the Brand:
Jo Malone joined the EstÃƒÂ©e Lauder Companies, which is available in 69 countries and territories, in 1999. Jo Malone London is a British brand known for its unique fragrances and luxurious products for bath, body, and home. It has written the rules of perfumery by blending unexpected components of ingredients and introducing elegant and playful concepts, the Jo Malone world continues to develop beautifully.
Ingredients: plum, raspberry, watermelon, pomegranate, rhubarb,clove, pink pepper, guaiac wood, frankincense, rose, jasmine, lily of the valley

Name: Elie Saab Le Parfum Gift Set
Description: The gift set from Elie Saab contains a Le Parfum Eau de Parfum (90ml) and Eau de Parfum for woman (10ml). Elie Saab Le Parfum is an enveloping perfume that creates a long-lasting cloud of feminine charm. It contains notes of orange blossom that blend with more complex, mysterious, and warm notes of grandiflorum and sambac jasmine, followed by notes of cedar, patchouli, and honey accords that give this fragrance a sophisticated touch while remaining simple and classy.
Ingredients: orange blossom, jasmine absolute, patchouli, cedar accord, rose honey.

Name: Elie Saab Le Parfum Essentiel
Description: This new feminine perfume fills you with a fresh scent of Mandarin and Gardenia that reveals your femininty and beauty, adding an exciting and attractive touch that reminds you of your romantic nights.

Name: Elie Saab Essence N10 Amande Tonka Perfume
Description: Elie Saab Essence N10 Amande Tonka is an aromatic woody fragrance for both men and women. Very unique perfume with a very charming blend that will keep you feeling attractive all day. Perfect for daily use.

Name: Elie Saab Cuir Absolu
Description: An intensive powerful fragrance to wear at your spcial occasions. It creates a unique strong leather accord to enjoy new scents, you have no experience before.

Description: Elie saab Le Parfum Hair Mist a beautiful, bright, feminine rose musk scent. Will leave your hair in a very beautiful attractive smell. Natural and gentle to use on hair.

Name: Elie Saab Le Parfum L'Eau Couture
Description: A fresh powerful fragrance that opens with fresh citrus notes, Calabrian Bergamot, Magnolia expressing joy and radiance, moving to Orange Blossom in the heart, to end with Green Almond, Vanilla in the base. An adorable mix of notes to leave unforgettable scents wherever you go.
Ingredients: magnolia, bergamot, orange blossom, green almond, vanilla

Name: Elie Saab Essence No.4 Oud
Description: A rich and empowering fragrance, providing comfort and freshness to relax. It open with black pepper for deep freshness, moving to benzoin in the heart, to end with agar wood in he base.
Ingredients: black pepper, benzoin, agar wood

Name: Elie Saab Le Parfume Gift Set
Description:
It's a fragrance set for women featuring (90ml) bottle and another (10ml) bottle of the fragrance, and (75 ml) body lotion.
The collection comes to you in an elegant box so you can offer it to your beloved ones on special occasions.
The composition has notes of delicate jasmine, which symbolize femininity and reveal your delicate soul.
Enjoy your beauty and explore the secret of your elegance with the soft scent on your different occasions.
Ingredients: african orange blossom

Name: Elie Saab Le Parfum Set
Description:
This set includes: Eau de Toilette 90ml + Eau de Toilette 10ml
It is an ultra-feminine fragrance with a floral woody composition. The freshness of orange blossom opens the top while the jasmine heart adds sensuality to the scent, whereas the base consists of cedar, patchouli and rose honey for a deep elegant trail.
Ingredients: orange blossom, jasmine, virginian cedar, white honey, rose, patchouli
Base_note: virginian cedar, white honey, rose, patchouli

Name: Elie Saab Girl Of Now Gift Set
Description: It's a distinctive gourmand floral fragrance with an addictive note of almond, textured with orange blossom and patchouli. Inspired by Lebanese delights, the fragrance begins with roasted pistachio and sparkling pears for an addictive top. The heart, essence of bitter almond, and orange blossom absolute are assembled together to create a new exclusive note. The Ormond Flower reveals a precious facet. Tonka bean and almond milk are mixed together to leave a final almond trail, while patchouli reinforces the ultimate Elie Saab signature.
Ingredients: roasted pistachio, sparkling pear, bitter almond, orange blossom, tonka bean, almond milk.

Name: Elie Saab Le Parfum Resort Collection
Description: A floral fruity and solar fragrance. Inspired by the Elie Saab Ready-To-Wear RESORT Collections, the new Elie Saab edition is the promise of an escapade in the Mediterranean. This is a springtime reinterpretation of the Elie Saab Orange Flower signature enhanced with a sweet and gourmand Fig. The top note of a sweet Fig and a Mandarin zest adds a delicious and fresh sensation. In the heart note, the white and luminous Bouquet of the original fragrance signature is enriched by a solar Frangipani Flower. The base note of Cedar and Amber gives elegance and sensuality to the fragrance trail.
Ingredients: fig, frangipani, jasmine, orange, mandarin, amber, cedar

Name: Elie Saab Cuir Bourbon
Description: A leather sensual fragrance that offer you precious strong scents of black vanilla in a fascinating mix of warm mix to experience new magical feelings.
Ingredients: suede, bourbon vanilla, musk, saffron

Name: Dunhill London Icon Gift Set
Description: The classic gift set from Dunhill contains London Icon Eau de Parfum (100ml), Eau de Parfum (30ml), and shower gel (90ml). The men's fragrance Dunhill London Icon opens with the ultimate blend of rare and expensive ingredients with a unique twist of masculinity and originality.

Name: Dunhill Century For Men
Description: Specially formulated to embody the spirit of the future itself, Dunhill Century is a refreshing blend that strikes a beautiful balance between clean and heady, approachable and exotic. It makes an energetic first impression via crisp top notes of juicy grapefruit and mandarin enhanced by just the right touch of sweet bergamot. It then finishes strong with toasty base notes of sandalwood, neroli, and exotic olibanum. This is a fragrance thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s an ideal fit for the modern man Ã¢â‚¬â€œ optimistic, innovative, and completely one of a kind. The scent itself is presented in a simple but striking bottle of clear glass that artfully juxtaposes a series of curves and contours.
Ingredients: bergamot, grapefruit, mandarin, neroli, cardamom, olibanum, sandalwood, musk, cypriol.

Name: Dunhill London Icon Elite
Description:
Icon Elite was launched in 2016 representing the spirit of Dunhill brand and olfactive face of the contemporary British that celebrates the elegant man and his timeless style. The fragrance was characterized as woody and very masculine. Among keynotes of the new edition, vetiver and sandalwood were harmoniously blended and skillfully spiced with sweet cardamom.
Anout the brand:
Dunhill is a British luxury goods brand, specializing in ready-to-wear, custom and bespoke menswear, leather goods, and fragrances. The company is based in London, where it also owns and operates a leather workshop. Dunhill is currently owned by Richemont Holdings Limited and managed by CEO Andrew Maag.
Ingredients: bergamot, kaffir lime, cardamom, vetiver absolute, blue sage, black pepper, ebony wood, sandalwood, black suede
Middle_note: vetiver absolute, blue sage, black pepper

Description: Pull off a stimulating and attractive woodsman smell with Dunhill Pursuit Cologne, introduced in 2006 with the help of celebrated perfumer Michel Girard. The top notes are bergamot and mandarin orange for a refreshing suggestion of citrus. These ingredients are combined with Spikenard lavender for a delightful sweetness, and cardamom, amber, Peruvian pepper tree and cinnamon for a bit of spicy pleasure. The base is contrived of white cedarwood, patchouli, sandalwood, and vanilla. This is an ideal masculine fragrance for the fall and winter months and is a perfect option to wear either at night or during the day.
Ingredients: sandalwood, amber, musk, green leaves, incense, cedar, petitgrain.
Middle_note: ambrette seed, cardamom, peruvian pepper tree, spikenard lavender, cinnamon
Base_note: patchouli, sandalwood, vanilla, vetiver, white cedarwood

Name: Dunhill Century Blue

The composition combines upper notes of grapefruit, a heart of geranium and base of vetiver, bringing to you a fascinating scent with a long-lasting effect to make you spend a great time.

Name: Dunhill Desire Blue Gift Set
Description: The classic gift set from Dunhill contains Blue Eau de Toilette (100ml), aftershave (90ml), and body spray (195ml). This aquatic, amber-like fragrance, Desire Blue Cologne by Alfred Dunhill, was inspired by a manÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s self-awareness. The fresh, deep notes of the bergamot and orange flower water impart a sparkling dimension while amber crystals, musk, and tonka bean warm and soothe the sense.
Ingredients: lychee, mandarin, lotus, bergamot, orange, brazilian rosewood, sea breeze, tonka bean, amber, musk, benzoin

Name: Dunhill For Men
Description: Alfred Dunhill released Dunhill cologne in 1934 and it quickly became a classic that has worn well over the years. Fresh top notes of geranium, Clary sage, lavender, and lemon are lightly floral in a masculine, classic way. The full-bodied center notes of carnation and iris add spice to the blend, with a touch of cedar for warmth. The base notes of musk, tonka bean, oakmoss, and leather are thoroughly masculine while retaining warmth and subtlety that women love. There is just a hint of powder in the finish that appeals to women of all ages. Dunhill is the ideal fragrance for the man who is the strong, silent type.
Ingredients: lavender, geranium, nutmeg, amalfi lemon, iris, rose, woody notes, jasmine, sandalwood, oak moss, virginia cedar, tonka bean, leather

Name: Dunhill 51.3 N
Description: Alfred Dunhill released Dunhill 51.3 N in 1934 and it quickly became a classic that has worn well over the years. The top notes are rhubarb, grapefruit, and ozone accord. The full-bodied center notes pink and black pepper, lavender, and cedar add warm, spicy, and sweet aromas to the blend. The base notes of sandalwood and vanilla set a classic finish to the fragrance. Dunhill 53.1 N is the ideal fragrance for the man who is the classic type. The fragrance has an impressive sillage and will become a favorite for you and your lady.
Ingredients: grapefruit, ozone, rhubarb,lavender, pink pepper, black pepper, cedar,sandalwood, vanilla
Middle_note: lavender, pink pepper, black pepper, cedar

Name: Dunhill Black
Description: This men's fragrance Dunhill Black plays with sensual and emotional contrasts, rugged yet soft, commanding yet tactile and yielding. Unashamedly masculine, it's a multi-faceted fusion that intrigues excites, and entices. The fragrance is crisp and fresh with the fragrance of green nettle, jasmine, and lavender, with luxurious suede for male richness.
Ingredients: nettle, lavender, jasmine, suede, guaiac wood, virginia cedar

Name: Dunhill Desire Blue Gift Set
Description: The classic gift set from Dunhill contains Blue Eau de Toilette (100ml), aftershave (90ml), shower gel (90 ml), and a bag. This aquatic, amber-like fragrance, Desire Blue Cologne by Alfred Dunhill, was inspired by a manÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s self-awareness. The fresh, deep notes of the bergamot and orange flower water impart a sparkling dimension while amber crystals, musk, and tonka bean warm and soothe the sense.
Ingredients: lychee, mandarin, lotus, bergamot, orange, brazilian rosewood, sea breeze, tonka bean, amber, musk, benzoin

Name: Dunhill Desire Gold EDT
Description:
It's a luxurious fragrance enriched with a woody spicy smell.
This fragrance is designed for modern and passionate men.
The fragrance gives you elegance and an attraction that draws attention to you.
The fragrance combines the mysterious notes of bergamot and oak moss with notes of sweet vanilla and a hint of precious musk at the end.

Name: Dunhill Pure
Description: Dunhill Pure is a bright and revitalizing fragrance great for any young man to enjoy all summertime long. This scent was launched by Alfred Dunhill in 2006, and its fresh quality is attractive to almost anyone and ideal for daytime wear. This cologne contains notes of a lotus leaf with spicy cardamom and white pepper. These qualities are topped off by the bright scent of a lotus flower, perfecting that summery garden aroma. This cologne possesses a soft to moderate sillage, so the scent is gentle and enjoyable but not overly potent. Its longevity is moderate but it should last long enough to make its use well worth your while.
Ingredients: white pepper, iris, lotus leaf, cardamom

With green notes propagating throughout, mint, sage, basil, and lavender clamber to the top of the bouquet. Floral notes abound with the unmistakable aroma of fressia and mimosa accompanied by the elegant subtleties of violet and iris. Base notes of amber, oakmoss, and cedar add a familiar sense of sophistication, while coumarin, vetiver finish to provide an exotic and tasteful memory. After launching in 2005, Dunhill Fresh has helped to define the scent of the modern gentleman. This cologne has been praised for its ability to provide a long-lasting, but not overpowering scent for the whole day.
Ingredients: basil, green notes, lavender, mint, sage,freesia, iris, mimosa, violet,amber, oakmoss, coumarin, patchouli, vetiver, cedar
Top_note: basil, green notes, lavender, mint, sage

The compelling composition has notes of bergamot in the top, neroli in the middle and patchouli in the base, providing a refreshing scent that keeps you elegant, chic and in a good mood for a long time.

Woods and spice dominate this heady combination of scents. The top notes grab your attention with the aroma of green leaves, cardamom, and nutmeg. The middle notes of rose and lotus stop you in your tracks. Finally, the base notes of musk and sandalwood keep people coming back for more. It's a truly memorable fragrance that lasts all day long.

Description: First released in 2018, Desire Blue Ocean is a smooth and well-textured scent. This aquatic and minty male fragrance brings to mind the sensation of open-air and water. Heart notes of sea breeze and orange refreshingly harmonize with top notes of lime and peppermint over an aromatic and woody base of vetiver and patchouli. This warm, fresh and spicy blend will rise throughout the day due to your body warmth and is an ideal complement to spring and summer outdoor activities. The base notes also include hints of ambroxan, a musk-like aroma reminiscent of tobacco and clean laundry, along with tonka bean, a cinnamon-like essence that evokes almond and vanilla.
Ingredients: peppermint, tonic, lime, granny smith apple, orange blossom, bitter sea breeze accord, ambroxan, vetiver, patchouli, tonka bean.

Name: Dunhill Driven EDP

It is a new sweet and sugary aromatic release that gives a special taste of fresh fruits wrapped in the scent of lemon.

The fragrance blend expresses your free spirit that satisfies its passion to discover life without restrictions.
It is suitable for men who have good taste and are looking for the highest levels of elegance and attractiveness on all occasions.

Name: Chopard Orange Mauresque

Name: Chopard Oud Malaki Set

A luxurious men gift set.

This gift set is designed to convey the spontaneous energy and cool vibe of New York City. The two Coach perfumes are fruity-floral fragrances for women. They open with top notes of pink pepper, pear, and raspberry leaf, and then reveals a luxurious heart of Turkish rose. The base notes are a blend of suede musk and rich sandalwood, to give the perfume an undeniable allure. This gift set is a perfect companion for keeping you fresh all day and night.
Ingredients: rasepberry leaf, pink pepper, pear,turkish rose,musk, sandalwood

Description: Coach Platinum Set is a two-piece gift set that was inspired by the spirit of the open road. The set contains a 100ml Eau De Perfum and a 7.5ml Eau De Perfum. As the name suggests, the two Eau de Perfum bottles have a platinum color that gives a magnetic and captivating impression that soon unveils an inside masculine aroma that keeps you fresh all day. This set is the perfect gift to give yourself or your loved ones.

Carolina Herrera is a Venezuelan-born American fashion designer, known for her elegance and sophistication. Before she became a designer, she was known as one of the most beautifully dressed women in the world. Her company is renowned for its sophisticated and elegant classic designs, as well as its fragrances.

About the Brand:
Calvin Klein is an American fashion brand that began its journey at the end of the 1960s. The brand is famous for its simplicity and classic style. Calvin Klein is known internationally for its casual, lingerie and fragrance collections. The watches and jewelry collection became part of the brand's launching in 1997. The companyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s logo "cK" is as well-known as its brand name and decorates many of its products. It released its first fragrance in 1981. Since then, Calvin Klein has launched a series of successful perfumes.

Name: Creed Pure White
Description: A citrus fresh scent launched in 2011, Pure White Cologne, by Creed, is part of the Royal Exclusives Line created to celebrate the houseÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s 250th anniversary. This fragrance is also known as Original Cologne. Top notes of this scent are all citrus, with bittersweet grapefruit, tart lemon, and tangy bergamot. Middle heart notes are pear, neroli, and galbanum, followed by the interesting base note mix of rice, ambergris, white musk, and powdery notes. Best worn as a daytime cologne in the warmer months. A must-have for your perfume vanity!
Ingredients: lemon, bergamot, grapefruit,galbanum, pear, petitgrain,ambergris, white musk, rice powder

Name: Creed Love In White For Summer
Description: Taking the inspiration from CreedÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s best-selling womenÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s fragrance Love In White, The House of Creed debuts the new seasonal Love In White For Summer. A dreamy fresh floral that bottles white-hot nights on the CÃƒÂ´te d'Azur and the quest for eternal summer. This scent transports wearers to the French Riviera where chic white accessories, crisp waves and long holiday escapes reign. Like the sparkling hues of the oceanÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s reflection, iris and cedar shine through at the heart of this serene seasonal scent. A fresh, long-lasting, that does not overpower your presence, a perfect choice for any of your occasions.

Name: Creed Cedre Blanc
Description: Cedre Blanc is a distinguished fragrance by Creed. Subtle, yet empowering, the mix of bold spices and woody cedar are softened by floral accents. A strong base of cedar, sandalwood, and vetiver hold the aromatic adventure together. Top notes of bergamot, cardamom, galbanum, and bay leaf bring out the woody blend of the base while adding the spice. To ensure the impact of the entire assortment, fragrant geranium and white floral jasmine and lily make up the alluring middle notes for the perfect daytime wear fragrance.
Ingredients: laurel, cardamom, bergamot, galbanum,geranium, lily, jasmine,virginia cedar, vetiver, sandalwood

Name: Creed Aberdeen Lavender
Description: Creed introduced Aberdeen Lavander in 2014 to add to its Oriental Fougere collection. Rosemary, artemisia, bergamot and lemon top notes start the scent off with herbal touches and a citrus edge. This dissipates into a floral bouquet of middle notes dominated by its namesake scent, lavender. Rounding out the heart are subtle glimpses of rose and lily. Finally, the base notes are earthy and woody, with patchouli and leather giving the overall aroma and exotic green feel. This fragrance is appropriate for all seasons at any time of day, making it a versatile scent for almost every occasion.
Ingredients: bergamot, rosemary, lemon, artemisia, lavender, lily, tuberose, rose, patchouli, leather, vetiver.

Name: Creed Virgin Island Water
Description: Virgin Island Water is an exotic paradise in an aromatic form. The bright, refreshing cologne, released in 2007, brings you all of the delicious aromas of the tropics. The composition starts with a fruity blend of white bergamot, Sicilian mandarin, and Jamaican lime. Tropical copra adds the smooth, milky scent of coconut. The heart is a rich blend of seductive florals. Jasmine, ylang-ylang, and hibiscus add a velvety freshness before being cooled by a spicy jolt of crisp ginger. The sweet base is an irresistible mix of sugar cane, white rum, and musk. Wear this exciting cologne at any time you need a relaxing escape.
Ingredients: sicilian white bergamot, jamaican lime, sicilian mandarin,hibiscus, ylang ylang, indian jasmine,tonkin musk, tropical wood
Top_note: sicilian white bergamot, jamaican lime, sicilian mandarin

Opening with the fresh, rejuvenating scent of bergamot evokes an atmosphere of high energy and sparkling refreshment. Meanwhile, the middle note of soothing lavender contradicts that intensity with its therapeutic floral remedy. Finally, base notes of marine ambergris, light cedar, sandalwood and vetiver balance the entire fragrance with their neutral accords for an intoxicating aroma thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s powerful yet not overbearing. Perfect for daywear at the office or a casual weekend afternoon.

Description: Un Jardin Apres La Mousson is a Hermes Women's Eau de Toilette Spray that evokes a mesmerizing feeling in anyone who feels it. This feminine scent will wow you with its notes of cardamom, coriander, pepper, ginger, flower, vetiver, and so on.
Ingredients: coriander, ginger, pepper, ginger flower, cardamom, vetiver, citrus
Middle_note: cardamom, coriander, pepper, ginger, ginger flower.

Name: Hermes Eau de citron noir EDC
Description:
Enjoy a special and exciting look with the luxurious and sexy fragrance blend.
The fragrance is fortified with notes of lemon, black tea, citron and Paraguayan wood to enhance the beauty of the scent and give you a special freshness.
The scent reinforces your vitality and absolute enthusiasm and stays in the air for hours in all places.
The scent is perfectly crafted to suit both men and women.
This fragrance is your perfect companion in all of your different occasions and bustling days.
Ingredients: lemon, smoke, lime, citron, guaiac wood, black tea

Name: Hermes Concentre de Pamplemousse Rose
Description: It's an aromatic citrus fragrance that combines a classical approach. The distinctive composition contains notes of grapefruit and rose, blended with vetiver, providing you with a refreshing and lively scent with a long-lasting effect for your long summer day.
Ingredients: grapefruit, rose, vetiver

Name: Creed Royal Mayfair
Description: Introduced in 2015, Royal Mayfair is a fruity, floral fragrance that was created for men and women. Named after the posh, London neighborhood of Mayfair, this gourmand scent is a fresh and imaginative experience. This original scent was a bespoke creation for the Duke of Windsor; however, 80 years after the original was made, it is now available to you. The top notes are composed of gin, lime and pine tree. The heart centers around the perfect floral experience of a rose. The base notes finish with orange, cedar, and eucalyptus.
Ingredients: british gin, jamaican lime, scottish highland pine,duke of windsor roses,bahamian orange, canadian cedar, australian eucalyptus
Top_note: british gin, jamaican lime, scottish highland pine
Base_note: bahamian orange, canadian cedar, australian eucalyptus

Name: Creed Rose Imperiale
Description: This perfume was created to remember the elegance and grandeur of classical Europe and the gilded crowns, thrones, and triumphs of extraordinary monarchs. This luxurious scent is a tribute to the noble rose and its countless devotees throughout history. It has a beautiful, long-lasting blend full of natural ingredients.
Ingredients: white iris, bergamot, angelica, may flowers, tuberose, rose, cedarwood, patchouli, pink pepper, neroli, amber, caramel, cocoa, benzoin
Top_note: white iris, bergamot, angelica, may flowers
Middle_note: tuberose, rose, cedarwood, patchouli, pink pepper, neroli

Name: Creed Millesime Imperial
Description: This amazing perfume was perfectly designed to suit both men and women. This fresh and stylish scent captures warm and sparkling notes richly layered with a sophisticated base. It has a beautiful, long-lasting blend. It was launched on the perfumeryÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s 150th anniversary.
Ingredients: sea salts, fruits, bergamot, sicilian lemon, iris, mandarin, sea breezes, woods, musk

Name: Creed Love In Black
Description: This perfume is an endless length of black velvet strewn with Parma Violets: both the opulent musky purple flowers and the rare tender white blossoms. It was perfectly designed with a long-lasting blend that's rich in blackcurrant buds and clove.
Ingredients: wildflowers, cedarwood, italian violet, musk, carnations, iris, bulgarian flowers, blackcurrant

Name: Creed Himalaya
Description: This perfume combines Himalayan fresh and woody notes for a perfectly balanced rugged, masculine, and exhilarating fragrance. It has a perfect, long-lasting blend full of natural ingredients. The perfume provides you with an attractive, refreshing scent.
Ingredients: bergamot, grapefruit, lemon, mandarin, nutmeg, black pepper, pink pepper, gunpowder, cedarwood, sandalwood, vetiver, amber, tonka bean, musk
Middle_note: nutmeg, black pepper, pink pepper, gunpowder, cedarwood, sandalwood, vetiver

Name: Creed Fleurs De Gardenia
Description: The perfume is a stroll through a British meadow lavished with delicate and fragrant blooms, with your fingertips grazing the petals as you walk. Fleurs de Gardenia is an amalgamation of both future and historic English love stories. It has a great perfect blend that lasts with you for a long time.
Ingredients: black currant, galbanum, pink pepper, pink jasmine, california, rose, lily of the valley, gardenia, cedarwood, patchouli, musk
Middle_note: pink jasmine, california, rose, lily of the valley, gardenia

Name: Creed Aventus
Description: The wonderful perfume was inspired by the theatrical life of an emperor who fought fearlessly. It was perfectly designed with a long-lasting blend that's rich in apple, black currant, bergamot, and pineapple to give you an attractive, refreshing scent. The perfume increases your feeling of confidence.
Ingredients: apple, black currant, bergamot, pineapple, raspberry, patula, patchouli, jasmine, vanilla, musk, oakmoss, amber

Name: Creed Himalaya
Description: This seductive scent embodies fusing the power of man and nature. It has a blend of citrus along with warmer notes of sandalwood and cedarwood, which will provide you with a long-lasting effect that you cannot resist.
Ingredients: bergamot, grapefruit, lemon, mandarin, juniper berry, nutmeg, sandalwood, vetiver, pepper, ambergris, musk, tonka bean
Middle_note: juniper berry, nutmeg, sandalwood, vetiver, pepper

Name: Creed Erolfa
Description: This Eau de parfum is inspired by family memories of sailing on a beautiful yacht. Its scent embodies the sparkling seas, salty air and citrus-scented breeze with its marvelous notes that feature Bergamot, Lemon, Orange, Violet, Cumin, Basil, Rosemary and Melon on the top. The heart has notes of Cyclamen, Jasmine, Ginger, Coriander and Pepper, coming in a base of Cedarwood, Sandalwood, Oakmoss, Amber and Musk.
Ingredients: bergamot, lemon, orange, violet, cumin, basil, rosemary, melon, cyclamen, jasmine, ginger, coriander, pepper, cedarwood, sandalwood, oakmoss, amber, musk
Top_note: bergamot, lemon, orange, violet, cumin, basil, rosemary, melon

Name: Creed Jardin D'Amalfi
Description: Jardin D'amalfi by Creed, released in 2011, brings elements of nature together for a unique and feminine fragrance. It opens with a burst of juicy citrus. Tangerine, lemon, bergamot, and berries combine to capture the fresh crispness of an orchard. Hints of rose add a delicateness to the strong opening, which soon welcomes the green and woody scents of vetiver, cedarwood, and musk. A little cinnamon is added to the mix, giving this perfume a little spice and an exotic elegance. This unisex fragrance adds a lot to the appeal of your look so much that it makes you the focus of everyone's eyes.
Ingredients: mandarin, bergamot, lemon, pink pepper, petit grain, cedar, rose, apple, vetiver, white musk, cinnamon.
Base_note: vetiver from haiti, white musk, cinnamon

Name: Creed Fleurissimo
Description: This fragrance has a sophisticated blend of glamour and elegant aristocracy. It has a magnificent blend of notes that will awaken the essence of femininity in every woman. It has notes of tuberose, violet, iris, and Bulgarian rose, which will draw all eyes in the room upon her.
Ingredients: bergamot, violet leaves, bulgarian rose, tuberose, ylang ylang, florentine iris, ambergris

Name: Creed White Amber
Description: White Amber Perfume by Creed, Creamy, ethereal florals fuse with fruit, aquatic notes and warm wood in White Amber, a floral oriental fragrance that can be worn by women or men. The opening is a bright and uplifting fruity fusion of peach and citrus harmonized with marine undertones of ambroxan. Elegant floral and subtle vanillic notes emerge at the heart, mingling jasmine and benzoin with saltwater nuances. Warm amber and buttery sandalwood merge in the base notes to create a lightly lingering finish thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s perfect for casual spring and summer wear.
Ingredients: amber, vanilla, fruity accord,floral accord, sandalwood, benzoin,floral accord, absolute jasmine, sandalwood, benzoin
Base_note: floral accord, absolute jasmine, sandalwood, benzoin

Name: Creed Royal Mayfair
Description: This perfume captures the essence of classic British style and pays homage to the place where things first began. It was perfectly designed to suit the elegance of a gentleman. The perfume has a great long-lasting blend.
Ingredients: raspberry, green lemon, pine nuts, rose, tuberose, orange, cedarwood, eucalyptus.

Name: Creed Aqua Fiorentina
Description: A fruity-fresh perfume for women and was released in 2009. The fragrance contains a wonderful blend of fruits such as valuable plum, and apple mixed with Rose, white carnation bergamot and lemon then enhanced with Virginia cedar, sandalwood, and delicious grapefruit. The production of this perfume was actually discontinued for a while and re-launched after an adjustment to the formula.
Ingredients: plum, greengage, apple, rose, white carnation, bergamot, lemon, virginia cedar, sandalwood, and grapefruit

Name: Creed Tubereuse Indiana
Description: The sultry, yet soft, Tubereuse Indiana is a tribute to the exotic and carnal tuberose from Comoros. Bergamot and tuberose combine to form the captivating head and heart notes of this Eau de Parfum, whilst vanilla and ambergris deliver sweetness and warmth. Equally floral and rich, this fragrance can be worn by both men and women.
Ingredients: bergamot, indian tuberose, vanilla, ambergris.

Name: Creed Royal Oud
Description: Released in 2011, Royal Oud is a synthesis of Parisian and Persian style and grace. It incorporates elements of a Persian palace with marble, wood, leather, and gold along with the historical components of its personal design house. The rarity of oud makes it a treasured scent note, and to own a fragrance that features it so strongly is a fortunate occurrence. The top notes are a citrusy mixture of lemon, Sicilian bergamot, and pink pepper. The heart notes reach out with galbanum, cedar and angelica root. The base is a luxurious finish of oud, sandalwood, and musk.
Ingredients: lemon, pinkberries, bergamot,cedar, galbanum, angelica roots,sandalwood, oud, tonkin musk

Name: Creed Viking
Description: Creed Viking is an aromatic woody fragrance for men. The incredibly beautiful, heavy and warm perfume. Very attractive scent with very unique notes. Suitable for daily use.
Ingredients: pink pepper, calabrian bergamot, sicilian lemon, bulgarian rose, spicy mint, sandalwood, haitian vetiver, indian patchouli, lavender.
Top_note: calabrian bergamot, sicilian lemon, la reunion baie rose (pink peppercorn)
Base_note: indian sandalwood, haitian vetiver, indian patchouli, lavandin absolute

Name: Dior Miss Dior Blooming Bouquet
Description: Miss Dior Blooming Bouquet is reminiscent of the arrival of spring. With delicate, floral notes, it is a soft and feminine essence. Its top notes of Sicilian mandarin create a union with middle fragrances of peony, damask rose, apricot and peach. The fruity scents complement the floral tones, accentuating the silky fragrance. Then, to finish off the perfume, Dior wraps it up with a velvety white musk. This scent is perfect daytime wear. From picnics to days spent on the beach, this perfume is an outdoor fragrance that stays with you.
Ingredients: sicilian mandarin,apricot peel, peony, peach, rose,white musk

Name: Montale Vanilla Extasy
Description: Vanilla Extasy by Montale is a feminine oriental vanilla fragrance crafted by famous perfumer Pierre Montale. It was launched in the year 2008. The top notes of the perfume are apricot and apricot blossom; heart notes are ylang-ylang, jasmine, and vanilla; base notes are sandalwood, resins, benzoin, and mahogany.
Ingredients: apricot, apricot blossom, jasmine, ylang ylang, amber, benzoin, vanilla, mahogany, sandalwood

Name: Valentino Donna Hair Mist
Description: Valentino Donna Hair Mist is a fragrant hair mist for women, presented in a cute studded pink bottle. A beautiful and elegant woman takes care of every detail related to her style. Valentino Donna Hair Mist is designed to add freshness and fragrance to your beautiful hair. The opening of the fragrance is fresh and beautiful with bergamot, before developing into a divine blend of Bulgarian rose and powdery iris in the heart. The base is mystical with soft notes of patchouli and warm vanilla with soft leathery undertones.
Ingredients: bergamot ,bulgarian rose, iris,patchouli, leather, vanilla

Name: Cartier Le Baiser Du Dragon
Description: Le Baiser du Dragon by Cartier, which refers to a Dragon's Kiss in French, is an exotic woody-aromatic fragrance that layers rich almond and musky florals over a subtly sensual base of vetiver and patchouli. The fragrance opens with a sumptuous, fiery almond and amaretto accord rounded out by citrus and floral tones of neroli and gardenia. Heady jasmine, iris and powdery-fresh red rose dominate the heart notes, flanked by cedar and white musk. Lightly bitter, woody vetiver and earthy-sweet patchouli combine with nuances of caramel, benzoin and dark chocolate to produce a deeply satisfying finish.
Ingredients: gardenia, bitter almond, neroli, iris, musk, jasmine, cedar, rose, amber, patchouli, dark chocolate, caramel, vetiver.
Base_note: amber, benzoin, caramel, patchouli, chocolate, vetiver

Name: EstÃƒÂ©e Lauder SpellBound
Description: EstÃƒÂ©e Lauder's Spellbound perfume is designed for women, and it was introduced in 1991. This perfume has a warm, spicy, and refined charm that is hard to ignore. The top notes are citrus, rose, and apricot. Daffodil, orange blossom, cardamom, and carnation forms the heart notes. The base notes feature vanilla, vetiver, and amber. This perfume is designed by Sophia Grojsman.
Ingredients: rose, muguet, apricot, orange blossom, carnation, cardamom, sandalwood, vanilla, amber

Name: Carolina Herrera Good Girl Legere
Description: The new Carolina Herrera Good Girl Legacy is full of luxury and sophistication, a fragrance from the oriental floral family with a lighter version that fits morning and evening exits, the fragrance brings you an innovative bottle and scents with notes of boldness, elegance and luxury at the same time.
Ingredients: ylang-ylang, jasmine,tonka bean, sandalwood
Base_note: tonka bean, dulce de leche accord

Name: Lootah Petal EDP
Description:
A perfume for an irresistible beauty with the Petal perfume from the Lootah perfume collection, which surrounds you with a soft, feminine aura.
The perfume is an example of attractive elegance, and its distinctive composition has been carefully selected to match your beauty and soft femininity.
The fragrance features a blend of citrusy, spicy notes of leather and saffron, creating a wonderful and familiar combination.
The fragrance ends with a base that reveals the oriental character of the oud, leaving a refined trail and an elegant appearance.
Ingredients: bergamot, vetiver, cardamom, leather, saffron, oud

Name: Moschino Cheap And Chic I Love Love
Description: I Love Love was launched in 2004. A refreshing fragrance for women, it is the perfect balance of flowers and fruits. The top notes introduce this with red fruits and citrus and the heart notes consist of tea rose, bulrush, lily of the valley and cinnamon leaves. The base notes bring this all together with musk and woods. This fragrance is what you keep in your perfume wardrobe when you need a burst of warm and bright citrus. The woods stop it from being too fruity and the hint of spice gives it a little depth. A fun fragrance!
Ingredients: orange, grapefruit, red currant, lemon,tea rose, bulrush, lily-of-the-valley, sugar cane, cinnamon,musk, cedar, woody notes
Middle_note: tea rose, bulrush, lily-of-the-valley, sugar cane, cinnamon

Name: Jo Malone Earl Grey & Cucumber EDC
Description:
An exceptional fragrance that will captivate you from the first moment.
This perfume has been carefully designed to suit both men and women.
This fragrance is inspired by different types of tea and their additional flavors.
The fragrance opens with refreshing notes of apple, bergamot, jasmine, and water, with cucumber, angelica, and davana in the heart, resting on a luxurious base of vanilla, beeswax, cedar, and musk.
About the Brand:
Jo Malone joined the EstÃƒÂ©e Lauder Companies, which is available in 69 countries and territories, in 1999. Jo Malone London is a British brand known for its unique fragrances and luxurious products for bath, body, and home. It has written the rules of perfumery by blending unexpected components of ingredients and introducing elegant and playful concepts, the Jo Malone world continues to develop beautifully.
Ingredients: bergamot, water notes, jasmine, red apple, cucumber, angelica, beeswax, musk, virginia cedar, vanilla.
Top_note: bergamot, water notes, jasmine, red apple

Name: Creed Sublime Vanille
Description: Sublime Vanille is a vanilla fragrance with hints of citrus. It begins with the highest quality bourbon vanilla and vanilla orchid. Tonka bean sits at the heart of this carefully-crafted perfume, while lemon, bergamot, and musk form the base notes. This high-end fragrance has moderate sillage and high longevity, making it a great choice for all-day wear. ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s fresh and sweet without being overly sugary or offensive. Wear it to the office, for an evening out, or a casual weekend with friends and family. This uplifting, adaptable scent pairs well with any outfit and can be dressed up or down.
Ingredients: vanilla from comoros (africa), tonka bean,white bergamot, lemon,tonkin musk

Name: Creed Aventus Cologne
Description: The perfect perfume exudes style, success, true grit, and vigour. The classic perfume maintains the utmost quality and longevity of this newest menÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s scent. It was well designed to remain with you for a long time with an attractive, refreshing scent.
Ingredients: apple, black currant, bergamot, pineapple, raspberry, patula, patchouli, jasmine, vanilla, musk, oakmoss, amber

Name: Creed Aventus For Her
Description: Creed released a masculine version of this perfume in 2010, but in 2016, it decided to launch the female accompaniment. Aventus For Her is floral, fruity and warm all wrapped into one. A couple spritzes is all you need to excite your senses. It has a rather intriguing blend of notes that exudes confidence. It opens with a luscious array of violet, lemon, green apple, patchouli, pink pepper, and bergamot. The heart is composed of styrax, rose, Mysore sandalwood, and musk. It ends powerfully with amber, lilac, sweet peach, ylang-ylang, and black currant.
Ingredients: egyptian green apple, pink berries, indonesian patchouli, italian bergamot,bulgarian and turkish roses, indian sandalwood, styrax, musk,sweet peach, cassis, lilac, amber, ylang ylang
Top_note: egyptian green apple, pink berries, indonesian patchouli, italian bergamot
Middle_note: bulgarian and turkish roses, indian sandalwood, styrax, musk
Base_note: sweet peach, cassis, lilac, amber, ylang ylang

Name: Creed Love In White
Description: Love in White by Creed is an Oriental fragrance for women that was launched in 2005. It was largely inspired by a love for sailing and features symbolism of freedom, nature, and harmony. In keeping with that theme, this fragrance features scent notes from most of the continents. The top note is composed mainly of orange peel, hailing from South Spanish orchards. The middle notes are composed of a handful of scent notes. You may notice jasmine from Italy, narcissus from France, Egyptian iris, and Tonkin rise. The final notes to hit your senses include vanilla, sandalwood, and a touch of ambergris.
Ingredients: orange zest from italy,florentine iris, daffodils from france, magnolia, bulgarian rose, tonkin rice,vanilla, ambergris, mysore sandalwood
Middle_note: florentine iris, daffodils from france, magnolia, bulgarian rose, tonkin rice

Name: Creed Tabarome
Description: This fragrance is designed for men who aspire to be leaders. Its top notes feature Bergamot, lemon, mandarin, and ginger, complemented by a heart of jasmine, sandalwood, and vetiver. The base has notes of Musk, tobacco, and tea.
Ingredients: bergamot, lemon, mandarin, ginger, jasmine, sandalwood, vetiver, musk, tobacco, tea

Name: Creed Sublime Vanille Les Royales Exclusives
Description: This soft oriental scent is suitable for both him and her. Its top notes feature Tahitian vanilla and South American bourbon vanilla, complemented by a heart of Tonka bean. The base has notes of Bergamot, Calabrian lemon and Musk.
Ingredients: tahitian vanilla, south american bourbon vanilla, tonka bean, bergamot, calabrian lemon, musk
Top_note: tahitian vanilla, south american bourbon vanilla

Name: Creed Viking
Description: Celebrate your power with Viking Eau de Parfum for the fearless and fiery modern man. This bold men's fragrance combines fresh citrus notes of Calabrian bergamot and Sicilian lemon with pink peppercorn, Bulgarian rose, and peppermint. Woody base notes of Indian sandalwood and Haitian vetiver complete this masculine masterpiece.
Ingredients: pink pepper, calabrian bergamot, sicilian lemon, pink pepper, bulgarian rose, spicy mint, sandalwood, haitian vetiver, indian patchouli, lavender.
Top_note: pink pepper, calabrian bergamot, sicilian lemon
Middle_note: pink pepper, bulgarian rose, spicy mint
Base_note: sandalwood, haitian vetiver, indian patchouli, lavender.

Name: Creed Aventus
Description: This great fragrance is for the man of action: bold, spirited, and confident. It has the perfect blend that's rich in a blast of pineapple, blackcurrant, apple, and bergamot to give you an attractive, irresistible, long-lasting scent. It was launched with immediate acclaim in 2010 to celebrate CreedÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s 250th anniversary.
Ingredients: patchouli, lemon, bergamot, apple, pink pepper, violet, musk, strax, sandalwood, rose, amber, ylang ylang, purple blossom, black currant, peach
Top_note: patchouli, lemon, bergamot, apple, pink pepper, violet
Base_note: amber, ylang ylang, purple blossom, black currant, peach

Name: Creed Pure White Cologne
Description: This perfume is often compared to a burst of English mist. This citrusy blend gives way to subtle sweetness and powdery elegance, calling to mind the fine mist of a foggy London day. The fragrance's blend lasts with you for a long time with an attractive, wonderful scent.
Ingredients: lemon, bergamot, grapefruit, galbanum, pears, baby grains, amber, white musk, rice powder

Name: Creed Original Santal
Description: Original Santal is a distinctive menÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s scent steeped in the heritage of centuries of perfumery. This scent pays homage to the spiritual richness and royal splendor of India. As the name hints, precious sandalwood is the center of this scent, around which all other elements slowly dance. Top notes of Indian sandalwood, coriander, cinnamon, and juniper berry provide immediate satisfaction. The olfactory journey continues with middle notes of ginger, lavender, rosemary, and leaves of the absolute orange tree. The warm base of vanilla and tonka bean provides a lingering, satisfying finish.
Ingredients: coriander, juniper berries, cinnamon, sandalwood, rosemary, ginger, lavender, petitgrain, tonkabean, vanilla.
Top_note: orange tree absolute, jamaican ginger, sicilian lemon
Base_note: mysore sandalwood, virginia cedar, vanilla, siam benzoin, ambergris, tonkin musk

Name: Creed Asian Green Tea
Description: A morning spritz of Asian Green Tea, by Creed, is an invigorating start to the day. This exquisite fragrance boasts a playful bit of citrus grounded in earth tones and calming florals. Citrus characterizes the top notes, which consist of mandarin orange, lemon, bergamot, and neroli. A field of wildflowers grows in the middle notes, with violet, heliotrope, rose and black currant in the forefront. Here, too, is where the perfume gets its name, as green tea ties it all together. Earth tones like sandalwood, musk, and amber make up the base notes.
Ingredients: bergamont, mandarin, lemon, neroli,violet, heliotrope, green tea, rose, black currant,amber, sandalwood, musk
Middle_note: violet, heliotrope, green tea, rose, black currant

Name: Creed Neroli Sauvage
Description: This fragrance will provide you with charm, elegance and confidence. Its relaxed and stylish floral-citrus notes make it suitable for all ages. It features lemon, bergamot, and petitgrain on the top, coming on a heart of verbena and orange flower. The base has notes of ambergris and sandalwood.
Ingredients: lemon, bergamot and petit grain, verbena, orange flower, ambergris, sandalwood

Name: Creed Spice And Wood
Description: The second product from its Royal Exclusives line, Spice and Wood by Creed was released in 2010. This unisex fragrance is noble and powerful, making it ideal for evening and formal wear. Like its name, this scent is spicy and woody with a hint of velvety sweetness. It opens with a tantalizing mix of apple, bergamot, and lemon. A deep richness is exuded from its heart of angelic root, vetiver, patchouli, and cloves. The essence of alive and glorious woods soon seeps in with notes of cedarwood, oakmoss, and musk..
Ingredients: apple, bergamot, lemon,angelic root, pinkberries, vetiver, patchouli, cloves, pimento (jamaican pepper), birch,iris, cedarwood, oakmoss, tonkin musk
Middle_note: angelic root, pinkberries, vetiver, patchouli, cloves, pimento (jamaican pepper), birch

Name: Creed Bois Du Portugal
Description: This rich, warm scent embodies the tapestry of the forested Iberian Peninsula. Its smooth blend makes it perfect for men, thanks to its exotic wood and spice notes. It has Bergamot on the top, complemented by lavender in the heart, while the base has notes of sandalwood, vetiver ambergris and cedar.
Ingredients: bergamot, lavender, sandalwood, vetiver ambergris, cedar

Name: Creed Jardin D'amalfi
Description: The perfume makes you cruise down the beautiful Amalfi Coast on the iridescent sea to landscapes glistening with exotic fruits and luxurious spices. It gives you an undeniable sense of Italian romance and elegance. The perfume was designed with a long-lasting blend rich in cedar, apple, and rose in a blend of floral-fresh perfection.
Ingredients: mandarin, bergamot, pink pepper, small grain, cedar wood, apple, rose, vetiver, white musk, cinnamon
Top_note: mandarin, bergamot, pink pepper, small grains

Name: Creed Pure White Cologne Le Royal Exclusives
Description: A citrus fresh scent launched in 2011, Pure White Cologne, by Creed, is part of the Royal Exclusives Line created to celebrate the houseÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s 250th anniversary.
