This fragrance is also known as Original Cologne. Top notes of this scent are all citrus, with bittersweet grapefruit, tart lemon, and tangy bergamot. Middle heart notes are pear, neroli, and galbanum, followed by the interesting base note mix of rice, ambergris, white musk, and powdery notes. Best worn as a daytime cologne in the warmer months. A must-have for your perfume vanity!
Ingredients: lemon, bergamot, grapefruit,galbanum, petitgrain, sweet pear, nerol, ambergris, white musk, rice powder

Name: Creed Royal Princess Oud Millesime
Description: Royal Princess Oud Milesime, by Creed, was launched in 2015 for women. The word Milesime appears on many of Creed's fragrances as a mark of quality and means that the best crops from a particular year's harvest were used in that bottle. This floral fragrance opens with top notes from rose, the queen of flowers; powdery violet; and the fresh, complex scent of bergamot. The floral heart features sweet jasmine, Tuscan iris with its earthy aroma and the musk of patchouli, smoothed and sweetened by vanilla. Warm, exotic orientals comprise the base: Siam benzoin; deep, woody oud; resinous and sweet styrax; and milky sandalwood, with its lingering sweetness.
Ingredients: sicilian bergamot, rose, sweet violet,jasmine, vanilla, patchouli, iris from tuscany,benjoin siam, mysore sandalwood, styrax
Middle_note: jasmine, vanilla, patchouli, iris from tuscany

Name: Creed Silver Mountain Water
Description: A fragrance inspired by the exhilarating crispness of mountain air, Silver Mountain Water is a fresh and contemporary scent with citrus top notes of bergamot, mandarin, and neroli. Unfolding hearty notes of green tea and blackcurrant, this exhilarating perfume also draws on base notes of sandalwood and musk. Icy and mentholated, the bold unisex scent for men and women evokes relaxation and renewal.
Ingredients: bergamot, mandarin, green tea, black currant, galbanum, musk, sandalwood, bitter orange.

Name: Creed Jasmin Imperatrice Eugenie
Description: A perfume that is distinguished by its seductive, floral-oriental charm. The bergamot mixes with vanilla and amber in this perfume create a sensual fragrance that is full of strength and warmth. The perfume also contains other wonderful ingredients such as in this perfume are Tangerine, Green orange, sandalwood ambergris, and neroli.
Ingredients: bergamot, tangerine, green orange,sandalwood, ambergris, vanilla, and neroli

Name: Creed Original Vetiver
Description: Modern and sophisticated, Original Vetiver is a refreshing cologne for the active man. The masculine fragrance, launched in 2004, is inspired by the clean, clear scents of the great outdoors. Crisp bergamot and mandarin orange are the top notes. Juicy and sweet, they awaken you to a new day. A spicy kick of ginger clears your mind and energizes your body. Green vetiver stands out at the middle, grassy and deep in profile. Floral iris and creamy sandalwood add body and warmth. Musk and ambergris end the fragrance with an alluring sensuality, making you irresistible to those in your path. Wear this woody cologne to get in touch with nature.
Ingredients: mandarin, ginger, bergamot, iris, vetiver, sandalwood, musk, amber.
Top_note: bergamot, bitter orange, mandarin, vetiver leaves
Base_note: mysore sandalwood, vetiver, ambergris, tonkin musk

Name: Creed Spring Flower
Description: Stop and smell the roses with Spring Flower fragrance by Creed. This perfume is a fresh bouquet of femininity. With base notes of luxurious ambergris and warm and woody musk, you enjoy a deep feeling of contentment. Rose and jasmine blend together for a romantic splash of sun. Next, the fragrance tops its signature scent with notes of melon, peach, and apple that caress you like a cool breeze. Floral, fresh fruity, and delightful; that is all you need for kick starting your day.
Ingredients: bergamot, apple, apricot, melon, peach,jasmine, rose,musk

Name: Creed White Flowers
Description: Created in 2011 to mark the brandÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s 250th anniversary, Creed White Flowers perfume for women captures the purity and intoxication of bright, fruity botanicals in its top notes of green apple, violet leaves, and fresh lemon. Middle notes of spicy geranium, lush rose, and exotic jasmine reveal the lush, titular white florals. Foundational notes of sandalwood and musk are joined by a lingering floral coda of narcissus. A gorgeous trail of refined femininity follows the wearer of this delightful fragrance. Creed White flowers is a complex and impressive blend of floral scents designed to make you feel heavenly.
Ingredients: violet leaves, green apple, lemon,jasmine, geranium, rose,musk, sandalwood, narcissus

Name: Santi Burgas Lojazz
Description: Santi Burgas Lojazz takes you on an enticing, sensorial voyage and crosses the sweetness borders. Blanca Dalmau is the talented nose behind this breathtaking floral fragrance. This fragrance promises its wearers a sensational harmony of jasmine, orange blossom, and violet petals. The aura creates a vibrant mood of cheerful vibes the second you wear it. You can wear Lojazz separately or as a top note for the other exciting Loant collection.
Ingredients: sambac jasmine, orange blossom, violet petals and magnolia.

Name: Masque Milano Dolceacqua Le Donne di Masque
Description: On a nice day, at 7 am, the sun rises, and the traffic is light in Italy. A charming woman takes you on a picnic with the beautiful breeze flirting with her dress. Here you can see the colorful garden with a scent of floral and marine magic blend in the air. You fix your eyes upon her, open the rum bottle, and lean towards her to pour some happiness into her glass. You just stop pouring your drink while feeling astonished by her bewitching look and dazzling perfume. She smells sweet and mellow and is so much in line with the gardenâ€™s flowers and the scrumptious fruits with a favorable hint of vanilla and cedarwood Virginia at the base. She is capable of stealing all the lights, thanks to Masque Milano Dolceacqua fragrance.
Ingredients: sea notes, ivy, lily of the valley, marjoram, almond blossom, mimosa, ylang ylang, white rose, indian saffron, arzynia, siam benzoin, oak moss and musk
Top_note: sea notes, ivy, lily of the valley, marjoram

Name: Laurent Mazzone Vol d'Hirondelle
Description:
About the brand:
Laurent Mazzone Parfums is a niche line of scented candles and fragrances founded by Laurent Mazzone. Mazzone was passionate about the different enticing flavors and aromas from his very young age. Contemplating one night in the sky of Manhattan, he was inspired by Manhattanâ€™s stars, which was reflected in the brandâ€™s logo. The brand features 32 breathtaking fragrances, with its earliest edition being released in 2011, while the newest in 2020.
Ingredients: petitgrain paraguay, bergamot, lemon, palisander rosewood, artemisia, mandarin, spices, rose, jasmine, vetiver and musk
Top_note: petitgrain paraguay, bergamot, lemon, palisander rosewood
Base_note: opoponax, amber, indonesian patchouli, vetiver, civet, and vanilla

Name: Laurent Mazzone Aldheyx
Description: Charm everyone around with this gorgeous scent that boosts your charisma. The composition features notes of bergamot in the top, jasmine in the middle and cashmeran in the base, providing you with an elegant scent to complement your look with its long-lasting effect.
Ingredients: aldehydes, bergamot, heliotrope, jasmine, white musk, cashmeran
Base_note: leather, amber, patchouli, vetiver, brazilian rosewood

Name: Gritti Noctem Arabs
Description: An oriental woody fragrance professionally designed to suit you on the busy days and special nights. The composition has upper notes of tobacco, followed by oud in the middle and musk in the base, offering you an enticing scent that fills your spirits with vitality and positive vibes.
Ingredients: tobacco, patchouli, virginian cedar, agarwood (oud), sandalwood, musk, myrrh, amber
Middle_note: almond blossom, mimosa, ylang ylang, white rose

Name: CnR Create Star Sign Pisces
Description: A floral fragrance designed specially for the woman of pisces. The compelling composition has upper notes of gardenia, followed by heliotrope in the heart and musk in the base, bringing to you a delicious scent that keeps you elegant with a charming look for a long time.
Ingredients: gardenia, cyclamen, jasmine, camelia, heliotrope, narcissus, musk

Name: CnR Create Star Sign Sagittarius
Description: Feel energized and dynamic with this floral fruity fragrance. The amazing composition has upper notes of magnolia, followed by peach in the heart and amber in the base, delivering a sophisticated scent for the sagittarius woman whose positivity influences everyone around.
Ingredients: magnolia, lily, peach, rose, pink tulip, petitgrain, narcissus, jasmine, amber.

Name: CnR Create Star Sign Aquarius
Description: Impress everyone there and get all the attention you desire with this oriental woody fragrance. The composition features notes of lavender in the top, vetiver in the heart and musk in the base, revealing an attractive fragrance with a long-lasting effect for the day and night.
Ingredients: lavender, amalfi lemon, mandarin orange, woodsy notes, vetiver, tonka bean, musk
Base_note: indian saffron, arzynia, siam benzoin, oak moss and musk

Name: Atelier Flou Katana
Description: Enjoy a fresh start everyday with this oriental spicy composition that last for long time. The top notes of cypress, come on a heart of coriander and a base of patchouli, delivering an attractive scent that keeps you energized and refreshed in the day and night.
Ingredients: cypress, juniper berries, cardamom, coriander, patchouli, musk

Name: Atelier Flou Amarcord
Description: This oriental composition is professionally designed for the strong man who takes his descision without being hesitant. The upper notes of incense, come on a heart of vetiver and a base of spicy notes, delivering a refreshing scent that accentuates your masculinity and keeps your presence noticed.
Ingredients: incense, neroli, vetiver, iris, lily-of-the-valley, spicy notes
Middle_note: peach, rose, pink tulip, petitgrain, narcissus, jasmine

Name: Memo Paris Eau De Memo
Description: this amazing oriental scent evokes your desires of exploring the world and creates a pure dream in you about flying over Paris, with an astonishing blend of white musk, saffron, and green tea.
Ingredients: bergamot, lemon, green tea, jasmine, iris, saffron, white musk, moss, skin.

Name: Creed Tabarome
Description: This fragrance is designed for men who aspire to be leaders. Its top notes feature Bergamot, lemon, mandarin, and ginger, complemented by a heart of jasmine, sandalwood, and vetiver. The base has notes of Musk, tobacco, and tea.
Ingredients: bergamot, lemon, mandarin, ginger, jasmine, sandalwood, vetiver, musk, tobacco, tea

Name: Chopard Rose Seljuke
Description: A luxurious perfume with Damascene rose, Madagascar vanilla, tonka bean and Peruvian balm that blends to make an exceptional fragrance. It comes together with the warmth of aromatic woods that give you a high sense of calm and comfort.
Ingredients: bulgarian flower, vanilla, tonka beans, oriental woody notes

Name: Penhaligon's The Revenge of Lady Blanche
Description: Penhaligon's The Revenge of Lady Blanche is a floral fragrance designed for women who love a combination of spicy, floral, and woody scent. This Eau de Parfum features powdery orris, narcissus flower, and hyacinth.
Ingredients: orris, narcissus, hyacinth

Name: Cartier L' Heure Brillante VI EDP
Description: Launched in 2009, VI L' Heure Brillante is an Aromatic fragrance created for both men and women by Cartier's in-house perfumer Mathilde Laurent. Cartierâ€™s Les Heures de Parfum is a collection of olfactory moments capturing pure emotion. These high perfumery fragrances focus on only the most sophisticated of senses and materials. At dawn, everything seems new, fresh and joyful. Radiant and smiling, a soft light brightens the sky. A moment of pure emotion to keep with you, in bundles of lemon, gin, aldehydes.
Ingredients: lemon, gin, traces of aldehydes

Name: Atkinsons My Fair Lily
Description: This charming fragrance adds elegant and attractive to captivate all hearts around you with refreshing chamomile and water drops. This fragrance let you share its refreshing smell in distinct moments different in your life
Ingredients: water, rhubarb, chamomile, casablanca lily, patchouli, vetiver

Name: L'Arc Traversee Cedre D'ifrane
Description: This fragrance honors the wintry epoch of MaÃ®tre de Claudeâ€™s at the heels of the Atlas Mountains in Ifran. Its blend of birch, violet and musk provides both men and women with an amazingly unique scent that complements your look and elegance.
Ingredients: birch, violet, cedar, ambergris, leather, musk

Name: Amouroud Midnight Rose
Description: Amouroud Midnight Rose catches the fresh whiff of the morning breeze inspired by the rose blooming in the morning sun. The mesmerizing fragrance starts with Lychee and Pomelo that rounds out this enigmatic and seductive aroma till the heart notes of lily and pure Red Rose jewel tones. Then, threads of warm dark-hued Oud anchor the composition transforming it into a wonderful night garden named MIDNIGHT ROSE, side by side with the sumptuous effect added by final notes of Labdanum and Amber. Indulge in a magnificent scent that lingers long after midnight.
Ingredients: litchi, pomelo, mate, lily, red rose, iris, amber, labdanum, agarwood.

Name: Boadicea The Victorious Ardent
Description: An oriental fragrance by Christian Provenzano that combines coriander and carrot seeds with a soft touch of turkish rose. This fragrance mixes with a fresh scent of jasmine and woody notes of musk and amber that surrounds you with remarkable and powerful sense.
Ingredients: rose, saffron, carrot seed, coriander, hedion, jasmine, beeswax, rose, patchouli, agarwood, labdanum, vanilla, benzoin, amber, musk

Name: Van Cleef & Arpels Reve D'Encens
Description: Van Cleef and Arpels Reve D'Encens parfume is an Oriental Floral collection for Unisex. The parfume was launched in 2018. The most important ingredient is saffron. It contains rhodium and rose. The base notes are sandalwood and white musk.
Ingredients: saffron, frankincense, rose, sandalwood and white musk.

Name: Tom Ford Costa Azzura
Description: It is a white floral and woody fragrance that is composed of a mixture of ylang-ylang and tuberose with intoxicating Bulgarian rose. Depth and strength are provided by vanilla and cedar. It was launched in 2015.
Ingredients: seaweed, driftwood, agarwood (oud), ambrette (muskmallow), celery seeds, cardamom, juniper, myrtle, lavender, lemon, yellow mandarin, artemisia, mastic or lentisque, olibanum, incense, vanilla, vetiver, oak.
Top_note: seaweed, driftwood, agarwood (oud), ambrette (muskmallow), celery seeds, cardamom

Name: Initio Oud for Greatness
Description: This perfume represents the idea of scent molecules that trigger attraction. A sacred scent to achieve greatness. This fragrance emanates the power of nature and the reawakening of greatness. It enchants, excites and makes any dream of greatness possible.
Ingredients: lavender, saffron, nutmeg, agarwood, patchouli, musk

Name: Atkinsons The Excelsior Bouquet
Description: This English fragrance takes you to the age of the old heroic English adventurers with the warm scent of hot spices that add to the excitement of your adventure.
Ingredients: sage, spices, leather, vetiver.

Name: Parfums De Marly Greenley EDP
Description:
A burst of freshness for men in Summer & Springtime.
A fresh blend of bergamot & mandarin that will energize you & rekindle your enthusiasm.
Indulge in floral heart notes that magnify the sense of love & attraction in the air.
Enjoy the warmth of the perfume's base notes, with musk & amber, for elegance and charisma that will last all day long.
Ingredients: mandarin, bergamot, green apple, violet, cashmeran, petitgrain, pomarose, cedar, oakmoss, musk, amberwood
Middle_note: juniper, myrtle, lavender, lemon, yellow mandarin, artemisia

Name: Alexandre.J The Majestic Vanilla EDP
Description:
Majestic Vanilla is a wonderful oriental fragrance, founded in an awesome blue bottle design.
this oriental scent of Vanilla fragrance will take you on a journey to the bustling days of twentieth.
It is enriched with an attractive and exceptional scent of a special, very-carefully chosen ingredient.
The fragrance opens with a hot touch of Cinnamon and citrus touch of Bergamot and Mandarin to give the fragrance some warmth with a refreshing touch.
The adorning Peach adds a smooth velvety touch, while Galbanum and Tonka Bean add a green spicy note.
Ingredients: cinnamon, bergamot, mandarin, galbanum, tonka bean, peach, musk, vanilla, patchouli, labdanum, amber
Base_note: patchouli, oud, labdanum, vanilla, benzoin, amber, musk

Name: Bvlgari Le Gemme Duo EDP
Description: #NAME?
Ingredients: green cardamom, somali incense, madagascar vanilla

Name: Amouroud Miel Sauvage
Description: Amouroud's Miel Sauvage evokes a precious harmony between seduction and mystery. This parfume heightens the sense of sensuality when embodying the sense of nostalgia for the ancient east. This parfume is a rich olfactive treasure that anchors the composition of the hypnotic Incense, addictive Wild Honey and Night Blooming Jasmine, which have been magically intertwined. The inclusion of the spellbinding heart of Oud in this fragrance offers unparalleled intensity and longevity. Miel Sauvage is the smell of the beauty of the night rain and the gloomy evening.
Ingredients: bergamot, wild honey, red pepper, oud, jasmine, sandalwood, patchouli, tonka bean, incense
Base_note: mastic or lentisque, olibanum, incense, vanilla, vetiver, oak.

Name: Boadicea Ardent EDP
Description:
- Boadicea Ardent melts the loverâ€™s heart to feel the sweet and warm feelings of falling in love.
- This scent evokes a pulse-raising passionate scents for the sweet beginnings and the lasting love.
- Thanks to its floral scent, Saffron, coriander, Turkish rose arouse the senses at the top.
- While Rose absolute and jasmine softly melt in agarwood, benzoin, amber to encapsulate a magical seductive night.
- What are you waiting for? Confess your love to your partner this evening!
Ingredients: saffron, coriander, turkish rose, rose absolute, jasmine, agarwood, benzoin, amber

Name: Amado Arabian Heritage Hair Mist
Description: #NAME?
Ingredients: raspberry, black currant, rose, clove, cinnamon, incense, patchouli, sandalwood, benzoin, amber, musk.
Top_note: raspberry, black currant, rose, clove, cinnamon

Name: Amado My Muse Hair Mist
Description: #NAME?
Ingredients: turkish rose, cinnamon, heliotrope, violet, jasmine, hedione, vanilla, musk, benzoin, amber.

Name: Van Cleef & Arpels Bois D'Iris
Description: Van Cleef & Arpels Bois D'Iris EDP for women is really a prestigious fragrance. The parfume starts with an amazing and rare blend of sweet notes. It also combines vetiver and wood, to offer a unique feeling. The base notes consist of vanilla and amber balm.
Ingredients: iris, french labdanum, incense, amber, driftwood, vetiver, vanilla, sugar.

Name: The Different Company Sublime Balkiss
Description: Share this unique perfume with your partner and feel the warmth of cocoa with the smell of memories. Sublime Balkiss unisex perfume gives her bewitching beauty and makes him sublime and mysterious.
Ingredients: heather,patchouli,cacao,blackcurrant,lilac,lily-of-the-valley,bulgarian rose,violet leaves,bergamot.

Name: The Different Company Aurore Nomade
Description: Fly on a heavenly trip with the floral oriental Aurore Nomade fragrance from The Different Company. Feel the comfort of nature with its clear sky and calm ocean waves with fragrance notes that will make you feel so different, special, desired, and more attractive.
Ingredients: banana flower,starfruit,cinnamon,sea-breeze,rum co2,davana essence,oil of ylang-ylang (4%), egyptian geranium,clove,frangipani,indole,immortelle absolute , sandalwood notes, amber, vanilla, musk.

Name: Lola Mood Red Carpet Attitude Kate
Description: Lola Mood Red Carpet Kate seduces the charming women with its sensibility and style of composition. This chypre-floral perfume is designed to pay attention to its luxury and unique composition. Bergamot, tea, and freesia leave a romantic scent at the top, synonymous with exoticism and extreme refinement. The heart plays an enjoyable symphony of the floral choir to enjoy a harmonious scent of red-orange, jasmine, and orchid, fused in the charming patchouli with a sweet sensual feminine scent.
Ingredients: bergamot, tea, freesia, orange blossom, jasmine, orchid, patchouli

Name: Laurent Mazzone Scandinavian Crime
Description: Dare to be seduced with Stronger with Laurent Mazzone Scandinavian Crime perfume? Allow this oriental spicy perfume, molded by the energy of modernity and the easy nonchalance of youth, to handle you. People who wear it as a second skin have inherited a confident elegance and sophisticated aroma. This perfume introduces a warm, sensual touch of spices blended with agarwood (oud), patchouli, and sandalwood. Incense, amber, vanilla, and musk revolve at the base to add oriental charm and warmth.
Ingredients: cardamom, pepper, ginger, coriander, agarwood, patchouli, sandalwood, incense, amber, labdanum, vanilla and musk
Middle_note: damascena rose,lilac bunches,lily of the valley.

Name: Laurent Mazzone Chemise Blanche
Description: A floral fragrance that keeps you as chic as always. The composition has upper notes of bergamot, followed by iris in the middle and musk in the base, delivering a sensual scent that fills your soul with the happiness and joy you deserve.
Ingredients: aldehydes, bergamot, mandarin orange, iris, lily-of-the-valley, rose, musk, benzoin, tonka bean, amber

Name: D'Orsay Etiquette Bleue
Description: Stay refreshed and elegant for a long time with this citrus fragrance. The composition has upper notes of rosemary, middle notes of rosewood and base notes of vanilla, delivering an attractive scent that keeps all the eyes on your charming look.
Ingredients: amalfi lemon, rosemary, bergamot, orange, orange blossom, opoponax, myrrh, brazilian rosewood, sandalwood, vanilla, amber

Name: CnR Create Star Sign Aquarius
Description: Impress everyone there and get all the attention you desire with this floral fruity fragrance. The composition features notes of lily in the top, thyme in the heart and iris in the base, revealing an attractive fragrance with a long-lasting effect for the day and night.
Ingredients: lily, passionfruit, camelia, jasmine, lily-of-the-valley, immortelle, thyme, marjoram, iris, bay leaf

Name: Atelier Flou Shamsin
Description: It's an oriental floral fragrance inspired by the eternal charm of the orient. The irresistable composition features notes of jasmine in the top, iris in the middle and patchouli in the base, providing you with a gorgeous scent that boosts your presence with self-confidence and charisma.
Ingredients: jasmine, narcissus, labdanum, olibanum, rose, iris, patchouli, vanilla, cedar, musk
Base_note: immortelle absolute , sandalwood notes, amber, vanilla, musk.

Name: A Lab on Fire Liquidnight
Description: A woody spicy fragrance that keeps you refreshed and in a good mood. The composition combines notes of lime in the top, followed by lavender in the middle and vanilla in the base, providing you with an amazing scent that makes your presence noticed and signature touched.
Ingredients: bergamot, lime, safran, sage, lavender, hinoki wood, incense, vanilla, musk
Middle_note: orange blossom, opoponax, myrrh, brazilian rosewood

Name: Carven Paris La Havane
Description: This oriental fragrance is inspired by an amazing journey to Havana. The sensual composition has notes of Cuban tobacco, patchouli and leather, providing you a masculine and elegant scent that draws the attention toward your presence wherever you go.
Ingredients: mandarin orange, black pepper, elemi resin, lavender, cuban tobacco, rose, patchouli, amber, leather
Top_note: mandarin orange, black pepper, elemi resin
Middle_note: lily of the valley, immortelle, thyme, marjoram
Base_note: incense, amber, labdanum, vanilla and musk

Name: Van Cleef & Arpels California Reverie
Description: Van Cleef & Arpels California Reverie EDP is a women fragrance filled with acidic and sunny notes on layers of seductive flowers. The parfume contains a mixture of mandarin orange, orange blossom, frangipani, beeswax and vanilla.
Ingredients: mandarin orange, neroli, jasmine sambac, frangipani, beeswax, vanilla.

Name: Creed Pure White Cologne
Description: This perfume is often compared to a burst of English mist. This citrusy blend gives way to subtle sweetness and powdery elegance, calling to mind the fine mist of a foggy London day. The fragrance's blend lasts with you for a long time with an attractive, wonderful scent.
Ingredients: lemon, bergamot, grapefruit, galbanum, pears, baby grains, amber, white musk, rice powder

Name: Van Cleef & Arpels Gardenia Petale
Description: Van Cleef & Arpels Gardenia Petal EDP is a stylish, generous, luxurious fragrance that awakens the senses; Gardenia Petal captures all stages in the life of the gardenia flower. The parfume, high quality, compositions opens with an inimitable accord of fresh, green and citrus notes, followed by floral touches of delicate lily-of-the-valley and exotic jasmine and finishing with the elegant, femininity of gardenia flowers in full bloom at dawn.
Ingredients: white flowers, gardenia, herbal scents, citrus fruits, lily of the valley and jasmine.

Name: Memo Paris Lalibela Oud
Description: This amazing fragrance will take you on a journey of renewed pleasure. It has a blend of wonderful notes including Orchid, jasmine, coconut and patchouli, mixed with notes of vanilla, tobacco, olibanum, labdanum and agarwood. It has a long-lasting effect that you will not resist.
Ingredients: orchid, jasmine, coconut, patchouli, vanilla, tobacco, olibanum, labdanum, agarwood

Name: Memo Paris Moon Leather
Description: A citrus fragrance with bitter orange, grapefruit and lemon that blends with orange blossom, sage and pigeon blossom. It comes with vetiver, leather and tonka bean that give you hot and erotic feeling.
Ingredients: orange, grapefruit, lemon, neroli, sage clary, lemon vibrana, vetiver, leather, tonka beans

Name: Chopard Aigle Imperial
Description: Eau de Parfum with precious natural oud, Arabian jasmine and Mandarin orange that blended with water notes of bergamot and ginger. It is a luxurious perfume for men leaves refreshed and vibrant fragrance.
Ingredients: citrus, tea, ginger, spices, sea scents, patchouli, amber, agarwood, vera woods, aromatic rice

Name: Alexandre.J The Collector Iris Violet
Description: Longing for a sensual feminine aroma that reveals a charming and joyous floral impression? Tribute to this Iris Violet flower, a symbol of the French royalty and key to joy and comfort. This parfume has the power to thrill you with shimmering colors and exulting fragrance. This seductive symphony is a breath-taking fusion of Oriental desert and the French baroque architecture to take your soul to an exciting journey in the east. This parfume creates cheerful and vibrant notes composed of Bergamot, Apple, Fruity Notes, Jasmine, Rose, Vanilla, Musk, Patchouli, Cashmeran, Olibanum, Cedar, Benzoin that can awake all your strong emotions and revive your sweet memories.
Ingredients: bergamot, apple, fruity notes, jasmine, rose, vanilla, musk, patchouli, cashmeran, olibanum, cedar, benzoin

Name: Lalique Fruits Du Mauvement
Description: Fruits Du Mauvement is a Floral and Fruity fragrance that contains majestic scents that can give you the sexy aura that you need to mesmerize and captivate The composition starts with a playful mandarin note accompanied by a tangy shade of black pepper and a sharp hint of ginger. The heart is a burst of fruity scents, exhilarating jasmine absolute and classy plums. The dry-down closes with cashmeran, sweet amber and sexy sandalwood. Fruits Du Mauvement is a bewitching, irresistible fragrance that uplifts the spirits and boosts the mood. It is a perfect scent for daytime and warm weather.
Ingredients: ginger, black pepper, mandarin orange, plum, jasmine, fruits, amber, cashmere, sandalwood.

Name: Boadicea The Victorious Imperial
Description: An oriental fragrance by Christian Provenzano with a woody scent of Brazilian rosewood, oud, guaiac wood and sandalwood that combines with a soft smell of lavender, rose and fresh jasmine. This fragrance adds a warm and powerful sense of amber and musk.
Ingredients: feathered, lavender, brazilian rosewood, queen flowers, freesia, jasmine, rose, geranium, agarwood, patchouli, sandalwood, lapanium, leather, amber, guaiac wood, olympium, musk, cyprol
Top_note: feather, lavender, brazilian rosewood, queen flowers
Base_note: lily of the valley and jasmine.

Name: Boadicea The Victorious Complex
Description: An aromatic smokey fragrance with resins and musk that combines with a fresh herbal of basil and sage. This fragrance adds confident and sensuous feelings with a warm touch of violet and incense
Ingredients: violet, basil, sage, gum, olympium, oud, incense, musk

Name: Boadicea The Victorious Chariot
Description: An Oriental Floral fragrance with sweety fruit of apple, black currant and red berries that combines with tuberose, neroli, ylang-ylang. This fragrance mixes with a soft and fresh scent of jasmine, rose, and cherry that all come with a loveable scent of vanilla.
Ingredients: cherry, black currant, apples, green lemon, bergamot, rose, jasmine, ylang-ylang, neroli, tuberose, nutmeg, cardamom, cherry blossoms, freesia, patchouli, bardi, vanilla, musk, oud, algae, benzoin, saffron, sandalwood, cedar wood
Top_note: cherry, black currant, apples, green lemon, bergamot

Name: Alexandre.J The Collector Silver Ombre
Description: Silver Ombre Perfume by Alexandre.J is a women's perfume, which was launched in 2012. This perfume has refreshing opening notes of pear and lemon followed by heart notes of rose, sandalwood, sweet cloves, and olibanum. Animalic musk and amber form the lingering base for this perfume. The lasting fragrance of Silver Ombre will keep you fresh from morning to night.
Ingredients: alcohol denat., fragrance (parfum), water (aqua), citronellol, geraniol, linalool, eugenol, amyl cinnamal, citral

Name: Alexandre.J The Collector Rose Oud
Description: Rose Oud Perfume by Alexandre.J is a feminine perfume that appeals with its sweet and spicy notes that remind you of warm summers. The fruity opening notes of apple, lemon, toffee, and raspberry invite attention. The middle notes of rose, white woods, patchouli, and saffron beautifully blend with amber and vanilla to lend a sweet and spicy character.
Ingredients: alcohol denat., fragrance (parfum), water (aqua), citronellol, alpha-isomethyl ionone, geraniol, limonene, linalool, eugenol, citral, cinnamyl alcohol
Base_note: vanilla, musk, patchouli, cashmeran, olibanum, cedar, benzoin

Name: Xerjoff V Accento EDP
Description: It is an oriental woody fragrance for women and men with a composition that begins with notes of Hyacinth, Pineapple, the heart notes of Iris, Jasmine, Pink Pepper that represents the essence of the perfume, and the base notes of Vetiver, Musk, Patchouli, Amber, Vanille which stays with you throughout the day.
Ingredients: hyacinth, pineapple, iris, jasmine, pink pepper, vetiver, musk, patchouli, amber, vanille
Middle_note: roses, jasmine, ylang-ylang, neroli, tuberose, nutmeg, cardamom, cherry blossoms, freesia

Name: Majda Bekkali J'ai Fait Un Re've Obscur
Description: This oriental unisex fragrance in inpired by that wonderful portrait that depicts the love of life. The nice composition of jasmine, bergamot and oud will boost your self-confidence at any time of the day.
Ingredients: jasmine, vanilla, bergamot, cashmere wood, oud, saffron, cedar, pink pepper
Base_note: agarwood, patchouli, sandalwood, labanium, leather, amber, guaiac woods, olebanium, musk, ciprol

Name: Cartier III L'heure Vertueuse
Description: Released in 2012, III L'Heure Vertueuse by Cartier is a perfume for both women and men, which is famous for its green-spicy scent. III L'heure Vertueuse will walk you through a magic garden, to inhale the enchanting perfumes of miraculous plants. It offers you an aromatic caress of the fresh, gentle green notes of sweet lavender, citrusy verbena, earthy thyme, and woodsy rosemary. This Eau de Parfum comes in a simple transparent falcon that unveils a green liquid of magnificent aroma. A fresh and fruity scent that uplifts your outfit to new levels.
Ingredients: lavender, verbena, thyme, rosemary

Name: Bvlgari Le Gemme Imperiali Desiria
Description: A luscious fragrance that takes you takes you to a journey through a luxuriant royal garden of the Tang empire. This fragrance leaves love and passion feelings with a light scent of spring blooms. To enjoy vitality and sensual touch.
Ingredients: musk, rose, mongolia flower
Base_note: patchouli, bardi, vanilla, musk, oud, algae, benzoin, saffron, sandalwood, cedar

Name: Bvlgari Le Gemme Reali Rubinia
Description: A romanity fragrance that symbolizes to a flamboyant gemstone called "The Ruby". This Oriental fragrance combines with Mandarin, Sandalwood and Tonka Bean that gives a pleasant and passionate sense that surrounds you all day.
Ingredients: mandarin, orange flowers, jasmine, balsam, sandalwood, vanilla, tonka beans, saffron violet, agarwood

Name: Acqua Di Parma Oud Special Edition
Description: This parfume comes in a special-edition bottle. It is extremely unique and glamorous, it manifests the beauty of the deep and warm Oud oil which is very rare oil extracted from agarwood. It is an irresistible fragrance for everyday use.
Ingredients: citrus bergamia, sweet orange, torchwood, cilantro, oud, leather, musk, cedar wood, patchouli, sandalwood.

Name: Bond No 9 Madison Avenue
Description: Madison Avenue is a sweet, fruity and floral joy. This long-lasting perfume can go the distance and keep you wrapped up in its beautiful fragrance all day long. Wear it during the spring to compliment the blossoming flowers in your neighborhood. The scent is part of the chypre family and brings a fresh, crispness to the scene. The top notes dance to blackberry, apple, and bergamot. The heart notes continue the performance with rose, magnolia, and jasmine. The base concludes with patchouli, praline, and ambroxan. This product was released in 2016 and it comes in an elegant 100 ml star-shaped pink bottle.
Ingredients: apple, bergamot, blackberry,rose, jasmine, magnolia,patchouli, pralinã©, ambroxan

Name: Bond No 9 B9 Perfume
Description: Released in 2015, Bond No. 9 Dubai B9 delivers a hint of spice with layers of intrigue and sensuality in every spritz. This fragrance from Bond No. 9 was inspired by and conceived for the brandâ€™s main Bond Street store location in New York. Crafted for both men and women, the cologne hits upon the perfect balance between feminine and masculine. The scentâ€™s captivating fragrance notes are comprised of the intimate leathery aroma of saffron, the intoxicatingly popular floral scent of gardenia, cozy and warm amber and sensual musk.
Ingredients: saffron, citric notes,gardenia, jasmine, orchid,amber, oakmoss, musk, sandalwood, vetiver

Name: Thierry Mugler Chyprissime
Description: An elegant and sophisticated parfume for bothe men and women. Once you open the bottle, the classical notes of bergamot and orange will explode, and transform into a dreamy parfume that can be used anytime and anywhere, for a more attractive presence.
Ingredients: bergamot, oranges, oakmoss - oak moss, patchouli, pear.

Name: Elie Saab Essence No.1 Rose
Description: A deep floral fragrance that compose a great unique group of rose. It starts with Bulgarian and Turkish roses to feel calm, comfortable and joyful. Moving to petal and damask roses in the heart to enjoy beautiful mornings of roses. While in he base, you can enjoy he most wonderful scents of Grasse and Turkey.
Ingredients: bulgarian and turkish roses, petal and damask roses

Name: Lalique Rose Royale Noir Premier 1938
Description: Lalique Rose Royale Noir Premier 1938 is a fruity floral fragrance for both men and women. A very classy and modern scent, Rose Royale will last and linger as it sweetly mingles with your skin. Peach and Apricot open the fragrance with a sweet welcome. The ephemeral opening fades away to be overcome by the exotic Osmanthus and Rose Absolute in the heart. Musk dominates the base with a faint trace of sweet Cashmere Wood. Lalique Rose Royale is an elegant fragrance that combines luscious fruit accords and exotic tones to produce a sensational scent.
Ingredients: peach, apricot,osmanthus, rose, cashmere wood, musk.
Base_note: vanilla, tonka bean, saffron violet, agarwood

Name: Stephane Humbert Lucas Soleil De Jeddah
Description: STEPHANE HUMBERT LUCAS Soleil de Jeddah Perfume for Men and Women its a ver luxury and wonderful blend of scents you will fallin love with. A wise combination of earthy and light notes like chamomile, leather and iris inspired by the amazing Jeddah City spirit!
Ingredients: osmanthus, chamomile, lemon, iris, ambergris, leather, vanilla, iris
Base_note: sandalwood, leather, cedar, patchouli and musk

Name: Bvlgari Le Gemme Ambero
Description: A warm Woody Oriental fragrance with Amber and Vetiver that mixes with spicy Ginger, Pink Pepper and Saffron. This fragrance adds an elegant and powerful touch with a delicate scent of incense and amber
Ingredients: olibanum, saffron, pink pepper, ginger

Name: Marly Darcy
Description: This stunning floral fragrance increases your natural beauty with its sensual and delicate aroma that gives attractive and vitality look at all your special occasions.
Ingredients: citrus, bergamot, neroli, jasmine, rose, patchouli, gourmand, white musk, woods

Name: Caron Pour Un Homme De Caron
Description: This fragrance was the first parfume intended exclusively for men since 1934 that inimitable harmony of the most beautiful lavenders of the Alpes de Provence, mixed with vanilla. This fragrance adds a warm and strong scent of amber and precious wood that helps to accomplish all your hard decisions.
Ingredients: lavender, vanilla, musk

Name: The Different Company Oriental Lounge
Description: Live the oriental Arabian nights and act like the Arab sultans. You'll feel the bewitching and the passionate romance when you press on your bottle's pump and travel with your imagination to an oriental palace with its magical mysteries with amber and red rose fragrance.
Ingredients: curry leaves,sweet pepper,bergamot,redrose,satinwood,amber,tonka bean,labdanum."

Name: Sospiro Opera
Description: It's a unisex oriental floral fragrance designed for those with special taste. The amazing composition has a blend of fruity notes, mixed with leather and vetiver, releasing a magnificent scent that keeps you cool and in a good mood for long time.
Ingredients: fruity notes, turkish rose, ylang-ylang, ambergris, leather, nutmeg, patchouli, virginia cedar, vetiver, vanilla, musk

Name: Marly Byerley
Description: This bold and strong fragrance made for the energetic and adventurous men that takes you to see the wild horses seeking to win to fill you with love of adventure and competition.
Ingredients: bergamot, cardamom, cedar wood, guaiac wood, vetiver, resin.

Name: Atelier Cologne Rose Anonyme Cologne Absolue
Description: Rose can express a thousand unsaid words and emotions. A delicate flower can turn into the most elegant form of symbol to express your feelings. A rose-scented perfume will have the same overwhelming effect on you, chasing you wherever you go. Main ingredients of this floral fragrance are rose from Bulgaria, bergamot from Italy and patchouli from Indonesia, combining sparkly exotic and Mediterranean olfactory notes.
Ingredients: calabrian bergamot, ginger, turkish rose, somalian opoponax, agarwood (oud), indonesian patchouli, leaf papyrus, benzoin

Name: Clive Christian Clive Original C 1872
Description: This citrus fragrance leaves a mysterious and attractive Masculine scent with a refreshing smell of Jasmine and Neroli that adds vitality and strength feeling.
Ingredients: mandarin, bergamot, green lemon, grapefruit, jalbanum, rosemary, peach, lavender, pineapple, orange leaves, nutmeg, black pepper, star flowers, jasmine, freesia, sage, cyclamen, amber, labnum, olibanum, musk, cedar
Top_note: mandarin, bergamot, green lemon, grapefruit, jalbanum, rosemary, peaches, lavender, pineapple, orange leaves, nutmeg, black pepper.

Name: Boucheron Santal De Kandy
Description: A woody oriental fragrance with cedarwood and sandal that adds calm and comfort sense. This fragrance combines warm pepper and spicy cardamom with soft touches of violet and delicate jasmine.
Ingredients: cardamom, black pepper, violet, jasmine, cedar wood, sandalwood

Name: Acqua Di Parma Colonia Intensa
Description: This parfume reflects a strong and confident masculine style. It contains bergamot and lemon combined with a modern touch of woods accords.
Ingredients: cardamom, calabrian bergamot, sicilian lemon, ginger, myrtle, artemisia, neroli, leather accord, cedar wood, patchouli, benzoin, musk.
Top_note: cardamom, calabrian bergamot, sicilian lemon, ginger

Name: Chanel Les Exclusifs de Chanel Sycomore EDP
Description:
A musky woody fragrance is designed with a unique scent.
The fragrance is made with high accuracy to suit every man and women alike.
It gives you the sense of warmth and freshness to stay with you all day long.
The fragrance helps you to feel vital and spend your day actively and cheerfully.
Enjoy a charming scent that was chosen from the finest types of natural ingredients of Vetiver, Sandalwood, Aldehydes, Tobacco and Violet.
Ingredients: vetiver, tobacco, cypress, juniper, sandalwood, aldehydes, pink pepper, spicy notes, violet
Middle_note: star flowers, jasmine, freesia, sage, cyclamen
Base_note: patchouli, virginia cedar, vetiver, vanilla, musk

Name: Hermetica Cedarise EDP
Description:
Cedarise is regarded as a poet to the tree, bearing the same name.
The fragrance expresses the richness of nature through notes of pure cedar wood and the scent of vetiver roots.
This breath-taking fragrance was launched with a perfect blend for both men and women.
The fragrance gives you a striking and attractive presence in all parties and your special occasions.
It also boosts your self-confidence and makes you feel comfortable and refreshed all the time.
The fragrance is alcohol-free and moisturizing, with a long-lasting effect.
Ingredients: cypress, cedar, vetiver, woody notes, musk

Name: Mendittorosa Alfa
Description: Mendittorosa, the Italian house, has released a trilogy, the scents of the soul â€œAlfa, Omega and Idâ€ to warm our hearts. These odors speak directly to your heart, encapsulating the sensuality of an appealing scene of clear blue sky. Alfa fragrance composes powerful scents of milk and vineyards with saffron and nutmeg, sandalwood, and jasmine, which have been determined to make the scent linger on.
Ingredients: thyme, saffron, ravensara, oud, nutmeg, precious woods, jasmine, perfumes, white musk, sandalwood, cloves

Name: Masque Milano Luci Ed Ombre
Description: Masque Milano Luci ed Ombre is an intoxicating blend of glamour and confidence that creates a contemporary, premium feeling whenever you inhale them. This masterpiece identifies a breathtaking fusion of strength and elegance, manifested in the majesty of incense, blended in tuberose, ginger, and jasmine. Olibanum, cedar, and patchouli rhyme together at the base to share in that instinctive style and complement that distinct look. Youâ€™ll never stop inhaling them.
Ingredients: incense, tuberose, ginger, jasmine, moss, frankincense, cedarwood and patchouli

Name: Masque Milano Montecristo
Description: Imagine a scene of a comfortable leather couch and a coffee table, where a deck of playing cards and burning tobacco are placed over. Once a glass of rum appears in this scene, a feeling of warmth and reassuring comfort of Masque Milano Montecristo looms on the horizon. This modern bowl of bliss starts with the undeniable seductive scent of ambrette, rum, and Cabreuva at the top to feel fresh and comfortable. The heart identifies a unique blend of celery seeds, labdanum, and benzoin, leaving you in ecstasy. This aroma adds its final magic touch with hyrax, styrax, and guaiac wood notes, ensuring that the fragrance is the star of the show.
Ingredients: ambrette, rum, caprova, tobacco, celery seed, labdanum, benzoin, lint, styrax, guaiac wood, patchouli and cedar.

Name: Masque Milano Terralba
Description: Questing for an immediate sweet escape in the smells of shrubs and the heath? Wander cautiously on the beachâ€™s rocks and feel the morning breeze flirting with your face for the Masque Milano Terralba perfume doesnâ€™t want to leave your skin. The perfume diffuses everlasting scents of clary sage, lemon, green tangerine, everlasting flower, juniper, cypress, cedarwood to abandon yourself completely.
Ingredients: lemon, clary sage, tangerine, myrtle, thyme, curry tree, immortelle, cypress, mastic, juniper and cedar
Base_note: leather accord, cedar wood, patchouli, benzoin, musk

Name: Lola Mood Red Carpet Attitude Nicole
Description: Lola Mood Red Carpet Attitude Nicole is a mysterious blend of beautiful, pure, and seductive flowers and fruits. This perfume creates a happy, romantic atmosphere, where the charismatic, delicate orange and fruit scents open it up. The white roses and gardenias appear at the heart to reveal all the charm and elegance you need to feel comfortable and confident during this joyful, romantic encounter. The base is warm and irresistible thanks to sweet caramel, heliotrope, and dancing musk.
Ingredients: orange blossom, tangerine, honey and cedar wood, musk, heliotrope and amber.

Name: Laurent Mazzone Veleno DorÃ©
Description: Veleno DorÃ© Laurent Mazzone's fragrance is beyond the reach for its bold, ambitious aroma. It entwines confidence and glamour in a way that it is like a powerful snake that strikes so that the victim becomes gold when they are infected with its extraordinary venom. A continuous irresistible sparkle of rum, nutmeg, and chili pepper is melted in exquisite flavors of tobacco leaf and patchouli to provide its wearer with a charismatic signature and modern style. Cherry, vanilla, and amber come at the end to ensure that the scent will linger on. This modern bowl of bliss will always capture your senses and never let go!
Ingredients: rum, nutmeg, hot pepper, tobacco, leaves, patchouli, vanilla, amber and black cherry.
Middle_note: obacco, celery seed, labdanum, benzoin, lint

Name: Laurent Mazzone Ultimate Seduction
Description: Laurent Mazzone Ultimate Seduction represents an array of sensual desires and elegance. It entwines a joyous fruity burst of invigorating cassis, orange, and pink pepper, blended in an irresistible oriental blend of sweet bouquets of rose, iris, and violet and wrapped by warm, sensuous notes of praline, patchouli, and amber. This symbol of seduction between men and women had a comprehensive understanding of men's form and sensual desires. So close your eyes and follow your instincts!
Ingredients: cassis, orange, pink pepper, rose, iris, violet, praline, patchouli, amber, white wood and cedar wood.
Base_note: indian sandalwood, frankincense, precious woods, white musk, oud

Name: Laurent Mazzone Sensual Orchid
Description: Laurent Mazzone Sensual Orchid is a happy perfume that never misses imbuing a day with a smile from the first spritz. This perfume is a warm and embracing oriental fragrance that evokes the wearer with a sweet bouquet. This perfume starts with a voluptuous touch of almond, mandarin orange, and neroli, fused in a subtle yet charming scent of orchid, heliotrope, and ylang-ylang to awake all the sensuality surrounding. The vanilla, benzoin, musk, and labdanum revolve at the base, leaving behind a sweet final scent.
Ingredients: almond, tangerine, orange, neroli, orchid, heliotrope, ylang-ylang, peony, jasmine, vanilla, benzoin, musk, labdanum, woody and cedar notes.

Name: Laurent Mazzone Radikal Water Lily
Description: Laurent Mazzone Radikal Water Lily is molded by the energy of modernity and romantic sensuality. Without being overly sweet, without being either overly resinous, an undeniable attraction of a bouquet of freshly blooming flowers lives all the time. The perfume opens with a confident aroma of lemon, cassis, and freesia, revealing an elevation and potent awakenings. Wait until you fall in love with the peony, cyclamen, and the sensuous jasmine at the heart note. You will finally succumb to its magnetism by a charismatic blend of amber and sandalwood to fall onto your skin softly and happily.
Ingredients: lemon, cassis, freesia, peony, cyclamen and jasmine, amber and sandalwood
Base_note: styrax, guaiac wood, patchouli and cedar.

Name: Laurent Mazzone Kingdom Of Dreams
Description: Kingdom of Dreams Laurent Mazzone Parfums dazzles you to be overwhelmed in a state of ecstasy. Subtly fascinated with a mesmeric appeal, youâ€™ll be totally addicted and transported into a dreamy and fantasy world by just a quick spritz of Kingdom of Dreams. This perfume opens with incense, nutmeg, and black pepper, taking you to the kingdom of desires along with the sensuous Moroccan cedar and Haitian vetiver. The base is wrapped in soft and charismatic amber and musk notes for an unforgettable finish.
Ingredients: incense, nutmeg, black pepper, patchouli, haitian vetiver, moroccan cedar, amber and musk.

Name: Laurent Mazzone Hysteric
Description: Inspired by the oriental adventures and tales of love, Laurent Mazzone Hysteric perfume will sweep you away like the wind. A start with an intoxicating hint of cardamom and bergamot makes for a fresh beginning that is entwined with a charismatic flowery rose and whiskey. It is a rendezvous with gourmand nuances of patchouli, coffee, and cacao for a wild ending.
Ingredients: mandarin, cardamom, bergamot rose, whiskey, tiramisu, jasmine, coffee, patchouli and cocoa

Name: Laurent Mazzone Hard Leather
Description: This fragrance boosts your manhood and confidence. Laurent Mazzone Hard Leather perfume opens with a masculine seduction of rum along with leather tonalities to go wild. The heart reveals the charm of iris accentuated by the sweetness of honey. The base delivers a tingling sensation of the rich and spicy notes of sandalwood, cedarwood, oud, and frankincense that youâ€™ll want to breathe in until you overdose. The charismatic finish diffuses a sense of bold ambitions and determined spirit to its wearers.
Ingredients: leather, rum, honey, iris, oud, styrax, sandalwood, frankincense, vanilla and cedar.

Name: Laurent Mazzone Army Of Lovers
Description: An oriental woody fragrance that keeps you in a good mood for a long time. The compelling composition has notes of rose in the top, patchouli in the middle and honey in the base, providing you with an enticing scent with a soft touch that boosts your beauty to fascinate everyone.
Ingredients: rose, spices, coriander, violet, patchouli, cashmere wood, oakmoss, sandalwood, musk, amber, honey
Base_note: praline, patchouli, amber, white wood and cedar wood.

Name: D'Orsay L'intrigante
Description: Reveal your inner beauty with this soft floral fragrance. The compelling composition has notes of musk in the top, camelia in the heart and patchouli in the base, delivering a magnificent scent that accentuates your femininity on your special nights.
Ingredients: juniper berries, myrrh, musk, pepper, camelia, carnation, red rose, orange blossom suede, vanille, musk, sandalwood, patchouli
Base_note: vanilla, benzoin, musk, labdanum, woody and cedar notes.

Name: D'Orsay Le Nomade
Description: Live your life with a classic touch and a modern style with this woody floral composition. The enticing fragrance features top notes of vetiver, heart of jasmine and a base of moss, which reveals to you a magnificent scent that takes you on a unique experience you cannot resist.
Ingredients: vetiver, bergamot, lime, nutmeg, cardamon, geranium, coriander, black pepper, caraway, jasmine, sage, sandalwood, atlas cedar, moss

Name: CnR Create Star Sign Capricorn
Description: Boost your elegance with an irresistable touch. The floral woody fragrance features upper notes of camelia, followed by rose in the heart and clove in the base, bringing a sensual scent that captivates the hearts of everyone there.
Ingredients: orchid, camelia, rose, iris, angelica, jasmine, ylang-ylang, clove, ambrette

Name: CnR Create Star Sign Taurus
Description: This floral fragrance is designed for the peace-loving and patient woman, just like the woman of the Taurus. Featuring notes of camelia in the top, rose in the middle and iris in the base, the composition brings to a unique scent that boosts your charisma to impress everyone around and keeps all the eyes on your charm and elegance.
Ingredients: camelia, red poppy, bergamot, heliotrope, rose, narcissus, ginger, iris, musk
Middle_note: camelia, carnation, red rose, orange blossom suede

Name: CnR Create Star Sign Aries
Description: It's a woody floral fragrance that perfectly suits the Aries man with a strong personality. Its distinctive composition has notes of patchouli in the top, jasmine in the middle and incense in the base, delivering a sensual scent with a sophisticated touch and long-lasting effect.
Ingredients: virginia cedar, mint, basil, patchouli, rosemary, pine, jasmine, geranium, incense, osmanthus, galbanum
Middle_note: cardamon, geranium, coriander, black pepper, caraway, jasmine
Base_note: oud, styrax, sandalwood, frankincense, vanilla and cedar.

Name: Biehl Al01
Description: It's a floral fragrance inspired by the sweet life in a glamorous city on the mediterranean. The composition combines top notes of peach, followed by a heart of freesia and a base of amber, adding an irresistable touch with a long-lasting effect to your elegance.
Ingredients: galbanum, pineapple, peach, raspberry, black currant, bergamot, basil, narcissus, violet, orchid, african orange flower, ylang-ylang, freesia, jasmine, heliotrope, gardenia, lily-of-the-valley, iris, musk, vetiver, oakmoss, amber, sandalwood
Top_note: galbanum, pineapple, peach, raspberry, black currant, bergamot, basil

Name: Au Pays de la Fleur d'Oranger Tubereuse Rosee
Description: Accentuate your femininity with such a floral fragrance. The rich composition has upper notes of tuberose, followed by spicy notes in the heart and sandalwood in the base, providing you with an amazing scent that takes you on a unique experience everytime you wear it.
Brand: Au Pays de la Fleur d'Oranger
Ingredients: tuberose, rose,ylang-ylang, spicy notes, musk, sandalwood

Name: A Lab on Fire Almost Transparent Blue
Description: An aromatic citrus fragrance inspired by the fresh beginning and vitality you feel you spend that amazing moment by the sea under sunlight. The composition features upper notes of lime, followed by thyme in the middle and musk in the base, delivering to you a refreshing scent that keeps you elegant and chic for long time.
Ingredients: lime, yuzu, thyme flower, aldehyde, hinoki, cedar wood, musk

Name: Parfums de Marly Sedley
Description:
Parfums de Marly Sedley is a fresh aromatic fragrance that is overflowing with citrus. It is ideal for ordinary wear. It is designed with a high-quality formula of grapefruit, bergamot, and mint, to offer you the perfect olfactory experience.
About the Brand:
De Marly is a leading French perfume brand. It offers luxurious perfumes inspired by the eighteenth century when the best perfumes were created for King Louis XV as a tribute to the prestigious horse races that he was an expert on.
Ingredients: bergamot, mandarin orange, grapefruit, lemon, mint, rosemary, geranium, lavender, olibanum, sandalowood, cedar, vetiver, patchouli, cashmeran and ambroxan.
Top_note: bergamot, mandarin orange, grapefruit, lemon, mint
Middle_note: narcissus, violet, orchid, african orange flower, ylang-ylang, freesia, jasmine, heliotrope, gardenia, lily-of-the-valley

Name: Electimuss Alkout
Description: A luxury aromatic with Ambergris and Labdanum that mixes with Musk and oud. a unique and precious fragrance with the finest and rarest ingredients that give you loveable and adorable scent.
Ingredients: amber, labdanum, musk, oud

Name: Penhaligon's Terrible Teddy
Description: A great perfume understands the emotive power of scent. It can unlock memories and open doors. It can stop us in our tracks, lost somewhere for a moment in time. Recollections triggered by a dusting or iris, a whisper of clove, a burst of juicy nectarine, a trail of smoky incense, a creamy lick of vanilla. This fragrance provides you with a perfect attractive scent that lasts for a long time.
Ingredients: incense, musk, ambroxan

Name: Penhaligon's Kensington Amber
Description: Enjoy a light and gentle walk in the streets of the ancient West of London with its charming buildings and embassies coated in a soft cream color with this perfume combination rich in the scents of labdanum and spicy cinnamon particles with tonka beans and bergamot, which gives you a touch of freshness and unique vitality with A strong start that fits all moments of the day and night. It was perfectly designed to suit both men and women as it was launched in 2018.
Ingredients: bergamot, cinnamon, labadenum, benzoin, vanilla, cedarwood, tonka beans
Base_note: iris, musk, vetiver, oakmoss, amber, sandalwood

Name: Byredo Sunday Cologne
Description: The classic cologne has hit home with gentlemen everywhere, polite and poised like a sharp side part and a taper cut. Citrusy and crisp, fleeting in its solidity, it has been fitted with a younger and less formal suit, appropriate to weekend relaxation, with unique blend of bergamot, lavendar and patchouli.
Ingredients: bergamot, cardamom, star anise, geranium, incense, lavender, moss, patchouli, vetiver.

Name: Byredo Oud Immortel
Description: The Oud Immortel is made around oud, a particular sort of wood that due to its use in traditional incense and perfume, has gained great cultural significance and has gotten its existence recorded in one among the world's oldest written texts - the Sanskrit Vedas from India. Once light heartwood Aquilaria tree becomes infected with a selected sort of mold, it defends itself by saturating its core with a dark, highly fragrant, resin. This dark wood, oud or agarwood holds a fancy fragrance, resembling few or no other natural ingredients.
Ingredients: cardamom, incense, brazilian rose wood, patchouli, bardi, moss, tobacco leaves

Name: Creed Jasmin Imperatrice Eugenie
Description: A perfume that is distinguished by its seductive, floral-oriental charm. The bergamot mixes with vanilla and amber in this perfume create a sensual fragrance that is full of strength and warmth. The perfume also contains other wonderful ingredients such as in this perfume are Tangerine, Green orange, sandalwood ambergris, and neroli.
Ingredients: bergamot, tangerine, green orange,sandalwood, ambergris, vanilla, and neroli
Base_note: sandalowood, cedar, vetiver, patchouli, cashmeran and ambroxan.

Name: Creed Sublime Vanille Les Royales Exclusives
Description: This soft oriental scent is suitable for both him and her. Its top notes feature Tahitian vanilla and South American bourbon vanilla, complemented by a heart of Tonka bean. The base has notes of Bergamot, Calabrian lemon and Musk.
Ingredients: tahitian vanilla, south american bourbon vanilla, tonka bean, bergamot, calabrian lemon, musk
Top_note: tahitian vanilla, south american bourbon vanilla

Name: Creed Neroli Sauvage
Description: This fragrance will provide you with charm, elegance and confidence. Its relaxed and stylish floral-citrus notes make it suitable for all ages. It features lemon, bergamot, and petitgrain on the top, coming on a heart of verbena and orange flower. The base has notes of ambergris and sandalwood.
Ingredients: lemon, bergamot and petit grain, verbena, orange flower, ambergris, sandalwood

Name: Memo Paris Marfa Spices
Description: An Oriental perfume with orange buds, tuberose and white musk that mixed with cardamom, American cactus, sandalwood. Its woody notes add a warm and cozy scent.
Ingredients: agave, cardamom, white musk, tuberose, orange flowers, cedar wood, sandalwood
Base_note: labadenum, benzoin, vanilla, cedarwood, tonka bean

Name: Alexandre.J Zafeer Oud Vanille
Description: Every parfume has a story. Alexandre.J The Collector Zafeer Oud Vanille has combined the Oriental desert and the French baroque architecture. This heavenly parfume enhances the vibrancy of a collection of 6 fragrances that evoke a timeless journey towards the mind and body. Let the Collector Zafeer Oud Vanille parfume react with your body and exude a caramelized vanilla scent that recalls the saccharine sweetness of childhood! Its Sensual and charismatic aroma focuses on a magical place talking to everyoneâ€™s imagination. This bowl of bliss starts with a fruity and delicious scent of leather notes, coconut, and toffee, which are followed by Clove Bud, Tonka Beans, White Wood, and Ylang that identify the essence of power and romance and wrapped by the truly unique fragrance of Musk, Oud, and Vanilla. Musk lovers of all persuasions- don't miss this bliss.
Ingredients: leather notes, coconut, toffee, clove bud, tonka beans, white wood, ylang, musk, oud, vanilla.

Name: Penhaligon's The Coveted Duchess Rose
Description: Penhaligon's The Coveted Duchess Rose is an oriental floral fragrance for women, launched in 2016. The fragrance packs rose, orange, musk, and woody notes, which evokes sensuality in a woman who wears it.
Ingredients: mandarin, rose, musky wood

Name: Clive Christian Clive Original C X
Description: This woody oriental fragrance leaves a seductive and exciting sensation with the sweet refreshing scent of Mandarin. This fragrance comes with the soft and delicate scent of purple flowers to fill you with comfort and pleasant feeling.
Ingredients: bergamot, peach, rhubarb, mandarin, pineapple, ivy, jasmine, rose, lily of the valley, iris root, weld, cedar wood, vanilla, vetiver, patchouli, musk, ladenum
Top_note: bergamot, peach, rhubarb, mandarin, pineapple, ivy

Name: Atkinsons Mint & Tonic
Description: This citrus fragrance takes you to a walk in the English potter's gardens with its fresh green mint that raises your spirit and improves your mood.
Ingredients: green lemon, grapefruit, mint, mandarin, geranium, ginger, vetiver, cedar wood, musk
Middle_note: clove bud, tonka beans, white wood, ylang

Name: Majda Bekkali J'ai Fait Un Re'Ve
Description: It's an oriental unisex fragrance inspired by a dream of an exceptional world that embraces the differences. The luxurious blend of elemi, cumin and papyrus reflects the anti-hatred image that is full of peace.
Ingredients: petitgrain, elemi, cumin, currant leaves, orange blossom, jasmine, lisylang, castoreum, white musk, white cedar, guaiac, leather, labdanum, incense, papyrus

Name: Majda Bekkali Fusion Sacaree Clair
Description: Have a nice chance to indulge into you imagination with this floral fruity fragrance that is developed for the sensual woman. Its intense and luxurious scent will boost your love of life, thanks to its notes of gardenia, heliotrope and tolu balm.
Ingredients: coffee, blackcurrant absolute, rhubarb leaf, coriander seed, bergamot, clementine, tuberose absolute, toasted bread effect, orange blossom, gardenia, jasmine, clove, milk of fig, ylang-ylang, celery effect, fir balm absolute, madagascan vanilla, tolu, res
Top_note: coffee, coriander, bergamot, tangerineâ€“orange aroma, black currant, rhubarb
Middle_note: jasmine, rose, lily of the valley, iris root, weld

Name: Escentric Molecules Escentric 01
Description: If youâ€™re a fan of unisex, remarkable scents â€“ as opposed to rich, sugared floral onesâ€“ we suggest making Escentric 01 your olfactory perfume. Not just an unbelievable stroke of perfumery, itâ€™s also incredibly wearable. It's a fragrance you can wear it like a precise piece of jewelry â€“ to add a certain attraction without being tacky or haughty.
Ingredients: alcohol denat, water, fragrance (iso e super 65%), limoene, citral.

Name: Affinessence Vanilla Benzoin
Description: Affinessence has innovated a new approach: "base parfumesâ€ to become the star of the show. Vanilla- Benzoin parfume is a breath-taking fusion of sophisticated and intensely lingering scent that illustrates the art and the talent of its artist Vanille Benjoin. The fusion is overwhelmed by two spellbinding types of VANILLA (Tahitian Vanilla with the sweet mixture of Madagascan Vanilla). If you loved this two undeniable seductive scent, let us tell you straight that the sweetness level has no limits with Vanilla- Benzoin parfume. Since the vanilla components are performing in harmony with the Siamese Benzoin, a fragrant Resin originating in Laos that is highly appreciated for its balsamic and almond notes. The Benzoin will stir the senses to their very depths transcending the vanilla with its intoxicating warm scent.
Ingredients: vanilla, benzoin, ambroxan, tonka bean, cedarwood
Middle_note: orange blossom, jasmine, lisylang, castoreum, white musk, white cedar

Name: Aether Rose Alcane
Description: Aether Rose Algane is a unisex floral fragrance which majorly includes accords of rose. This amazing perfume will surprise you totally with its fragrance. It is vivid and real. It is especially for those who are not madly into rose but loves surprises.
Ingredients: exaltolide, rose oxide, oxane, rhubofix, trimofix, tobacarol
Middle_note: jasmine, orange blossom, clove, tuberose, gardenia, fig
Base_note: cedarwood, vanilla, vetiver, patchouli, musk, and ladenum

Name: Aether Muskethanol
Description: Muskethanol by Aether is a unisex aromatic fragrance that was launched in the year 2016. The creator of this fragrance is AmÃ©lie Bourgeois and Anne-Sophie Behaghel. The fragrance has accords of woody notes, sweet notes, fruity notes, floral notes, green notes, sand, earthy notes, ambroxan, and musk.
Ingredients: cyclamen aldehyde, damascenone, florol, muscone, globalide, cetalox

Name: Aether Citrus Ester
Description: Citrus Ester by Aether is a unisex aromatic fragrance that was launched in the year 2016. The creator of this fragrance is AmÃ©lie Bourgeois and Anne-Sophie Behaghel. The fragrance has accords of grapefruit, rhubarb, and Methyl Pamplemousse.
Ingredients: herbac, methyl grapefruit, rhubafurane, vetiveryl acetate, musc t, firascone, stemone, iso e super

Name: Lalique Elegance Animale Noir Premier 1989
Description: Lalique Elegance Animale Noir Premier 1989 is a woody fragrance for both men and women. A beautiful, natural, soft and cool scent which gives you a unique and an elegant feel. The composition opens with a refreshing peachy tone and a hint of geranium. Saffron occupies the background adding an alluring air. The heart of the fragrance unfolds with rose, elegantly accompanying jasmine. The Gurjum balsamâ€™s sweet and spicy touch gives way to the animalistic base of leather and sandalwood. This scent can be worn year around and is perfect evening and nighttime occasions.
Ingredients: saffron, geranium, peach, rose, jasmine, gurjan balsam, leather, sandalwood.
Base_note: amber, vanilla, musk, patchouli, fir, heliotrope, cedar, tolu balm

Name: Alexandre.J The Collector Altesse Mysore
Description: This luxurious perfume is an Oriental Floral fragrance for women. The bottle defines royalty and luxury. The high notes consist of pink pepper, spices, and elemi; mid notes consist of jasmine and rose; bottom notes consist of balsam fir, amber wood and woody notes.
Ingredients: alcohol denat., parfum, aqua, benzyl salicylate, hydroxycitronellal, citronellol, limonene, geraniol, benzyl alcohol, benzyl benzoate, linalool, eugenol, farnesol, isoeugenol

Name: Acqua Di Parma Colonia Ambra
Description: This parfume is crafted to express the sensual masculinity. the glamorous scent of this oriental woody fragrance reflects your self-confidence and success with the special combination between the sweet Orange and Bergamot melting in the warm spicy scent of Amber and Sandalwood.
Ingredients: orange, bergamot, cedarwood, rose, patchouli, amber, vanilla, sandalwood

Name: Marly Akaster
Description: This oriental fragrance gives you a sophisticated and attractive scent that enchants hearts around you, increasing your confidence and attractiveness.
Ingredients: lemon, cypress, bulgarian rose, african geranium, cardamom, musk and agarwood

Name: Diptyque Do Son
Description: A unique floral fragrance for women to express the love of roses notes in mixing with pink pepper, and musk. Use it to enjoy all your time like never before.
Ingredients: african orange flower, rose, iris, tuberose, pink pepper, benzoin, musk

Name: Marly Galloway
Description: Marly Galloway is a woody aromatic fragrance for men and women. The scent is named after a scottish horse. Very nice, simple and long lasting fragrance that is suitable for summer.
Ingredients: citrus, pepper, iris, orange buds, amber, musk.
Base_note: musc t, firascone, stemone, iso e super

Name: Memo Paris Cuirs Nomades French Leather Hair Mist
Description: This fragrance is inspired by an amazing date in a cafe in Paris. It's designed for the modern woman who knows how to combine the opposites. Its composition has notes of lime, rose and suede, revealing a gorgeous scent that gives you the charm you desire.
Ingredients: lime, pink pepper, juniper, rose, clary sage, cedar, styrax resin, vetiver, musk, suede

Name: Tiziana Terenzi Siene
Description: This is a luxurious woody fragrance designed for men and women, also inspired by art, poetry, and culture. The distinctive fragrance is formulated using the perfect essential oils and rich in unique natural ingredients chosen with the utmost care. The perfume expresses the beauty of your personality, enhances your confidence, and increases your elegance and attraction.
Ingredients: saffron, incense, amber and patchouli, tolu balsam, javanese, vanilla and musk
Base_note: virginia cedar, benzoin, patchouli, vanilla, white musk, amber wood

Name: Acqua Di Parma Colonia Mirra

Name: Carven Paris Alexandrie

The aromatic composition has notes of violet leaf, nutmeg and patchouli, providing a fragrance with a scent that floats on the warmth of the Egyptian breeze.

It is characterized by its woody citrus fragrance where the notes of bergamot and petitgrain combined with honey and ebony ending with vetiver and patchouli to offer you the perfect long-lasting parfume.

Name: Atelier Cologne Camelia Intrepide
Description: Camelia Intrepide by Atelier Cologne is a fresh, new unisex fragrance that was launched in the year 2016. The creator of this fragrance is perfumer Jerome Epinettee. The top notes of the fragrance are Sicilian lemon, Calabrian bergamot, and nutmeg, heart notes are camellia, orris root and violet leaves, base notes are Turkish rose oil, leather, and amber.

Name: Amado Seduction Hair Mist
Description:
- Amado Seduction Hair Mist goes beyond the true embodiment of all the beauty and glamour.
- A romantic blend opens up the Hair Mist with an alluring scent of Pineapple and Hyacinth to treat your hair well.
- Iris, Jasmine and Pink Pepper evoke a delightful scene of a fresh colorful garden appealing at the heart.
- Vetiver, Musk, Amber, Patchouli and Vanilla revolve at the base to make sure the blend goes smooth.
- Leave this romantic scent to seduce you and touch your soul and hair in an unforgettable moment.
Ingredients: pineapple, hyacinth, iris, jasmine, pink pepper, vetiver, musk, amber, patchouli, vanilla.
Base_note: tolo balsam, benzoin, vanilla and musk

The top notes are anise and ginger, which blends with smoky wood and balsamic haze, cedar, olibanum, and tobacco. Patchouli and white wood form the heart of this perfume. Vanilla and spicy musk tinged with labdanum and leather form the base.

Name: Liquides Imaginaires Phantasma EDP
Description:
Mysterious, sexy, and glowing, coming to life in the dark to show your vitality at all times.
Hot and glowing water draws a smile on your lips and tells the secret of your elegance in all forums.
Ripe yuzu fruits dipped in black tea accompanied by spicy notes of fresh ginger.
The fragrance carries creamy notes of wood and musk to increase the sweetness of the smell and capture all the breaths.

Name: Liquides Imaginaires Melancolia EDP

Spiritual and spicy aromatic water that goes your mind and drives you crazy.
The mint heat makes you zealous and flies around with a whiff of cardamom and lemongrass.
Warm leather touches appear between the folds of the fragrance to give you the classic and luxury character that you are always looking for.
Your favorite choice in busy days and loud events to make your smell above all sounds.

Intense, warm, sensual aromatic notes inspired by the skins of wild creatures that live in the wild.
The strange and mysterious harmony of tarragon and intense oak moss leaves you with supernatural power.
Sage and cypress are added to the fragrance to prove the fact that nature is the magic entity in mythology.
Express your unbridled strength and unrestrained spirit with the odor of the rich fragrance that captivates the breath around you

Name: Liquides Imaginaires Tapis Volant EDP

A new journey in an enchanted vehicle to achieve a reckless dream.
Your youthful, energetic, and enthusiastic soul is in need of the spice blend of Tonka bean that will boost your fire.
Discover the secret of a new adventure in the sunlight with the freshness of bergamot that blows your energy.
The composition of the spicy fragrance carries soft sides of iris and jasmine to increase the attractiveness of the scent until it catches the breath.

Name: Liquides Imaginaires Fleur De Sable EDP

A treasure buried under the golden desert sands is discovered by adventurous souls.
The harmonious combination of red pepper with black and pink peppers gives you a strong enthusiasm and evokes the qualities of your untamed self.
From afar, fresh mandarin drops fight to appear and come out from between the folds of the fragrance to express your vitality.
It is a special and distinctive combination that cannot be dispensed with treasure hunters and those wishing to achieve victories.
Ingredients: mandarin, orris root, black pepper, pink pepper, red pepper, myrrh, elegentin flowers

Name: Liquides Imaginaires BÃªte Humaine EDP

This perfume is the link between real characters and wandering spirits of untamed nature.
It is perfect for the legendary character of wild nature who always dwells in the atmosphere of forests and mysterious far lands.
The woody blend of guaiac and sandalwood with vetiver adds to the excitement and thrill of adventure.
The fragrance gives you the opportunity to enjoy the charming scents of nature as you taste the sweetness of the delicious chestnut and inhale the fragrance of violets.

The fragrance embodies the famous Greek myth with its story which states that strong humans are able to transform themselves into wild animals.
This aromatic legend was born from the womb of hazelnut wrapped in the glowing aroma of saffron to depict the details of the emotion between the beast and its prey.
The feeling of victory and instinctive strength is represented in the warmth of patchouli and coumarin with coffee grains with its hot aroma.
Suede in the final moments reveals the beauty of the sacred sensual angelic scent and gives you the opportunity to relive the moments of antiquity.
Ingredients: rhubarb, saffron, sage, red pepper, orris, hazelnut
Top_note: rhubarb, saffron, sage, red pepper, orris, hazelnut

Name: Liquides Imaginaires Peau de Bete EDP

The embodiment of the majestic world of the East with its antique and distinctive scents that excite the breath.
The oriental fragrance blend begins with the warmth of saffron and the aroma of chamomile spiced with cumin and glowing pepper.
The heart of the perfume is very mysterious and attractive, filled with a huge group of rare and exotic scents.
With Guaiac and Patchouli, it forms a warm and intense breeze to increase the feelings of confidence and luxury within you.
Ingredients: black pepper, parsley, saffron, chamomile, cumin
Top_note: black pepper, parsley, saffron, chamomile, cumin
Middle_note: black pepper, pink pepper, red pepper

Name: Liquides Imaginaires Bloody Wood EDP

A noble character from the upper classes who seek the truth in every detail of her life.
Taste the sweetness of intoxicating and delicious red wine with a group of fresh fruits that refresh the breath and revive the hearts.
The breeze of flowers is the main title that announces your different presence in all lofty societies.
It is a distinctive and exciting aromatic journey that begins with violets and ends with soft creamy woody notes that preserve the beauty of your look until the end.

Middle_note: sandalwood, virginia cedar, labdanum, woody notes

Name: Liquides Imaginaires Bello Rabelo EDP

You can taste a mind-blowing immersion of love and its sweetness with the taste of dried fruits dipped in red wine.
The heart of the perfume whispers to your heart a special and glowing passion that was the source of the aromas of resins.
The composition of the exotic and exciting fragrance draws attention to you and makes the lights shine on you until the end.
The warm woody endnotes are enriched with delicate vanilla aromas with particles of benzene that add to the luxury and strength of the scent.
Ingredients: dried fruits, red wine
Middle_note: patchouli, coumarin, atlas cedar, coffee, cashmeran, vetiver

Name: Liquides Imaginaires DÃ©sert Suave EDP
Description:
In the oasis, in the middle of the majestic desert and glowing golden sand.
Sunlight harmonizes with cardamom seeds to trigger your senses and spark a spirit of exploration for everything around you.
The composition of the fragrance is enhanced by charming breezes of roses to increase the beauty of your look at all events and parties.
Do not forget to taste the delicious sugary sweetness of dates among the mysterious and attractive fragrance.
Ingredients: rose, orange, cedar, cardamom, sesame, orange blossom, dates
Middle_note: amyris, herbs, texas cedar, atlantic cedar, ambrarum, patchouli, patchouli leaf, guaiac wood, cypriol oil, styrax, juniper

Name: Liquides Imaginaires Fleuve Tendre EDP

A sensual and seductive combination that represents a glowing meeting of lovers in special moments.
The composition of flowers with rose water in the heart of the fragrance gives you the opportunity to experience a charming and enjoyable intimate atmosphere.
Your emotional journey begins with a spicy oriental blend that is overshadowed by the aroma of saffron and cardamom that emanates in the first moments.
The warm ends are filled with notes of tonka bean and leather giving you the last hugs, expressing the feeling of eternal love.

Top_note: black pepper, nutmeg, saffron, coriander, cumin, cardamom, orange
Base_note: cypriol oil, guaiac wood, haitian vetiver, pine tree, papyrus

Name: Liquides Imaginaires Ile Pourpre EDP
