A mythical island where mysterious fruits are spread all over with their strong and intense aromas.
Feel free to assemble the fruits and form the amazing purple juice that brings out the sweetness of figs and the freshness of bergamot.
The blend reflects your spirit of mystery and allure enhanced by some spicy notes of ginger and fresh Shiso.
A few delicious puffs of cream at the ends make the sweetness of the fragrance captivate the hearts of everyone around you.

Name: Liquides Imaginaires Dom Rosa EDP

This fragrance embodies the spirit of sensitive personalities with their strong emotions and delicate feelings.
It is a sensual composition in which you taste the warmth of champagne with the sweetness of pears in the first moments.
Damask roses start from the heart to announce the presence of the moments of love and express their strong feelings.
Guaiac with cedar represents the precious woods that increase the luxury and strength of the aroma in all the special moments.
Ingredients: pear, pomelo, champagne

Name: Liquides Imaginaires Fortis EDP
Description:
Ancient and mysterious black water with a supernatural power to ward off evil spirits as ancient traditions tell.
A collection of resonant fragrances that form an aromatic jewel that envelopes you in the precious sparkle of guaiac with notes of vanilla and vetiver.
A feeling of sensuality and excessive temptation overwhelms your soul after the dash aroma of saffron and oud.
The composition of the amazing spiritual fragrance helps you to start over to launch towards a bright future and expel all the demons of the past.
Ingredients: cypriol oil, saffron, cumin, oud
Middle_note: petalia flowers, rose water, geranium, animal notes, musk

Name: Liquides Imaginaires Sancti EDP

An experience of a transcendent woody incense imagined in Sufi traditions, acts as having a divine tincture that provides sacred protection and spiritual transcendence..
The dash of citrusy fragrances of bergamot and grapefruit at the first moment freshens your breath and raises the beam of light sneaking through the clouds.
A well-balanced and harmonious fragrance that combines warm incense endnotes, warmly scented with nutmeg and amber with a very soft and delicate balsamic heart.
The composition of the fragrance acts as affectionate angelic wings that carry you in kindness away from all life's difficulties and unsettling troubles.

Name: Memo Paris Escales Extraordinaires French Leather Rose Special Box EDP
Description:
When you inhale the fragrance of French roses in rose water, your soul will be transported to the world of beauty
Express your elegance and originality and enjoy the fragrance of musk and pink pepper
The leather at the end of the fragrance adds some classic touch that highlights your sense of confidence and luxury
Always the best gift choice thanks to its elegant and distinctive packaging
Ingredients: alcohol, perfum, aqua, t-butyl alcohol, citronellol, geraniol, linalool, eugenol, farnesol, c itral, benzyl alcohol, cinnamyl alcohol

Name: Tom Ford White Suede EDP
Description: This fragrance was launched in September 2009 for women. Its collection is based upon the essence of musk, which is one of Tom Ford's favorite ingredients. It is a very feminine perfume. White suede is blended out of rose, saffron, thyme, mate tea, olibanum, lily-of-the-valley, amber, suede, and sandalwood to form the fragrance. This edition is available in a 100ml bottle.

Ingredients: seaweed, driftwood, agarwood (oud), ambrette (muskmallow), celery seeds, cardamom, juniper, myrtle, lavender, lemon, yellow mandarin, artemisia, mastic or lentisque, olibanum, incense, vanilla, vetiver, oak.
Top_note: seaweed, driftwood, agarwood (oud), ambrette (muskmallow), celery seeds, cardamom
Middle_note: lavender, coriander, pink pepper, nutmeg, cardamom seeds, rosemary, balsam fir

Name: Widian Aj Arabia New York EDP
Description:
An elegant woody fragrance characterized by its distinctive and unique scent.
Creates a strong and captivating aromatic aura around you.
The fragrance has an irresistible attraction that will be addictive from the first touch.
The fragrance is also perfectly designed to suit both men and women.
Ingredients: yellow mandarin, juniper, lavender, bergamot, pink pepper, coriander, rose, caramel, geranium, patchouli, jasmine, orris, white musk, tonka bean, white amber, tobacco, haitian vetiver, frankincense, amber.

Name: Tom Ford Soleil Neige EDP
Description:
A distinctive fresh floral fragrance.
Get ready to shine with the beauty and attractiveness of a blend of orange blossom, white flowers, jasmine, rose and Turkish rose.
The fragrance is strong and intense and will stay with you until the last minute of the day.
Don't hesitate to add this precious piece to your perfume world.
Ingredients: bergamot, carrot seed, orange blossom, white flowers, jasmine, rose, turkish rose, benzoin, vanilla, labdanum.

Name: Tom Ford TubÃ©reuse Nue EDP
Description:
A distinctive floral fragrance that is perfect for both men and women.
The fragrance has an exceptional aromatic formula extracted from the finest natural elements.
The fragrance opens with a refreshing blend of Sichuan pepper, lily, and jasmine.
And in the heart there are captivating touches of tuberose, cocoa, styrax, and benzoin.
The fragrance ends with dark notes of leather, musk, agarwood, and tonka bean.

This fragrance is inspired by a boat sailing trip around the Cyclades Islands in the Greek Archipelago.
This enchanting aromatic blend opens with the captivating aroma of coffee.
In the heart of the fragrance lies seductive touches of Turkish rose and vanilla.
The mixture becomes sweeter and softer due to the notes of honey and sweet amber resin in the base.
Enjoy this amazing aromatic blend that will make all your moments special.
Ingredients: extrait de parfum
Middle_note: rose, caramel, geranium, patchouli, jasmine, orris

Name: Roja Dove Elysium Pour Homme EDC
Description:
Aromatic fragrance for men with refined taste.
The fragrance is enriched with an exceptionally masculine fragrance that has been crafted with extreme precision.
This charming fragrance gives you a bold and attractive masculine look and enhances your elegance and confidence.
This luxurious fragrance is the perfect companion for you on all your special occasions.
Ingredients: grapefruit, lemon, bergamot, thyme, galbanum, mugworts
Top_note: grapefruit, lemon, bergamot, thyme, galbanum, mugworts
Middle_note: orange blossom, white flowers, jasmine, rose, turkish rose

Name: Prada Un Chant Dâ€™Amour EDP
Description:
A charming and distinctive aromatic blend perfect for both men and women.
The fragrance belongs to the family of fresh floral notes and luxurious woody notes.
The floral scent will give you a feeling of freshness like no other.
The distinctive woody scent will give you a very elegant and attractive look.
Don't miss this amazing and unique olfactory experience.
Ingredients: orange blossom, bergamot, cotton flower, neroli, jasmine, lily of the valley, musk, benzoin.
Base_note: mastic or lentisque, olibanum, incense, vanilla, vetiver, oak.

Name: Prada Nue au Soleil EDP
Description:
A distinctive fragrance belonging to the family of sensual and fresh floral notes.
This fragrance is specially designed for men and women who are looking for distinction and sophistication.
The fragrance gives you an exceptional and completely different olfactory experience.
Its scent makes you look bold and attractive, boosts your confidence, and makes you feel comfortable and fresh all the time.
This wonderful fragrance deserves to be in your perfume collection.
Ingredients: aldehydes, petitgrain, neroli, freesia, green notes, magnolia, white musk, patchouli, amber
Base_note: white musk, tonka bean, white amber, tobacco, haitian vetiver, frankincense, amber.

Name: Prada Marienbad EDP
Description:
An elegant luxurious fragrance for both men and women.
The fragrance is enriched with an amazing aromatic blend extracted from the finest natural ingredients.
The fragrance opens with top notes of vanilla, a seductive heart of incense and styrax, and base notes of luxurious musky amber.
The fragrance gives you an elegant and attractive look and enhances your feeling of comfort and confidence all the time.
Ingredients: vanilla, incense, styrax, amber
Middle_note: vetiver, juniper berries, black currant, apple, pink pepper, cedar, jasmine, cypriol or nagarmotha oil, lily of the valley, rose

Name: Prada Heat Wave EDP
Description:
The enchanting aromatic scent will take you on a journey to an island at night.
The journey begins with the scents of ylang-ylang and davana, continues with the floral explosion of tuberose and datura, and ends with sweet vanilla.

About the Brand:
Thomas Carlyle Ford is a famous American fashion designer and filmmaker. He has been one of the most important people in pop culture from the 1990s till this day. He is the owner of the luxury brand which was founded in 2005, in New York City. Tom Ford has produced amazing menswear, beautiful fragrances, high quality sunglasses and cool watches that are very popular with high fashion enthusiasts. His line can be found all over the world. In Europe alone, you can shop his products in many countries such as UK, Spain, France, Belgium, Germany, Greece, Finland, Sweden, Portugal, Ireland, etc.

p> About the Brand:
D.S. & Durga Perfume brand was founded in 2007, in New York City. It is distinguished by its special high-quality fragrances and unique scents. It collects herbs and flower extracts from all over the world to create the perfumes manually. It has recorded 76 fragrances. The earliest edition was released in 2000 and the latest one in 2021. D.S. & Durga fragrances were created in collaboration with perfumers David Seth Moltz, Kavi Moltz and Rayda Vega.

Name: Lengling No. 9 Wunderwind Parfum EDP
Description:
-Okavango, Botswana.
-This river is known as the one â€œwhich never gets to the seaâ€.
-It seems from above as if there is a huge tree spread-eagled in the sand with its innumerable tentacular roots drawing a labyrinthine aquatic tableau which the waters re-design everyday.
-On the banks of these countless streams, all sorts of fragrances rise up from the luxurious vegetation.
-Be it papyrus, acacia or sycamore, the abundant ï¬‚ora exhume a constant source of inspiration on which imagination feeds insatiably.
Ingredients: marula liquor - papyrus - acacia flower - woolly caper - iris - tonka beans - sycomore - mopane.

Name: Lengling No. 8 Apero Parfum EDP
Description:
-To the North-East of Kyoto in Japan.
-A truly majestic bamboo forest linking the sky to the Earth below.
-The green topping of the bamboo stalks extract the eyes seemingly to inï¬nity, but no, you see it gently swaying in the delicate breeze.
- It gives you the chance for a few ï¬‚eeting rays of sun that will pierce the shade.
-Sagano invites the visitor to join the bamboo and luxuriate in the poetry surrounding it.
Ingredients: bergamot - yuzu - nanah mint - grapefruit - bamboo - matcha tea - blackcurrent - patchouli - cedar wood - musk.

Name: Lengling No. 6 Ã€ La Carte Parfum EDP
Description:
-Ha Long Bay, Vietnam. â€œWater, water everywhere, not any drop to drinkâ€.
-Itâ€™s under the junks which slice through the surface of the sea, in the saturated air above and, in the distance, in the clouds announcing the arrival of the monsoons.
-The aromas of natureâ€™s all-enveloping shroud are present in all these forms.
Ingredients: pink pepper corn - nashi pear - rhubarb - lotus flower - water jasmin - magnolia - rose - ambroï¬x - musk - akigala wood.
Top_note: pink pepper corn - nashi pear - rhubarb
Middle_note: tuberose absolute, coconut neo jungle essence , jasmine absolute

Name: Lengling No. 5 Eisbach Parfum EDP
Description:
-Kyoto, Japan. The exquisite rose bushes in full bloom lining the alley where they drench the air with their powerful fragrances.
-Discreetly hidden at the end lies the entrance to the Japanese garden, a visual and sensual surprise.
-The mineral map of rocks, gravel and wood appear as if they are tracing lifeâ€™s internal make-up.
-The spirit elsewhere seem suspended between two worlds seeking enlightenment.
Ingredients: kumquat - bergamot - nutmeg - rose alba - peony - musk - ambroï¬x - mappkle wood.

Name: Lengling No. 3 Acqua Tempesta Parfum EDP
Description:
-Florence, Italy: Pretend you are on a romantic journey, but take a cultural turn and let yourself fall under the spell of the wonders of the Uffi Zi Gallery.
-This is a mandatory visit to one of Florentine's churches where mystical scents lead naturally opening their heavy doors.
-Once inside the nose is treated to an eternal aroma as it is assailed by the aromatic fragrances from incense, sculpted wood, ancestral stone and, yes, even raw concrete.
-The surprise of a stolen oh-so-sweet kiss interrupts the contemplation and allows time to flow again.
Ingredients: olibanum - myrrhe - heliotrope - iris - jasmin - ambroï¬x - vanilla - musk - cistus.
Middle_note: lotus flower - water jasmin - magnolia - rose

Description
Enjoy shiny and healthy skin with this fabulous body lotion. Apply a suitable amount of lotion on completely dry and clean skin. Rub it gently in a circular motion until it's fully absorbed.

Name: Xerjoff Casamorati Mefisto
Description: It's a charming oriental fragrance with notes of spices, amber and the added mystery of the dark woods. The composition adds a dramatic touch to the place, that remain intense for long hours, which reinforces the relation between the people and the place.
Ingredients: amber, geranium, precious spices, dark woods

Name: Xerjoff Casamorati Lira
Description: Enjoy the freshness and vitality that spreads in the air, carrying notes of black tea and guaiac wood, enhanced with the soft scents of clary sage. The fragrance will provide you with an amazing sensation of comfort that lasts for a long time.
Ingredients: black tea, clary sage, guaiac wood
Top_note: black tea, clary sage, guaiac wood

Name: Xerjoff Casamorati La Tosca
Description: Al Athal is an aromatic resin perfume bridging and celebrating the bonds between the generations of the region. Love, respect and innovative traditions are carried in the scent of Al Athal. Spices, flowers and Frankincence at the top lay on an olfactive bed of Amber and Musk. Al Athal Oud takes the beautiful initial scent, and adds pure precious Indian Oud Oil, to make the scent deeper and warmer. Ghawali Concentrated Perfumes are a 100% oil-based fragrance, ideal for your pulse points and for layering with our perfumes.
Ingredients: aldehydes, cloves, rose, flowers, frankincense, amber, musk, vanilla, oud oil
